column24: 0.023#TD4047E.TXT.r#1154567#1154568#TD4047E.TXT.r_4919;TD4047E.TXT.r_4920# 'jug par sla ba'i chos ston pa ni ji ltar 'byung ba'i dngos po'i chos ston pa'o // / +thabs sla bas 'jug pa'i chos ni rtogs pa'i  CHOS JI LTA BA BZHIN DU STON pa ste / /
column25: 0.024#TD4041E.TXT.r#1270141#1270141#TD4041E.TXT.r_187;TD4041E.TXT.r_188# don spyod pa ni bsams pa las byung ba'i  dge bas yang dag par bsdus pa'o // / +chos spyod pa ni thos pa las byung ba'i dge bas yang dag par bsdus pa'o // /
column26: 0.024#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2614312#2614315#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9702;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9703;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9704# gzhan rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyi rab kyi mtha' pa zad pa shes pa la sogs  pa gang yin pa de yang de dang 'dra bar brjod par bya ste / / +mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par byed pa'am / /
column27: 0.025#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177419#2177420#TD4025E.TXT.r_1727# 'phags    pa'i gang zag sleb pa'i rgyud la yod pa ji ltar mthong ba'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos sgom pa'i shes pas gzhom par bya ba gang yin pa de dag bsgom pas spang bar bya bzhes bya ba'o // /
column28: 0.026#TD4049E.TXT.r#2305283#2305283#TD4049E.TXT.r_3085# 'bel ba'i gtam gyis gtan la 'bebs pas chos la rdzogs par longs spyod pas bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir / /
column29: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3103903#3103903#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1775# 'bras bu la chags pa med pa'i bsam pa dang  sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i bsam pa dang  thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bsam pas sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'o // /
column30: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#23291#23291#TD4036E.TXT.r_3556# 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa de dang yun ring du rjes su 'brel bar 'gyur ba dang  de chags par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur zhing chags par    'gyur ba'i chos rnams zil gyis gnon par mi rigs pa dang  dbang po mnyen pa dang  dbang po 'jam pa dang  dbang po mi rtsub pa dang  dbang po mi brlang ba dang  gzhan dag la 'di lta ste / /
column31: 0.027#TD4097E.TXT.r#2227569#2227569#TD4097E.TXT.r_3440;TD4097E.TXT.r_3441# de dag ces bya ba mi dge ba la  sogs pa'o // / +rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag gi rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i chos la rnam par smin pa zhes brjod pas rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i chos can no // /
column32: 0.027#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2549436#2549436#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_1689# mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni 'di la mthong ba'i tshe la myong bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa'i mtshan nyid yod pas na mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i  las zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba yin no // /
column33: 0.028#TD4069E.TXT.r#625911#625911#TD4069E.TXT.r_498;TD4069E.TXT.r_499# mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i tshe la myong bar  'gyur ba'o // / +de lta bu'i chos so zhes bya ba ni de ltar 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column34: 0.028#TD4019E.TXT.r#2433688#2433690#TD4019E.TXT.r_3530;TD4019E.TXT.r_3531# zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni dri ba'i don so sor re rer dngos po'i mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba dang ldan zhing / /
column35: 0.028#TD4054E.TXT.r#1040236#1040236#TD4054E.TXT.r_7862# gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa'i dbang du bya ba'i chos la sbyor ba'i 'phen pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyis de gnyi gar rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: don gyi dbang du bya ba ni yang byang chub sems dpa' chos sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#690881#690893#TD4083E.TXT.r_815;TD4083E.TXT.r_816# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I CHES rgan zhing yon tan dang ldan pa la bkur sti bya bar 'os pa'i chos dang mthun pa'i chos gang zag mthong na nga rgyal gyis sam / /

column3: sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na / / +sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang   thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'dzud pa dang bdag ci ri zhes yongs su shes pa dang  nga rgyal bcom pa dang  lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa dang  bcos ma ma yin par byams pa dang  mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la sems snyoms pa dang  mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthong bar du gtan du    mdza' ba dang  tshig ran pa dang  'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis gsong por smra ba dang  snying rje chen po yongs su ma chad pa dang  khur blangs pa rnams la skyid lug pa med pa dang  yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang  thos pa dang don gyis ngoms mi myong ba dang  bdag gi 'khrul pa rnams la nyes par lta ba dang   bzhin gyi 'khrul pa rnams la mi gshe bar bsgo ba dang  spyod lam thams cad du byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang  rnam par smin pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa dang  srid pa'i 'gro bar skye ba thams cad la mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med  pa'i bzod pa dang  dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sdud pa'i brtson 'grus dang  gzugs med pa'i khams rnam par bstsal ba'i bsam gtan dang  thabs dang ldan pa'i shes rab dang  bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis zin pa'i thabs dang  tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams dang  tshul  khrims 'chal pa rnams la gnyis su med pa'i byams pa dang  gus par byas te chos nyan pa dang  gus par byas te dgon par gnas pa dang  'jig rten gyi sna tshogs dag la mi dga' ba dang  theg pa dman pa mi 'dod pa dang  theg pa chen po'i phan yon la lta ba dang  sdig pa'i grogs  po yongs su spong ba dang  dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten ba dang  tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhin yongs su spongs ba dang  mngon par shes pa lngas rnam par rtsen ba dang  ye shes la rton pa dang  sgrub pa dang log par sgrub pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams mi gtong ba dang  tshig gcig tu chad  pa dang  bden pa gces su byed pa dang  byang chub kyi sems de sngon du 'gro ba zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#690894#690905#TD4083E.TXT.r_816;TD4083E.TXT.r_817# khong  khro ba la sogs pas gus par mi byed cing stan las mi ldang la stan mi stobs na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#690906#690917#TD4083E.TXT.r_816;TD4083E.TXT.r_817;TD4083E.TXT.r_818;TD4083E.TXT.r_819;TD4083E.TXT.r_820# khong  khro ba la sogs pas gus par mi byed cing stan las mi ldang la stan mi stobs na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // / +nad tshabs che bas nus pa chung ba dang  tha mal pa ma yin pa dang sems 'khrugs pa la nyes  pa med do // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#690918#690927#TD4083E.TXT.r_818;TD4083E.TXT.r_819;TD4083E.TXT.r_820;TD4083E.TXT.r_821;TD4083E.TXT.r_822# nad tshabs che bas nus pa chung ba dang  tha mal pa ma yin pa dang sems 'khrugs pa la nyes  pa med do // / +dris pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la // / +dris pa zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa ste / /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#690927#690935#TD4083E.TXT.r_821;TD4083E.TXT.r_822;TD4083E.TXT.r_823;TD4083E.TXT.r_824# kun du smra ba dang yang dag par dga' bar byed pa la blta bar bya'o // / +lan 'debs pa ni rjes su mthun pa'i lan mi 'debs pa'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#690936#690943#TD4083E.TXT.r_823;TD4083E.TXT.r_824;TD4083E.TXT.r_825# 'di yang nye bar mtshon pa ste / / +kun du smra bar  mi byed pa dang  slar yang dag par dga' bar mi byed pa la yang blta bar bya ste / /
column9: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#690943#690951#TD4083E.TXT.r_824;TD4083E.TXT.r_825# kun du smra bar  mi byed pa dang  slar yang dag par dga' bar mi byed pa la yang blta bar bya ste / / +sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyis gzhan gyi sems srung ba las nyams pa'i phyir lan mi 'debs pa la sogs pa'i nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#690951#690966#TD4083E.TXT.r_825;TD4083E.TXT.r_826# sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyis gzhan gyi sems srung ba las nyams pa'i phyir lan mi 'debs pa la sogs pa'i nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#690967#690978#TD4083E.TXT.r_826;TD4083E.TXT.r_827# byang chub sems dpa' pha rol po  dag 'dri ba dang  kun du smra ba dang  yang dag par dga' bar byed pa la nga rgyal la sogs pas yang dag par lan mi 'debs pa dang  kun DU MI SMRA BA DANG  yang dag par dga' bar mi byed pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column12: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#690979#690988#TD4083E.TXT.r_826;TD4083E.TXT.r_827;TD4083E.TXT.r_828# byang chub sems dpa' pha rol po  dag 'dri ba dang  kun du smra ba dang  yang dag par dga' bar byed pa la nga rgyal la sogs pas yang dag par lan mi 'debs pa dang  kun DU MI SMRA BA DANG  yang dag par dga' bar mi byed pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon  mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column13: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#690988#691002#TD4083E.TXT.r_828# de gnyid kyis log pa las gzhan dag gis 'di sad par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes kyis 'dri ba dang  kun du smra ba dang  yang dag par dga' bar byed pa dang  chos ston pa dang  gzhan chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam ston pa la nyan pa  dang  chos kyi GTAM LA MI DGA' BAR 'gyur ba dang  dge 'dun gyi nang khrims srung ba dang  gzhan ches mang ba rnams kyi sems rjes su srung ba dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa la ni nyes pa med do // /
column14: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691002#691010#TD4083E.TXT.r_828# de gnyid kyis log pa las gzhan dag gis 'di sad par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes kyis 'dri ba dang  kun du smra ba dang  yang dag par dga' bar byed pa dang  chos ston pa dang  gzhan chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam ston pa la nyan pa  dang  chos kyi GTAM LA MI DGA' BAR 'gyur ba dang  dge 'dun gyi nang khrims srung ba dang  gzhan ches mang ba rnams kyi sems rjes su srung ba dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa la ni nyes pa med do // /
column15: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691011#691019#TD4083E.TXT.r_828;TD4083E.TXT.r_829# de gnyid kyis log pa las gzhan dag gis 'di sad par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes kyis 'dri ba dang  kun du smra ba dang  yang dag par dga' bar byed pa dang  chos ston pa dang  gzhan chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam ston pa la nyan pa  dang  chos kyi GTAM LA MI DGA' BAR 'gyur ba dang  dge 'dun gyi nang khrims srung ba dang  gzhan ches mang ba rnams kyi sems rjes su srung ba dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa la ni nyes pa med do // /
column16: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691019#691034#TD4083E.TXT.r_829;TD4083E.TXT.r_830;TD4083E.TXT.r_831# mgron du bos zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mgron du bos pa bdag     // /
column17: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691058#691064#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833;TD4083E.TXT.r_834# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column18: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691144#691154#TD4083E.TXT.r_839;TD4083E.TXT.r_840;TD4083E.TXT.r_841# byang chub sems dpa'  pha rol gyi gser la sogs pa bstabs pa nang rgyal la sogs pas len par mi byed na sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column19: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693731#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column20: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694050#694051#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column21: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694089#694093#TD4083E.TXT.r_1166;TD4083E.TXT.r_1167# sems can dag mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyis rig pa ston par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column22: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694239#694243#TD4083E.TXT.r_1181;TD4083E.TXT.r_1182;TD4083E.TXT.r_1183# byang chub sems dpa' nye du dang longs spyod las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing mya ngan byung ba rnams la kun nas  mnar sems kyi sems kyis mya ngan bsang bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column23: 5.960#TD4083E.TXT.r#693158#693160#TD4083E.TXT.r_1069;TD4083E.TXT.r_1070# khong KHRO BA DANG NGA RGYAL gyis non PAS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN GYI thad du gdams ngag tshol du mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa  can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column24: 5.960#TD4083E.TXT.r#694178#694182#TD4083E.TXT.r_1176;TD4083E.TXT.r_1177# nga rgyal dang khong khro bas mnyam pa'am de bas lhag pa'i mthun pa'i phan gdags pas lan du phan mi 'dogs na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column25: 1.192#TD4083E.TXT.r#694282#694288#TD4083E.TXT.r_1186;TD4083E.TXT.r_1187;TD4083E.TXT.r_1188# byang chub sems dpa' sems can phongs pa rnams zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis zas dang  skom la sogs pa sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column26: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#694410#694414#TD4083E.TXT.r_1197;TD4083E.TXT.r_1198;TD4083E.TXT.r_1199# byang chub  sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column27: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#694566#694569#TD4083E.TXT.r_1212;TD4083E.TXT.r_1213# skrod par mi byed na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column28: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691210#691213#TD4083E.TXT.r_844;TD4083E.TXT.r_845# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column29: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691380#691381#TD4083E.TXT.r_861;TD4083E.TXT.r_862# ma dad pa dang ma gus pas mi slob pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column30: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691470#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column31: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692817#692817#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030# kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column32: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693915#693917#TD4083E.TXT.r_1145;TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147# nga rgyal gyi grogs byed du mi 'gro na / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column33: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693990#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column34: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694337#694344#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192;TD4083E.TXT.r_1193# byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyi chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes SU MI STON PA DANG  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don gyi mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column35: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692938#692938#TD4083E.TXT.r_1041;TD4083E.TXT.r_1042# kun du 'dzin na 'das ma thag pa bzhin du nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la khro ba'i bsam pa byung ba dang du len par byed / /
column36: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692646#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007;TD4083E.TXT.r_1008# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column37: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni SDOM PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS DANG  dge ba chos sdud PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS DAG GIS gzhan LA PHAN PA DON DU gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column38: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column39: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693455#693455#TD4083E.TXT.r_1101# de'i gzhung mngon par shes par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyi rol  gyi bstan bcos dag la brtson par byed pa ni 'das ma thag pa lta bu yin pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column40: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694473#694473#TD4083E.TXT.r_1203;TD4083E.TXT.r_1204# byang chub sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis yang DAG PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS DANG  thos pa dang  gtong ba la sogs pa yang dag pa'i yon tan rjod par mi byed cing yang dag pa'i bsngags pa  mi brjod pa dang  legs par smras ba la legs so zhes bya ba ma byin na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin no // /

column3: tshig 'di rnams kyis kyang tshig dang po rab tu dbye bar rig par bya'o // / +sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ba la phan pa dang   bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i tshig 'di ni las bcu drug gis rab tu dbye bar rig par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691035#691046#TD4083E.TXT.r_831;TD4083E.TXT.r_832# byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi khyim dang gtsug lag khang ngam / /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691047#691058#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694089#694092#TD4083E.TXT.r_1166;TD4083E.TXT.r_1167# sems can dag mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyis rig pa ston par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694412#694413#TD4083E.TXT.r_1197;TD4083E.TXT.r_1198# byang chub  sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column8: 0.013#TD4036E.TXT.r#14787#14789#TD4036E.TXT.r_2191;TD4036E.TXT.r_2192;TD4036E.TXT.r_2193# khyim gzhan nam / / +gtsug lag khang ngam / / +gtsug lag khang gzhan nas phyir ldog pa'o // /
column9: 0.013#TD4036E.TXT.r#14765#14767#TD4036E.TXT.r_2185;TD4036E.TXT.r_2186;TD4036E.TXT.r_2187# khyim gzhan nam / / +gtsug lag khang ngam / / +gtsug lag khang gzhan du phar 'gro ba'o // /
column10: 0.018#TD4083E.TXT.r#691210#691213#TD4083E.TXT.r_844;TD4083E.TXT.r_845# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.018#TD4083E.TXT.r#694282#694285#TD4083E.TXT.r_1186;TD4083E.TXT.r_1187# byang chub sems dpa' sems can phongs pa rnams zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis zas dang  skom la sogs pa sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column12: 0.024#TD4011E.TXT.r#353040#353040#TD4011E.TXT.r_527# smyon pa bzhin du gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang dang   grong nas grong dang  srang nas srang du rgyu zhing skye bo thams cad kyi mdun du bdag bcom mo // /
column13: 0.024#TD4014E.TXT.r#439863#439863#TD4014E.TXT.r_559# dge slong zhig mi tshangs par spyod pa dang  mi gsod pa'i phas pham pa gnyis byung ba dang  phyis mi dga' zhing yid gdungs nas myos pa bzhin du gtsug  lag khang nas gtsug lag khang dang  grong nas grong dang  lam po che la sogs par 'gro na yang / /
column14: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694241#694241#TD4083E.TXT.r_1181;TD4083E.TXT.r_1182# byang chub sems dpa' nye du dang longs spyod las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing mya ngan byung ba rnams la kun nas  mnar sems kyi sems kyis mya ngan bsang bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /

column3: de la las bcu drug ni gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sbyor ba'i las dang  phyin ci log med pa'i las dang  gzhan gyis byed du ma bcug par bdag nyid sbyor ba'i las dang  mi 'khrugs     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#690903#690904#TD4083E.TXT.r_816;TD4083E.TXT.r_817# khong  khro ba la sogs pas gus par mi byed cing stan las mi ldang la stan mi stobs na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691065#691073#TD4083E.TXT.r_833;TD4083E.TXT.r_834# le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // / +na ste mi nus pa dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa dang bsod snyoms pa yin pa dang  sngar gzhan  la khas blangs pa dang  tho 'tshams pa'i bsam pas ma bos pa dang  yul thag ring ba dang  lam na 'jigs pa dang bcas pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' de don du gnyer ba ma yin te brdzun pa dang  rgyun ma chad par dge ba'i phyogs la brtson pa la rgyu des bar chad  du 'gyur ba dang  sngon ma thos pa'i don dang ldan pa'i chos kyi don la sogs pa mnyan pa las nyams par 'gyur bar mthong ba dang  dge 'dun gyi nang khrims srung ba dang  gzhan gyi sems srung ba rnams la ni nyes pa med do // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691145#691147#TD4083E.TXT.r_839;TD4083E.TXT.r_840# byang chub sems dpa'  pha rol gyi gser la sogs pa bstabs pa nang rgyal la sogs pas len par mi byed na sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691211#691213#TD4083E.TXT.r_844;TD4083E.TXT.r_845# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691380#691381#TD4083E.TXT.r_861;TD4083E.TXT.r_862# ma dad pa dang ma gus pas mi slob pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column9: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693731#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column10: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694048#694051#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694239#694241#TD4083E.TXT.r_1181;TD4083E.TXT.r_1182# byang chub sems dpa' nye du dang longs spyod las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing mya ngan byung ba rnams la kun nas  mnar sems kyi sems kyis mya ngan bsang bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column12: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694281#694285#TD4083E.TXT.r_1186;TD4083E.TXT.r_1187# byang chub sems dpa' sems can phongs pa rnams zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis zas dang  skom la sogs pa sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column14: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691470#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column15: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692817#692817#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030# kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column16: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693915#693917#TD4083E.TXT.r_1145;TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147# nga rgyal gyi grogs byed du mi 'gro na / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column17: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693990#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column18: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694473#694473#TD4083E.TXT.r_1203;TD4083E.TXT.r_1204# byang chub sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis yang dag pa'i tshul khrims dang  thos pa dang  gtong ba la sogs pa yang dag pa'i yon tan rjod par mi byed cing yang dag pa'i bsngags pa  mi brjod pa dang  legs par smras ba la legs so zhes bya ba ma byin na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin no // /

column3: ba'i las dang  zang zing dang ma 'dres pa dang  phan 'dogs pa dang  gnod pa byed pa la rjes su chags pa dang  khong khro ba med pa dang  tshe rabs gzhan du yang rjes su 'jug pa dang  tshig gsum gyis zang zing med pa'i las dang  tshig gnyis kyis de  dang mthun pa'i ngag dang  lus kyi las dang  bde ba dang  sdug bsngal gnyis su med par mnyam pa nyid kyi las dang  mi zhum pa'i las dang  mi bzlog pa'i las dang  thabs yongs su 'dzin pa'i las dang  tshig gnyis kyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs las 'dun pa bzlog pa'i  las dang  rgyun mi 'chad par de yid la byed pa'i las dang  pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par sbyor ba dang  bsdu ba'i dngos po la sbyor ba dang  tshig bdun gyis khyad par du 'gro ba'i las dang  skyes bu dam pa la brten pa dang  dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang  dgon pa la gnas pa  dang ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691074#691087#TD4083E.TXT.r_834# na ste mi nus pa dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa dang bsod snyoms pa yin pa dang  sngar gzhan  la khas blangs pa dang  tho 'tshams pa'i bsam pas ma bos pa dang  yul thag ring ba dang  lam na 'jigs pa dang bcas pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' de don du gnyer ba ma yin te brdzun pa dang  RGYUN MA CHAD PAR DGE ba'i phyogs la brtson pa la rgyu des bar chad  du 'gyur ba dang  sngon ma thos pa'i don dang ldan pa'i chos kyi don la sogs pa mnyan pa las nyams par 'gyur bar mthong ba dang  dge 'dun gyi nang khrims srung ba dang  gzhan gyi sems srung ba rnams la ni nyes pa med do // /

column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691104#691120#TD4083E.TXT.r_834;TD4083E.TXT.r_835;TD4083E.TXT.r_836;TD4083E.TXT.r_837# na ste mi nus pa dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa dang bsod snyoms pa yin pa dang  sngar gzhan  la khas blangs pa dang  tho 'tshams pa'i bsam pas ma bos pa dang  yul thag ring ba dang  lam na 'jigs pa dang bcas pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' de don du gnyer ba ma yin te brdzun pa dang  RGYUN MA CHAD PAR DGE ba'i phyogs la brtson pa la rgyu des bar chad  du 'gyur ba dang  sngon ma thos pa'i don dang ldan pa'i chos kyi don la sogs pa mnyan pa las nyams par 'gyur bar mthong ba dang  dge 'dun gyi nang khrims srung ba dang  gzhan gyi sems srung ba rnams la ni nyes pa med do // / +gser la sogs pa zhes bya ba la / /
column8: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691121#691129#TD4083E.TXT.r_837;TD4083E.TXT.r_838;TD4083E.TXT.r_839# len par mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi bsod nams kyi grogs su 'gro ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos te / /
column9: 0.010#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692273#TD4083E.TXT.r_963;TD4083E.TXT.r_964# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.019#TD4047E.TXT.r#1179674#1179675#TD4047E.TXT.r_8412;TD4047E.TXT.r_8413# pha  ROL TU PHYIN PA BSDUS pa'i bsod NAMS YONGS SU 'DZIN PA'I phyir bzhi pa'o // /
column11: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693203#693203#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len PA LAS NYAMS PA DANG  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.024#TD4044E.TXT.r#382401#382401#TD4044E.TXT.r_187;TD4044E.TXT.r_188# rang bzhin gyis kyang bsod nams la dga' ba yin zhes bya ba'i bar du'o // / +sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi dbang du byas nas bshad pa / /
column13: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#690825#690826#TD4083E.TXT.r_809# sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis shin tu bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las rnyed pa dang  bkur sti dang du mi len cing 'dod pa chung ba dang  chog shes pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#691347#691347#TD4083E.TXT.r_859# mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LAS nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LAS nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693832#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693973#693975#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.025#TD4061E.TXT.r#1529752#1529752#TD4061E.TXT.r_2347;TD4061E.TXT.r_2348# rang gi las la 'tsho ba log par ma yin pas legs par sbyor ba'i phyir bya ba byed pa'o // / +sbyin pa dang tshul khrims las  byung ba'i bsod nams bsgrub pa'i phyir bsod nams byed pa'o // /
column20: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693383#693383#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thos PA DANG BSAM PA LA mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column21: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693711#693711#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column22: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#691446#691446#TD4083E.TXT.r_869# gzhan gyi don lhur blang ba la bya ba chung ba ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column23: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694305#694305#TD4083E.TXT.r_1190# 'khor rnams kyi don mi byed pa ni chos  dang zang zing gis bsdus pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column24: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694534#694534#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /
column25: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694632#694632#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs pa la sogs pa mi byed pa ni bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: rnam par rtog pa bzang po ma yin pa yongs su spong ba dang  gnyis kyis yid la byed pa'i yon tan dang  gnyis kyis grogs kyi yon tan dang  tshig drug gis grub par sbyor ba'i las dang  tshad med pa yongs su dag pa dang  mthu thob pa dang  rtogs pa'i yon tan dang   tshig gsum gyis grub pa'i las dang  tshogs yongs su sdud pa'i yon tan dang  the tshom med par 'doms shing rjes su ston pa dang  gcig ni chos dang zang zing gis sdud pa dang  sems kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang  tshig bzhis des 'jog pa'i las dang  tshig  'di rnams kyis tshig dang po rab tu dbye bar rig par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691130#691146#TD4083E.TXT.r_838;TD4083E.TXT.r_839;TD4083E.TXT.r_840# yang dag par len pa ni grogs khyad par can yin pa'i phyir ro // / +byang chub sems dpa'  pha rol gyi gser la sogs pa bstabs pa nang rgyal la sogs pas len par mi byed na sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691154#691167#TD4083E.TXT.r_841# de blangs pas bdag nyid chags par 'gyur bar  mthong ba dang  sbyin pa 'khrul du dogs pa dang  'gyod par 'gyur bar dogs pa dang  de dbul zhing phongs par 'gyur bar dogs pa dang  sbyin pa'i dngos po de dge 'dun nam mchod rten gyi yin du dogs pa dang  gzhan la mi rigs par 'phrog pa yin du dogs pa dang  rgyu des    de la gnod par 'gyur ba zhig na nyes pa med do // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691167#691181#TD4083E.TXT.r_841;TD4083E.TXT.r_842;TD4083E.TXT.r_843# de blangs pas bdag nyid chags par 'gyur bar  mthong ba dang  sbyin pa 'khrul du dogs pa dang  'gyod par 'gyur bar dogs pa dang  de dbul zhing phongs par 'gyur bar dogs pa dang  sbyin pa'i dngos po de dge 'dun nam mchod rten gyi yin du dogs pa dang  gzhan la mi rigs par 'phrog pa yin du dogs pa dang  rgyu des    de la gnod par 'gyur ba zhig na nyes pa med do // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691467#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par GYUR NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692815#692817#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030# kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693915#693917#TD4083E.TXT.r_1145;TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147# nga rgyal gyi grogs byed du mi 'gro na / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column10: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693990#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column11: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694337#694339#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192# byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyi chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don gyi mi byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column12: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342147#1342151#TD4037E.TXT.r_3569;TD4037E.TXT.r_3570;TD4037E.TXT.r_3571# nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal  ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column13: 0.017#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809385#1809389#TD4082E.TXT.r_306;TD4082E.TXT.r_307;TD4082E.TXT.r_308# khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas len du mi btub cing spong bar byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +sems can  yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column14: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#694654#694657#TD4083E.TXT.r_1219# sems can skrag par bya bar rigs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du mas skrag par mi byed pa dang  sems can 'dun par bya ba'i rigs pa rnams 'dun par mi byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column15: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#694569#694569#TD4083E.TXT.r_1212;TD4083E.TXT.r_1213# skrod par mi byed na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column16: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column17: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#694050#694051#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column18: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#692285#692285#TD4083E.TXT.r_964# byang chub sems dpa' log pas 'tsho bar byed pa'i chos byung ba rnams dang du len cing mi 'dzem la sel bar mi byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: dang po'i tshig ni nyer bzung nas // / +tshig dbye yon tan rjes su 'gro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691180#691196#TD4083E.TXT.r_841;TD4083E.TXT.r_842;TD4083E.TXT.r_843;TD4083E.TXT.r_844# de blangs pas bdag nyid chags par 'gyur bar  mthong ba dang  sbyin pa 'khrul du dogs pa dang  'gyod par 'gyur bar dogs pa dang  de dbul zhing phongs par 'gyur bar dogs pa dang  sbyin pa'i dngos po de dge 'dun nam mchod rten gyi yin du dogs pa dang  gzhan la mi rigs par 'phrog pa yin du dogs pa dang  rgyu des    de la gnod par 'gyur ba zhig na nyes pa med do // / +chos 'dod pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691286#TD4083E.TXT.r_852;TD4083E.TXT.r_853# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691344#691349#TD4083E.TXT.r_859;TD4083E.TXT.r_858;TD4083E.TXT.r_860# mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 1.788#TD4083E.TXT.r#693030#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#694262#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693082#693083#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061;TD4083E.TXT.r_1062# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692645#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007;TD4083E.TXT.r_1008# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693896#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143;TD4083E.TXT.r_1144# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693832#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693975#693975#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column20: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694131#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: tha dad don gyis tha dad tshig // / +ces ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o // /

column12: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344750#1344751#TD4037E.TXT.r_3950;TD4037E.TXT.r_3951# nyon mongs  pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los mi byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
