column24: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#693407#693407#TD4083E.TXT.r_1095# bar mi byed par de thams cad du yal bar bor nas nyan thos kyi sde snod nyid la brtson par sbyor zhing goms par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column25: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#692567#692569#TD4083E.TXT.r_999# byang chub    sems dpa' bdag gi tshig mi btsun par 'gyur ba'i gtam ngan pa bden pa'i dngos po sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column26: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#691208#691208#TD4083E.TXT.r_844# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column27: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#692952#692952#TD4083E.TXT.r_1043;TD4083E.TXT.r_1044# 'dzin par byed rjes su 'jug par byed na  nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +de spang bar 'dod kyang zil gyis non pas mngon du rgyu ba la ni nyes pa med do // /
column28: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#693229#693229#TD4083E.TXT.r_1076;TD4083E.TXT.r_1077# de rnams byung ba nyams su myong bar byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +de spang bar 'dod kyang nyon mongs pa drag pos zil gyis non te kun du spyod na nyes pa med do // /
column29: 0.028#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810481#1810481#TD4082E.TXT.r_437;TD4082E.TXT.r_438# byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa dang  kha gsag dang  gzhogs slong dang  thob kyis 'jal ba dang  rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa log pas 'tsho bar byed pa'i chos byung ba  rnams dang du len cing / / +de dag gis mi 'dzem la sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / /

column3: blo dang ldan pas gnyis po med rtogs  nas ;; / +de dang mi ldan chos kyi dbyings la gnas // /
rtogs med shes stobs mnyam pa'i rjes song bas // / +blo dang ldan pas kun nas rtag par yang // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692299#692309#TD4083E.TXT.r_965;TD4083E.TXT.r_966;TD4083E.TXT.r_967;TD4083E.TXT.r_968# de bsal ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed kyang des slar zil gyis mnan pas kun du spyad pa la ni nyes pa med do // / +'phyar gnas zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la / /

column3: de'i gnas thibs po nyes par bsags pa sel // / +rtsi sman chen pos dug ni sel ba bzhin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692310#692320#TD4083E.TXT.r_968;TD4083E.TXT.r_969# stsogs pa'i sgras ni kun du rtse ba dang kun du ca co 'don pa dag bsdu'o // /

column3: thub pas gsungs pa'i legs chos legs  bzhag pa // / +rtsa ba chos dbyings bcas la des blo bzhag / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692321#692334#TD4083E.TXT.r_969;TD4083E.TXT.r_970# rgod pa ste rnam par ma zhi ba'i sems kyis rab tu rgod pa la sogs pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rgod pa ma yin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693565#693569#TD4083E.TXT.r_1110;TD4083E.TXT.r_1111# theg pa chen po dang ldan pa gang la la zhig zab pa'i gnas dag spong ba ni 'das ma thag pa lta bu dang  lta ba ngan pa spong ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693662#693666#TD4083E.TXT.r_1120;TD4083E.TXT.r_1121# bdag la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i rgyu'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.021#TD4025E.TXT.r#2170824#2170825#TD4025E.TXT.r_705# gang gi gnyen por byang  chub sems dpa' rnams theg pa chen po'i chos la mos pa sgom pa theg pa chen po'i chos la sdang ba 'dod chen pa rnams kyi sgrib pa dang  gang gi gnyen por byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa chos rnams la bdag tu lta ba gzhan mu stegs can rnams kyi sgrib pa  dang  gang gi gnyen por byang chub sems dpa' rnams nam mkha' mdzod la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa 'khor ba la sdug bsngal bar rab tu shes shing sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs pa nyan thos kyi theg pa rnams kyi sgrib pa dang  gang gi gnyen por byang chub sems dpa' rnams  snying rje chen po sgom pa sems can gyi don la rgyab kyis phyogs shing sems can gyi don la mi ltos pa nyid rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sgrib pa ste / /
column8: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694027#694027#TD4083E.TXT.r_1159;TD4083E.TXT.r_1160# gzhan sdug bsngal rnams ji skad bstan pas sdug bsngal sel bar mi byed pa ni gzhan gyi sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694398#694398#TD4083E.TXT.r_1196;TD4083E.TXT.r_1197# gzhan gyi blo dang mthun par mi 'jug pa ni gzhan gyi blo dang mthun par 'jug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub  sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: dran rgyud ni rtog pa tsam shes nas // / +yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol brtan myur 'gro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692333#692344#TD4083E.TXT.r_970;TD4083E.TXT.r_971# byang  chub sems dpa' rgod pas gzhan dag rgod du gzhug par 'dod cing / /

column3: de ltar shes bya'i mtshan nyid la 'jug par bstan pa la / / +de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan pa ji ltar blta zhe na / /

column27: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694655#694655#TD4083E.TXT.r_1219# sems can skrag par bya bar rigs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du mas skrag par mi byed pa dang  sems can 'dun par bya ba'i rigs pa rnams 'dun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column28: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693475#693475#TD4083E.TXT.r_1102;TD4083E.TXT.r_1103# byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod nyid med kyang sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin yod bzhin du phyi rol gyi bstan bcos te mu stegs can gyi bstan bcos  la brtson par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +shin tu yid gzhungs pa dang ldob skyen pa dang  yun ring por yang yid mi brjed pa dang  don sems pa dang rtog par byed nus pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab la rigs pas nye bar rtogs pa dang ldan pas blo mi 'gyur ba  dang ldan zhing nyin gcig bzhin du ches lhag par sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab la brtson par byed pa yin na nyes pa med do // /
column29: 0.023#TD4036E.TXT.r#36791#36791#TD4036E.TXT.r_5535;TD4036E.TXT.r_5536;TD4036E.TXT.r_5537# de yang spro ba skyed par byed / / +sems kyis smon par byed cing / / +de shas cher gnas par 'dod  pa dang  mi brjed par 'dod pa dang  bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa la nye bar gnas pa yin te / /

column3: sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims dang   bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang drug gis 'jug go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692357#692367#TD4083E.TXT.r_972;TD4083E.TXT.r_973;TD4083E.TXT.r_974;TD4083E.TXT.r_975# rnam pa sna tshogs pas smra bar byed 'dod na nyon mongs pa can gyi ltung bar 'gyur ro // / +brjed ngas pas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // / +de bsal  bar 'dod kyang zil gyis non pas kun du spyod pa ni nyes pa med do // /

column3: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par rig pa tsam nyid la ni ji ltar 'jug / / +ji ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag de la 'jug pa'i 'bras bu ci yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692365#692380#TD4083E.TXT.r_974;TD4083E.TXT.r_975# de bsal  bar 'dod kyang zil gyis non pas kun du spyod pa ni nyes pa med do // / +gzhan dag gis kun nas mnar sems sam mya ngan skyes pa bsal bar 'dod pa dang  rtsed mo la dga' ba'i rang bzhin can rnams bsdu ba dang  'dun par byed pa rnams kyi sems bsrung ba dang  rjes su 'brang ba rnams  mi dga' ba dang  kun nas mnar sems pa dang  rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur du dogs pa rnams bdag nyid la mngon du phyogs pa dang  bsam pa dag pas kun du smra ba la nyes pa med do // /

column3: 'di la byang chub  sems dpa' longs spyod rnams la kun tu ma chags pa / / +tshul khrims rnams la ltung ba med pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692379#692390#TD4083E.TXT.r_975;TD4083E.TXT.r_976# gzhan dag gis kun nas mnar sems sam mya ngan skyes pa bsal bar 'dod pa dang  rtsed mo la dga' ba'i rang bzhin can rnams bsdu ba dang  'dun par byed pa rnams kyi sems bsrung ba dang  rjes su 'brang ba rnams  mi dga' ba dang  kun nas mnar sems pa dang  rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur du dogs pa rnams bdag nyid la mngon du phyogs pa dang  bsam pa dag pas kun du smra ba la nyes pa med do // /

column3: sdug bsngal rnams la 'khrug pa med pa / / +bsgom pa la le lo med pa / / +rnam par gyeng ba'i rgyu 'di dag la mi 'jug pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692389#692399#TD4083E.TXT.r_975;TD4083E.TXT.r_976;TD4083E.TXT.r_977;TD4083E.TXT.r_978# gzhan dag gis kun nas mnar sems sam mya ngan skyes pa bsal bar 'dod pa dang  rtsed mo la dga' ba'i rang bzhin can rnams bsdu ba dang  'dun par byed pa rnams kyi sems bsrung ba dang  rjes su 'brang ba rnams  mi dga' ba dang  kun nas mnar sems pa dang  rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur du dogs pa rnams bdag nyid la mngon du phyogs pa dang  bsam pa dag pas kun du smra ba la nyes pa med do // /

column3: sems rtse gcig tu byas nas / / +tshul bzhin du chos rnams  la rab tu rnam par 'byed cing / /
column4: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692644#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#692729#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#692790#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691195#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column8: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#693713#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#694261#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#694535#694536#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /
column12: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#693081#693082#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693204#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693831#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693974#693975#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#694130#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column20: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#694306#694307#TD4083E.TXT.r_1190# 'khor rnams kyi don mi byed pa ni chos  dang zang zing gis bsdus pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column21: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#694633#694633#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs pa la sogs pa mi byed pa ni bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column22: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693261#693261#TD4083E.TXT.r_1079# bsam gtan gyi bde ba nyams  su myong bar byed cing de la yon tan du lta ba ni dge ba chos dang sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro myang ba dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column23: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#693137#693137#TD4083E.TXT.r_1067# ting nge 'dzin gyi don mi tshol ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon  par bsgrub pa la brtson pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column24: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#694448#694448#TD4083E.TXT.r_1202# gzhan dag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa smra bar mi byed pa ni yon tan  gyi bsngags pa smra ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brten nas rnam par rig pa tsam nyid la 'jug go // / +rnam par rig pa tsam nyid la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pas yongs su zin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag 'thob ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692416#692424#TD4083E.TXT.r_979;TD4083E.TXT.r_980;TD4083E.TXT.r_981;TD4083E.TXT.r_982# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' GANG zhig BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' NI MYA ngan las 'das par mngon par dga' bas  gnas par mi bya'i // / +mya ngan las 'das pa la rgyab kyis phyogs te gnas par bya'o // /
column5: 5.960#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343325#1343335#TD4037E.TXT.r_3731;TD4037E.TXT.r_3732;TD4037E.TXT.r_3733;TD4037E.TXT.r_3734# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' GANG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' NI MYA ngan las 'das pa la mngon par  dga' bas gnas par mi bya'i / / +mya ngan las 'das pa la rgyab kyas phyogs te gnas par bya'o // /
column6: 0.016#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810634#1810641#TD4082E.TXT.r_455;TD4082E.TXT.r_456;TD4082E.TXT.r_457;TD4082E.TXT.r_458# mya ngan las 'das pa la rgyab kyis phyogs te gnas  par bya'o // / +nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kyang 'jigs par mi bya'o // / +de dag las sems kyang shin tu dben par mi bya ste / /

column3: 'di ltar 'di'i pha rol tu  phyin pa drug la kun tu spyod pa'i sbyor ba med kyang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692425#692433#TD4083E.TXT.r_981;TD4083E.TXT.r_982;TD4083E.TXT.r_983# nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kyang 'jigs par mi bya'o // / +de dag la sems kyang shin tu dben par mi bya ste / /

column3: bstan pa la mos pa dang  ro myong ba dang  rjes su yi rang ba dang  mngon par dga' ba yid la byed pas kyang rtag par rgyun du rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul du pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343349#1343355#TD4037E.TXT.r_3735;TD4037E.TXT.r_3736# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal    pa grangs med pa gsum du 'khor ba na 'khor zhing / / +byang chub yang dag par bsgrub par bya dgos so snyam du de ltar lta zhing de skad smra na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810649#1810654#TD4082E.TXT.r_458# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du 'khor ba na 'khor zhing byang chub yang dag par bsgrub par bya dgos  so snyam du de ltar lta zhing de skad smras na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692434#692447#TD4083E.TXT.r_983# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni bskal pa grangs  med pa gsum du 'khor ba na 'khor zhing byang chub yang dag par bsgrub par bya dgos so snyam du de ltar lta zhing de skad sma na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: 'dir tshigs su     // / +bcad pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' rnam dag gi / / +dkar po'i chos rnams kun rdzogs dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692448#692455#TD4083E.TXT.r_983;TD4083E.TXT.r_984# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni bskal pa grangs  med pa gsum du 'khor ba na 'khor zhing byang chub yang dag par bsgrub par bya dgos so snyam du de ltar lta zhing de skad sma na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: bzod rnon thob dang rang gi theg / / +zab cing rgya che bstan pa la // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692456#692464#TD4083E.TXT.r_983;TD4083E.TXT.r_984;TD4083E.TXT.r_985# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni bskal pa grangs  med pa gsum du 'khor ba na 'khor zhing byang chub yang dag par bsgrub par bya dgos so snyam du de ltar lta zhing de skad sma na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +nyan thos kyang re zhig bdag gcig pu'i don du mya ngan las 'das pa la gcig tu mngon par dga' bar kun tu ston par  byed cing / /

column3: rtog pa tsam du rtogs pa'i phyir // / +mi rtog ye shes thob pa'i phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692465#692472#TD4083E.TXT.r_984;TD4083E.TXT.r_985;TD4083E.TXT.r_986# nyan thos kyang re zhig bdag gcig pu'i don du mya ngan las 'das pa la gcig tu mngon par dga' bar kun tu ston par  byed cing / / +nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams las kyang skyo bar byed pa yin na / /

column3: 'dod pa dang ni mos pa dag / / +dag  pa bsam pa dag pa nyid // / +snga logs su yang chos rgyun der // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692473#692480#TD4083E.TXT.r_986;TD4083E.TXT.r_987# gang byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir byung ba 'di lta smos kyang ci dgos / /

column3: sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong bas na // / +byang chub nye bar rtogs gyur nas // / +tshegs med par ni thob phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810716#1810721#TD4082E.TXT.r_465;TD4082E.TXT.r_466# byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa yin pa des de ltar sems kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa la goms par bya ba yang dag par bsgrub dgos te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692481#692491#TD4083E.TXT.r_987;TD4083E.TXT.r_988# 'dis de lta bu'i sems kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa la goms par bya ba yang dag par  bsgrub dgos te / /
column6: 0.015#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343413#1343421#TD4037E.TXT.r_3743;TD4037E.TXT.r_3744# des de ltar sems kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa la goms par bya  ba yang dag par bsgrub dgos te / /

column3: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis ni rnam pa brgyad kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa'i mtshan nyid mtha' dag yongs su  bstan pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692490#692499#TD4083E.TXT.r_988;TD4083E.TXT.r_989;TD4083E.TXT.r_990# de ni 'di ltar dgra bcom pa ma yin du zin kyang de las khyad par du kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang ldan pas zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po gcod pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.027#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810730#1810730#TD4082E.TXT.r_467# de las khyad  par du 'phags pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang ldan pas zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po la spyod pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: tshogs dang  bzod pa dang  dmigs pa dang  yid la byed pa dang  gnyen po dang rang gi mtshan nyid dang  rtags dang  phan yon gyis te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2521332#2521340#TD4020E.TXT.r_306;TD4020E.TXT.r_307;TD4020E.TXT.r_308# mgo la sems can khur chen khyer ba yi // / +sems can mchog ni dal  gyis 'gro mi mdzes // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#279952#279967#TD4026E.TXT.r_883;TD4026E.TXT.r_884;TD4026E.TXT.r_885;TD4026E.TXT.r_886# mgo la sems can khur chen khyer ba yi // / +sems can mchog ni dal gyis 'gro mi mdzes // /

column3: tshigs su bcad pa'i rtsa ba rnams dang go rims bzhin du sbyor bar rig par bya'o // / +de dag grangs dang de yi mtshan nyid dang / /
go  rims nges tshig goms byas yon tan dang / / +rab tu dbye dang bsdu dang mi mthun phyogs // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692517#692527#TD4083E.TXT.r_992;TD4083E.TXT.r_993;TD4083E.TXT.r_994;TD4083E.TXT.r_995;TD4083E.TXT.r_996# bdag gzhan sna tshogs 'ching bas rab bcings pa // / +brtson pa brgya 'gyur du ni bya ba'i rigs // /

column3: yon tan phan tshun rnam nges shes par bya // / +ci'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug kho na zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692528#692539#TD4083E.TXT.r_995;TD4083E.TXT.r_996;TD4083E.TXT.r_997;TD4083E.TXT.r_998# grags pa ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +grags pa ma yin pa ni bsngags pa ma yin bsgrogs pa'o // /

column3: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang  gnyen po rnam par gzhag pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag  par 'grub pa'i gzhi'i gnas dang  sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang mthun pas drug nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692540#692552#TD4083E.TXT.r_998# rjes su  'dzin pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi dran pa dang shes bzhin du spyod pa las nyams pa dang  bdag gi 'khrul pa rnams yongs su shes shing nges par mthong ba dang  nges par bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: mi 'phags pa'i rgyu'i gnyen por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang  tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste / / +mi 'phags pa'i rgyu ni longs spyod la chags pa dang  khyim la  chags pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692553#692566#TD4083E.TXT.r_998;TD4083E.TXT.r_999# rjes su  'dzin pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi dran pa dang shes bzhin du spyod pa las nyams pa dang  bdag gi 'khrul pa rnams yongs su shes shing nges par mthong ba dang  nges par bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub    sems dpa' bdag gi tshig mi btsun par 'gyur ba'i gtam ngan pa bden pa'i dngos po sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: spangs pa ldog pa'i rgyu'i gnyen por bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang  brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste / /

column5: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343453#1343454#TD4037E.TXT.r_3745;TD4037E.TXT.r_3746;TD4037E.TXT.r_3747# byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi tshig mi btsan par  'gyur ba'i dri ngas dang  mi snyan pa dang  gtam ngan par 'gyur ba bden pa'i dngos po mi srung zhing spel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.016#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810760#1810761#TD4082E.TXT.r_469;TD4082E.TXT.r_470;TD4082E.TXT.r_471# byang chub sems dpas bdag gi tshig mi btsun par 'gyur ba'i dri ngas dang  mi snyan pa dang  gtam ngan par 'gyur ba bden pa'i dngos  po mi srung zhing sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#694655#694655#TD4083E.TXT.r_1219# sems can skrag par bya bar rigs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du mas skrag par mi byed pa dang  sems can 'dun par bya ba'i rigs pa rnams 'dun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.022#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342151#1342151#TD4037E.TXT.r_3570;TD4037E.TXT.r_3571# sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los len par mi byed na / /
column9: 0.022#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809389#1809389#TD4082E.TXT.r_307;TD4082E.TXT.r_308# sems can  yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los len par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column10: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#692285#692285#TD4083E.TXT.r_964# byang chub sems dpa' log pas 'tsho bar byed pa'i chos byung ba rnams dang du len cing mi 'dzem la sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.025#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344552#1344555#TD4037E.TXT.r_3923;TD4037E.TXT.r_3924;TD4037E.TXT.r_3925;TD4037E.TXT.r_3926# byang chub sems dpa' nad pa nad kyis thebs pa dang phrad pa na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan  pas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column12: 0.025#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344667#1344669#TD4037E.TXT.r_3938;TD4037E.TXT.r_3939;TD4037E.TXT.r_3940# kun  nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas rigs pa dang tshul bzhin ston par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi byed na    nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column13: 0.025#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344751#1344751#TD4037E.TXT.r_3950;TD4037E.TXT.r_3951# nyon mongs  pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los mi byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column14: 0.025#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344800#1344802#TD4037E.TXT.r_3956;TD4037E.TXT.r_3957;TD4037E.TXT.r_3958# byang chub sems dpa' sems can nye du dang longs spyod las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan byung ba kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pas sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur  te ; / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sel bar mi byed na / /
column15: 0.025#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811955#1811958#TD4082E.TXT.r_630;TD4082E.TXT.r_631;TD4082E.TXT.r_632# byang chub sems dpa' nad pa nad kyis thebs pa dang phrad pa na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems  dang ldan pas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column16: 0.025#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812067#1812069#TD4082E.TXT.r_646;TD4082E.TXT.r_647;TD4082E.TXT.r_648# byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma'i don la tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa dag  mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas rigs pa dang  tshul bzhin ston par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi  byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column17: 0.025#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812205#1812207#TD4082E.TXT.r_667;TD4082E.TXT.r_668;TD4082E.TXT.r_669# byang chub sems dpa' sems can nye du dang  longs spyod las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan byung ba kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pas sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal  ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column18: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342239#1342239#TD4037E.TXT.r_3591;TD4037E.TXT.r_3592;TD4037E.TXT.r_3593# nyes pa dang bcas  shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column19: 0.027#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809483#1809483#TD4082E.TXT.r_326;TD4082E.TXT.r_327;TD4082E.TXT.r_328# chos sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column20: 0.027#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812148#1812148#TD4082E.TXT.r_660;TD4082E.TXT.r_661# nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur  te ; / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column21: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#691208#691208#TD4083E.TXT.r_844# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column22: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#693474#693474#TD4083E.TXT.r_1102# byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod nyid med kyang sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin yod bzhin du phyi rol gyi bstan bcos te mu stegs can gyi bstan bcos  la brtson par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column23: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#692951#692951#TD4083E.TXT.r_1043# 'dzin par byed rjes su 'jug par byed na  nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column24: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#693228#693228#TD4083E.TXT.r_1076# de rnams byung ba nyams su myong bar byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: ldog pa'i rgyu ni 'khor ba'i sems can log par sgrub pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal dang  yun ring por dkar po'i phyogs la sbyor bas yongs su skyo ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692580#692587#TD4083E.TXT.r_1000;TD4083E.TXT.r_1001;TD4083E.TXT.r_1002# bden pa'i dngos po ma yin pa sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // / +rab tu byung ba dang  slong mo spyod pa'i rgyus mi snyan par  brjod pa dang  gzhan mu stegs can mngon par zhen pa'am // /

column3: spangs nas mi ldog pa'i chud za ba'i rgyu'i gnyen por bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343492#1343493#TD4037E.TXT.r_3751;TD4037E.TXT.r_3752# rab tu byung ba dang  slong mo spyod pa dang  dge ba spyod pa'i  gzhis mi snyan par brjod na nyes pa med do // / +khro bas zil gyis non cing sems phyin ci log tu gyur pas brjod na nyes pa med do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692586#692597#TD4083E.TXT.r_1001;TD4083E.TXT.r_1002;TD4083E.TXT.r_1003# rab tu byung ba dang  slong mo spyod pa'i rgyus mi snyan par  brjod pa dang  gzhan mu stegs can mngon par zhen pa'am // / +khro bas zil gyis non cing sems phyin ci log tu gyur pas mi snyan par brjod na nyes pa med do // /

column3: chud za ba'i rgyu ni rnam par gyeng ba dang 'chal ba'i shes rab bo // / +de ltar mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen pos grangs rnam par gzhag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692596#692609#TD4083E.TXT.r_1002;TD4083E.TXT.r_1003;TD4083E.TXT.r_1004;TD4083E.TXT.r_1005# khro bas zil gyis non cing sems phyin ci log tu gyur pas mi snyan par brjod na nyes pa med do // / +nyon mongs pa bcas kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /

column3: rnam par mi gyeng    ba'i rgyu la pha rol tu phyin pa bzhis pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi gyeng ba gcig 'grub bo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692607#692617#TD4083E.TXT.r_1004;TD4083E.TXT.r_1005;TD4083E.TXT.r_1006;TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa ni drag po'i sbyor ba'o // / +de 'ba' zhig  gis ma yin gyi 'jam pa'i sbyor bas kyang zhes bya ba ni kyang gi sgra'i don to // /
column5: 0.015#TD4047E.TXT.r#1136443#1136444#TD4047E.TXT.r_2193;TD4047E.TXT.r_2194;TD4047E.TXT.r_2195# phyin ci log tu byed mi nus zhes bya ba'i don to // / +zlog par mi byed pa ni ma gus pas mi byed pa'o // / +log par mi byed pa ni 'dren par mi byed pa ste / /
column6: 0.016#TD4047E.TXT.r#1154689#1154689#TD4047E.TXT.r_4936# chos nges par sems pa la mngon par dga' bas zhes bya ba ni ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don rigs pa rnam pa bzhis nges par rtog par  byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.021#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1476480#1476482#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8899# snang ba ni gsal bar bya ba'i don gsal bar byas nas yang gsal bar mi byed pa ma yin te / /
column8: 0.023#TD4035E.TXT.r#152883#152884#TD4035E.TXT.r_4888;TD4035E.TXT.r_4889# brnyas shing nyan pa na ston pas na dus ma yin pa'o // / +snga ma dang phyi ma'i don 'brel pa med pas  na ma 'brel pa'o // /
column9: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1157323#1157326#TD4047E.TXT.r_5321# de dag gis ni don rnam pa gsum dang ldan par bde bar zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don bstan par byed de / /
column10: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2349632#2349634#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4466;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4467# ji ltar rigs pa yongs su tshol bar byed ce na / / +rigs pa bzhi po ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pas bsgrub pa'i  rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pa ste / /
column11: 0.026#TD4018E.TXT.r#3058044#3058045#TD4018E.TXT.r_6993# pa'i sems kyi rgyud gang la yang skye ba dang gnas pa dang  'gog pa la sogs pa kun rtog pa de la yang tha dad pa'i byed pa dang byed pa por 'brel bar mi rung bar thams cad mkhyen pas rigs pa bzhin gyis bsgrub par mdzad pa / /
column12: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#43137#43137#TD4036E.TXT.r_6527;TD4036E.TXT.r_6528# ji ltar rigs pa yongs su tshol bar byed ce na / / +rigs pa bzhi po ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pa  sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pa ste / /
column13: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922624#922624#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4111;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4112# de yang dper na sa dang po'i rigs pas rnam par dpyod pa'i sems pas / / +sa gnyis pa'i rigs pas rnam par dpyod pa'i sems shas che  bas na khyad zhugs pa yin te / /
column14: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694651#694651#TD4083E.TXT.r_1219# sems can skrag par bya bar rigs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du mas skrag par mi byed pa dang  sems can 'dun par bya ba'i rigs pa rnams 'dun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column15: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2368694#2368694#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6860# de la gsum du bsgyur ba ni snga ma'i yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po dang  yongs su shes par bya ba'i don dang  yongs su shes par byed pa 'di nyid la gsum du bsgyur ba zhes bya ste / /
column16: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473314#473314#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3116;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3117# 'di ltar thos nas mi brjed par 'dzin par byed do // / +don phyin ci ma log par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro // /
column17: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1198230#1198230#TD4047E.TXT.r_10944# byed 'dod pa'i sems kyis rab tu 'jug pa nyid la rab tu sbyor bar byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir gang ci yang rung ba'i rnam pas don de bsgrub par bya'o zhes nges par byed pa nyid ni byed 'dod pa nyid do // /
column18: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925180#925180#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4413;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4414# brtson 'grus de lta bu la brten nas byang chub sems  dpa' sems can mtha' yas pa rnams yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +da ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir ro // /
column19: 0.029#TD4046E.TXT.r#2198709#2198709#TD4046E.TXT.r_368# bar byed pa sngon du gtong ba'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i lan du phan 'dogs pa mnyam pa'am lhag pas nye bar gnas pas don byed do // /

column3: rnam par mi gyeng ba de la brten nas chos kyi de kho na ji lta ba bzhin du mngon du yang dag par rtogs pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692618#692627#TD4083E.TXT.r_1006;TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# 'chos par mi byed pa ni nyes par snang bar bya ba'i don to // / +rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub bo // / +de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par  'grub pa'i gzhi'i gnas kyis grangs drug tu rnam par gzhag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692628#692646#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007;TD4083E.TXT.r_1008# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#1333197#1333198#TD4037E.TXT.r_2382# rtag tu gus  par byed pa'i sbyor bas rgyun du sems par byed do // /

column3: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can la phan 'dod pa dang  tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can la gnod pa mi byed pa dang  bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gnod pa la ji mi snyam pa dang  brtson 'grus  kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bya bas byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692640#692652#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007;TD4083E.TXT.r_1008# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692652#692669#TD4083E.TXT.r_1008;TD4083E.TXT.r_1009;TD4083E.TXT.r_1010# byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba bsrung ba'i phyir 'jam pa dang drag pa'i thabs dag gis ston par mi byed  cing yal bar dor na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692729#692736#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016;TD4083E.TXT.r_1017;TD4083E.TXT.r_1018# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692793#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026;TD4083E.TXT.r_1024;TD4083E.TXT.r_1027# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692274#TD4083E.TXT.r_963;TD4083E.TXT.r_964# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#694131#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs PAR MI BYED PA LA rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs PAR MI BYED PA NI byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#693975#693976#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151;TD4083E.TXT.r_1152# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#693081#693083#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061;TD4083E.TXT.r_1062# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691196#TD4083E.TXT.r_843;TD4083E.TXT.r_844# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin PAR MI BYED PA NI dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis SBYIN PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LAS nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column15: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693035#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053;TD4083E.TXT.r_1054# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LAS nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#693832#693833#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135;TD4083E.TXT.r_1136# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694262#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin PAR MI BYED PA NI phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column20: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694536#694536#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /
column21: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693204#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column22: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column23: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693712#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column24: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693384#693385#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thos pa dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column25: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#694448#694449#TD4083E.TXT.r_1202# gzhan dag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa smra bar mi byed pa ni yon tan  gyi bsngags pa smra ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column26: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#691030#691030#TD4083E.TXT.r_830;TD4083E.TXT.r_831# gir mi byed pa ni 'das ma thag pa'i lta bu'i yin pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi khyim dang gtsug lag khang ngam / /
column27: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692940#692940#TD4083E.TXT.r_1041;TD4083E.TXT.r_1042# kun du 'dzin na 'das ma thag pa bzhin du nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la khro ba'i bsam pa byung ba dang du len par byed / /
column28: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693896#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143;TD4083E.TXT.r_1144# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column29: 0.029#TD4066E.TXT.r#2108255#2108255#TD4066E.TXT.r_875# byed par 'gyur ba lta ga la rung snyam pa dang  mi 'dod pa'i rnam par smin par 'gyur ba dang  gzhan la gnod par byed par zhugs pa'i phyir / /

column3: phan 'dogs pa'i rgyu 'di dag gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i las su rung bar 'gyur ro // /
de'i 'og tu sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang  sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir gdams  par bya ba rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692667#692680#TD4083E.TXT.r_1009;TD4083E.TXT.r_1010;TD4083E.TXT.r_1011# thabs drag po dag gis kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o // / +gal te de ltar don 'di dag bstan pas na 'di rnams yid mi bde ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung nyes par mi 'gyur ro // /

column3: de ltar sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang mthun pas grangs rnams par gzhag par blta'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692681#692689#TD4083E.TXT.r_1010;TD4083E.TXT.r_1011;TD4083E.TXT.r_1012# gal te de ltar don 'di dag bstan pas na 'di rnams yid mi bde ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung nyes par mi 'gyur ro // / +bstan pa'i don zab pa'i rgyus  yid mi bde ba chen por gyur na yang nyes pa med do // /

column3: 'o na 'di dag gi mtshan nyid ji ltar blta zhen // / +dam pa drug gis blta bar bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692690#692699#TD4083E.TXT.r_1011;TD4083E.TXT.r_1012;TD4083E.TXT.r_1013;TD4083E.TXT.r_1014# bstan pa'i don zab pa'i rgyus  yid mi bde ba chen por gyur na yang nyes pa med do // / +gshe la lan du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /

column3: gnas dam pa ni byang chub kyi sems gnas  yin pa'i phyir ro // / +dngos po dam pa ni mtha' dag kun tu spyod pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692697#692715#TD4083E.TXT.r_1013;TD4083E.TXT.r_1014;TD4083E.TXT.r_1015;TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gshe bar byed pa la slar gshe ba ni lan du gshe ba'o // / +stsogs pa'i sgra ni slar khro ba dang slar brdeg pa dang slar mchad 'dru ba dang rnam pa drug ste / /

column3: ched du bya ba dam pa ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i ched du bya ba'i phyir ro // /
thabs la mkhas pa dam pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su zin pa'i phyir ro // / +yongs su bsngo ba  dam pa ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692716#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1015;TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# slar gshe ba bzhin du slar khro ba  la sogs pa la yang rig par bya'o // / +gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro // / +rnam par dag pa dam pa ni / / +nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pas sgrib pa med par yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692275#TD4083E.TXT.r_963;TD4083E.TXT.r_964# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693035#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053;TD4083E.TXT.r_1054# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693975#693976#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151;TD4083E.TXT.r_1152# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691196#TD4083E.TXT.r_843;TD4083E.TXT.r_844# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column11: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#694131#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#693081#693083#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061;TD4083E.TXT.r_1062# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694262#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694536#694536#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /
column16: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693832#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693204#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column20: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693712#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column21: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693384#693385#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thos pa dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column22: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#691030#691030#TD4083E.TXT.r_830;TD4083E.TXT.r_831# gir mi byed pa ni 'das ma thag pa'i lta bu'i yin pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi khyim dang gtsug lag khang ngam / /
column23: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693894#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column24: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694448#694448#TD4083E.TXT.r_1202# gzhan dag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa smra bar mi byed pa ni yon tan  gyi bsngags pa smra ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: sbyin pa gang yin pa de pha rol tu phyin pa yang yin nam / / +pha  rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de sbyin pa yang yin nam zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692734#692752#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016;TD4083E.TXT.r_1017;TD4083E.TXT.r_1018;TD4083E.TXT.r_1019;TD4083E.TXT.r_1020;TD4083E.TXT.r_1021# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub sems dpa' la     // / +gzhan dag gshe ba dang  khro ba dang  brdegs pa dang  mtshang 'dru bar byed pa dag la khro bas zil gyis non pas slar brnyas par 'dod pas slar gshe bar byed / /
column5: 0.014#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2068139#2068143#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13037;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13038;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13039# rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'i mi phyir btang ba zhes bya ba ni rab tu 'byung ba ni rab tu 'byung ba'o // / +de 'dod pa ni rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'o // / +rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'i mi de slar btang ba ni rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'i mi  phyir btang ba'o // /
column6: 0.014#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2869505#2869506#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_192# gzhan gyis gnod pa byas kyang zhe sdang mi ldang zhing slar gnod par ma byas pa'i bzod PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PAS NI gyog phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te / /
column7: 0.017#TD4047E.TXT.r#1157373#1157373#TD4047E.TXT.r_5328;TD4047E.TXT.r_5329;TD4047E.TXT.r_5330# ji ltar rab tu bsngags pa'i gzugs ni gzugs mdzes pa yin pa ltar / / +rab tu bsngags pa'i mthar phyin par gyur pas na bde bar gshegs pa'o // / +slar mi ldog par gshegs pas na yang bde bar gshegs pa  ste ; /
column8: 0.025#TD4068E.TXT.r#575393#575393#TD4068E.TXT.r_616# yang na dngos po gang dang    phrad pa'i tshe ni 'bral bar mi 'dod la bral ba'i tshe ni slar phrad par 'dod pa skye ba de ni bde ba'i tshor ba'o // /
column9: 0.026#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2627828#2627828#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_11432;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_11433# rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa ni rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'o // / +rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'i mi de slar btang ba na ni rab tu 'byung par 'dod pa'i mi phyir  btang ba'o // /
column10: 0.028#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1726896#1726897#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3790;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3791# de bzhin du rgyas par khyi'i tshang du bskyur ba dang  de dag kyang de bzhin du srung ba dang phyug pos slar blangs pa'i bar du dang  chung mas smras pa / /
column11: 0.029#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1781333#1781333#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_10207# ming chen dge bsnyen gang srog gcod pa spong zhing srog gcod pa las slar ldog pa dang  ma byin par len pa spong zhing ma byin par len pa las slar ldog pa dang  'dod pas log par gyem ba spong zhing 'dod pas log par  gyem pa las slar ldog par byed na ming chen 'di tsam gyis na phal cher bslab pa'i dge bsnyen du 'gyur ro // /

column3: sbyin pa yin la / / +pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa yang yod ces bya ba mu bzhi'o // / +sbyin pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lhag ma rnams la yang mu bzhi ci rigs su blta bar bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692752#692761#TD4083E.TXT.r_1019;TD4083E.TXT.r_1020;TD4083E.TXT.r_1021;TD4083E.TXT.r_1022# slar khro bar byed / / +slar rdeg par byed / / +slar mtshang 'dru bar byed na / /
column5: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344748#1344748#TD4037E.TXT.r_3950# nyon mongs  pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gi go rims     // / +'di ci'i phyir bstan zhe na / / +pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma rnams de'i phyi ma 'byung ba dang mthun pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692760#692774#TD4083E.TXT.r_1021;TD4083E.TXT.r_1022;TD4083E.TXT.r_1023;TD4083E.TXT.r_1024# slar mtshang 'dru bar byed na / / +nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: 'di dag gi nges pa'i tshig ji ltar blta zhe na / / +'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba thams cad las phul du  byung bar pha rol tu 'gro ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692274#TD4083E.TXT.r_963;TD4083E.TXT.r_964# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column15: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694262#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694536#694536#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /
column18: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693894#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column20: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693832#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column21: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column22: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693712#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column23: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693384#693385#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thos pa dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column24: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#691030#691030#TD4083E.TXT.r_830;TD4083E.TXT.r_831# gir mi byed pa ni 'das ma thag pa'i lta bu'i yin pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi khyim dang gtsug lag khang ngam / /

column3: ser sna dang dbul ba 'joms pa dang  longs spyod chen po dang  bsod nams kyis tshogs thob par byed pas sbyin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810883#1810886#TD4082E.TXT.r_486# byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la nyes pa byas  sam nyes pa byas su dogs kyang rung ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692794#692802#TD4083E.TXT.r_1026;TD4083E.TXT.r_1027;TD4083E.TXT.r_1028;TD4083E.TXT.r_1029# nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la nyes pa byas sam / /
column6: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343562#1343563#TD4037E.TXT.r_3760;TD4037E.TXT.r_3761# byang chub sems dpas gzhan  dag la nyes par byas sam / / +nyes pa byas su dogs kyang rung ste / /

column3: 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang  ngan 'gro zhi bar byed pa dang  bde 'gro dang  ting nge 'dzin thob par byed pas tshul  khrims so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692803#692811#TD4083E.TXT.r_1028;TD4083E.TXT.r_1029# nyes pa byas su dogs kyang rung / / +kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.025#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343571#1343571#TD4037E.TXT.r_3762# kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  nga rgyal gyis non pas mthun par shad kyis byang bar mi byed de / /
column6: 0.025#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810894#1810894#TD4082E.TXT.r_487# kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  nga rgyal gyis non pas mthun par shad kyis byang bar mi byed cing de yal bar 'dor na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / /

column3: khro ba dang 'khon pa zad par byed pa dang  bdag dang gzhan dag la bde bar byed pas bzod pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344552#1344555#TD4037E.TXT.r_3923;TD4037E.TXT.r_3924;TD4037E.TXT.r_3925;TD4037E.TXT.r_3926# byang chub sems dpa' nad pa nad kyis thebs pa dang phrad pa na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan  pas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344667#1344668#TD4037E.TXT.r_3938;TD4037E.TXT.r_3939;TD4037E.TXT.r_3940# kun  nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas rigs pa dang tshul bzhin ston par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi byed na    nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344800#1344802#TD4037E.TXT.r_3956;TD4037E.TXT.r_3957;TD4037E.TXT.r_3958# byang chub sems dpa' sems can nye du dang longs spyod las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan byung ba kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pas sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur  te ; / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sel bar mi byed na / /
column7: 0.0#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811955#1811958#TD4082E.TXT.r_630;TD4082E.TXT.r_631;TD4082E.TXT.r_632# byang chub sems dpa' nad pa nad kyis thebs pa dang phrad pa na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems  dang ldan pas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.0#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812067#1812069#TD4082E.TXT.r_646;TD4082E.TXT.r_647;TD4082E.TXT.r_648# byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma'i don la tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa dag  mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas rigs pa dang  tshul bzhin ston par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi  byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.0#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812205#1812207#TD4082E.TXT.r_667;TD4082E.TXT.r_668;TD4082E.TXT.r_669# byang chub sems dpa' sems can nye du dang  longs spyod las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan byung ba kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pas sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal  ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691144#691147#TD4083E.TXT.r_839;TD4083E.TXT.r_840# byang chub sems dpa'  pha rol gyi gser la sogs pa bstabs pa nang rgyal la sogs pas len par mi byed na sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691210#691213#TD4083E.TXT.r_844;TD4083E.TXT.r_845# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column12: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691380#691381#TD4083E.TXT.r_861;TD4083E.TXT.r_862# ma dad pa dang ma gus pas mi slob pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column13: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691467#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column14: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692810#692829#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030;TD4083E.TXT.r_1031# kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column15: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692949#692952#TD4083E.TXT.r_1043;TD4083E.TXT.r_1041;TD4083E.TXT.r_1042;TD4083E.TXT.r_1044# 'dzin par byed rjes su 'jug par byed na  nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column16: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693915#693916#TD4083E.TXT.r_1145;TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147# nga rgyal gyi grogs byed du mi 'gro na / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column17: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693990#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column18: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694089#694092#TD4083E.TXT.r_1166;TD4083E.TXT.r_1167# sems can dag mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyis rig pa ston par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column19: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694239#694241#TD4083E.TXT.r_1181;TD4083E.TXT.r_1182# byang chub sems dpa' nye du dang longs spyod las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing mya ngan byung ba rnams la kun nas  mnar sems kyi sems kyis mya ngan bsang bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column20: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694282#694285#TD4083E.TXT.r_1186;TD4083E.TXT.r_1187# byang chub sems dpa' sems can phongs pa rnams zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis zas dang  skom la sogs pa sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column21: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694337#694344#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192;TD4083E.TXT.r_1193# byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyi chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don gyi mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column22: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694410#694412#TD4083E.TXT.r_1197;TD4083E.TXT.r_1198# byang chub  sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column23: 0.019#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812148#1812151#TD4082E.TXT.r_660;TD4082E.TXT.r_661;TD4082E.TXT.r_662# nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur  te ; / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column24: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#690903#690903#TD4083E.TXT.r_816;TD4083E.TXT.r_817# khong  khro ba la sogs pas gus par mi byed cing stan las mi ldang la stan mi stobs na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column25: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691058#691058#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column26: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column27: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694050#694050#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column28: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#693407#693407#TD4083E.TXT.r_1095# bar mi byed par de thams cad du yal bar bor nas nyan thos kyi sde snod nyid la brtson par sbyor zhing goms par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column29: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#693685#693685#TD4083E.TXT.r_1121# byang  chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis dam pa yin pa'i rlom sems kyis bdag la chags pa dang  gzhan la khong khro bas brnyas pa dang bcas pa dang  gshe ba dang bcas pas bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column30: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342239#1342239#TD4037E.TXT.r_3591;TD4037E.TXT.r_3592;TD4037E.TXT.r_3593# nyes pa dang bcas  shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column31: 0.029#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809483#1809483#TD4082E.TXT.r_326;TD4082E.TXT.r_327;TD4082E.TXT.r_328# chos sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column32: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694181#694181#TD4083E.TXT.r_1176;TD4083E.TXT.r_1177# nga rgyal dang khong khro bas mnyam pa'am de bas lhag pa'i mthun pa'i phan gdags pas lan du phan mi 'dogs na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /

column3: le lo dang sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams dang bral bar byed pa dang  dge ba'i chos tshad med pa rnam par spel ba mthar phyin par byed pas brtson 'grus so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692818#692837#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030;TD4083E.TXT.r_1031# kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692909#692917#TD4083E.TXT.r_1037;TD4083E.TXT.r_1038# mi bzod pa'i    ngang tshul can yin zhing nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // / +thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa dang  gzhan mu stegs can yin pa dang  rang bzhin gyis 'thab krol can yin pa dang  chos bzhin ma yin pa dang  dus ma yin par shad kyis sbyong bar byed na nyes pa med do // /

column3: rnam par gyeng ba  sel ba dang  nang du sems gnas pa sgrub par byed pas bsam gtan no // / +lta bar gyur ba dang 'chal ba'i shes rab thams cad sel ba dang  yang dag par rnam pa thams cad du chos rnams rab tu shes pas shes rab bo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692838#692847#TD4083E.TXT.r_1031# thabs des 'dul bar bya bar 'dod pa dang  gzhan mu stegs can yin pa dang  rang bzhin gyis 'thab krol can  yin pa dang  rung ba ma yin pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa kun du spyod pas shad kyis sbyong bar byed du 'jug par 'dod pa dang  shad kyis sbyang bar byas na shas cher 'khrugs te shed skye bar 'gyur ba dang  pha rol bzod pa'i dang tshul can yin zhing kun nas mnar sems med pa'i ngang  tshul can yin du re la / /

column3: 'di dag sgom pa ji ltar blta bar bya zhe na / / +mdor bsdu na sgom pa  rnam pa lngar blta bar bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692848#692856#TD4083E.TXT.r_1031;TD4083E.TXT.r_1032# thabs des 'dul bar bya bar 'dod pa dang  gzhan mu stegs can yin pa dang  rang bzhin gyis 'thab krol can  yin pa dang  rung ba ma yin pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa kun du spyod pas shad kyis sbyong bar byed du 'jug par 'dod pa dang  shad kyis sbyang bar byas na shas cher 'khrugs te shed skye bar 'gyur ba dang  pha rol bzod pa'i dang tshul can yin zhing kun nas mnar sems med pa'i ngang  tshul can yin du re la / /

column3: kun tu spyod pa la spyod pa la sbyor ba sgom pa dang  mos pa sgom pa dang  yid la byed pa sgom pa dang  thabs la mkhas pa sgom pa dang  bya ba sgrub pa sgom pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810986#1810989#TD4082E.TXT.r_498;TD4082E.TXT.r_499# gzhan la bdag gis nyes pa byas pa las brtsams te shad kyis byang bar byed pa  shin tu ngo tsha bar byed pa zhig yin na nyes pa med do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692857#692868#TD4083E.TXT.r_1031;TD4083E.TXT.r_1032;TD4083E.TXT.r_1033# thabs des 'dul bar bya bar 'dod pa dang  gzhan mu stegs can yin pa dang  rang bzhin gyis 'thab krol can  yin pa dang  rung ba ma yin pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa kun du spyod pas shad kyis sbyong bar byed du 'jug par 'dod pa dang  shad kyis sbyang bar byas na shas cher 'khrugs te shed skye bar 'gyur ba dang  pha rol bzod pa'i dang tshul can yin zhing kun nas mnar sems med pa'i ngang  tshul can yin du re la / / +gzhan shad kyis sbyong bar byed pas shin tu ngo tsha bar byed pa zhig na nyes pa med do // /

column3: de la sgom pa bzhi ni snga ma bzhin no // / +bya ba sgrub pa sgom pa ni // / +gang sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa  lhun gyi grub pa rgyun mi gcod pa na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692869#692884#TD4083E.TXT.r_1033;TD4083E.TXT.r_1034;TD4083E.TXT.r_1035# pha rol shad kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +'ga' zhig la yid du mi 'ong ba'i rgyus gzhan dag gis sbyong bar byed pa spong ba ni nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.028#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810998#1810998#TD4082E.TXT.r_500# byang chub sems dpa' rtsod pa byung ba 'ga' zhig las byung bar gyur nas gzhan dag la chos bzhin du mthun par shad kyis byang bar byed kyang / /

column3: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshe / / +pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'o // / +yid la byed pa sgom pa ni / / +ro myong ba dang  rjes su yi rang ba dang  mngon par dga' ba yid la byed pa dang  mi ngoms pa'i bsam pa dang  rgyun ring po'i bsam  pa dang  dga' ba'i bsam pa dang  phan 'dogs pa'i bsam pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid kyi bsam pa dang  dge ba'i bsam pa dang  bsam pa drug gis yongs su zin pas sgom pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692882#692892#TD4083E.TXT.r_1034;TD4083E.TXT.r_1035# 'ga' zhig la yid du mi 'ong ba'i rgyus gzhan dag gis sbyong bar BYED PA SPONG BA NI nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub sems dpa' rtsod pa byung ba 'ga' zhig las gzhan dag la 'khrugs pas de rnams dus su chos bzhin du shad kyis sbyong bar byed kyang kun nas mnar sems sam / /

column3: gal te byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med pa ji snyed kyis / / +bla na med pa yang dag    par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de snyed kyi dus skad cig ma gcig tu byas pa'i skad cig re re la bdag gi lus thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang  'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rin po che sna bdun gyis so sor bkang ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692918#692927#TD4083E.TXT.r_1038;TD4083E.TXT.r_1039;TD4083E.TXT.r_1040# thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa dang  gzhan mu stegs can yin pa dang  rang bzhin gyis 'thab krol can yin pa dang  chos bzhin ma yin pa dang  dus ma yin par shad kyis sbyong bar byed na nyes pa med do // /

column3: de bzhin gshegs  pa rnams la dbul bas / / +byang chub kyis snying po la gnas kyi bar du mi ngoms pa nyid byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i bsam par 'gyur la / /

column11: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344552#1344555#TD4037E.TXT.r_3923;TD4037E.TXT.r_3924;TD4037E.TXT.r_3925;TD4037E.TXT.r_3926# byang chub sems dpa' nad pa nad kyis thebs pa dang phrad pa na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan  pas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang BCAS PAR 'GYUR TE / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column12: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344667#1344669#TD4037E.TXT.r_3938;TD4037E.TXT.r_3939;TD4037E.TXT.r_3940# kun  nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas rigs pa dang tshul bzhin ston par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang BCAS PAR 'GYUR TE / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi byed na    nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column13: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344800#1344802#TD4037E.TXT.r_3956;TD4037E.TXT.r_3957;TD4037E.TXT.r_3958# byang chub sems dpa' sems can nye du dang longs spyod las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan byung ba kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pas sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur  te ; / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sel bar mi byed na / /

column30: 0.018#TD4039E.TXT.r#1864619#1864619#TD4039E.TXT.r_5726# reg pa dag dang  mi sdug pa'i lag pa dang   dbyug pa dang  bong ba'i 'dus te reg pa dag gi kun du spyod pa byas kyang de ni rgyu dang bcas pa'i tshor ba la sogs pa gzugs can ma yin pa'i 'du shes byed de dag la yang mi rtag par yang dag par mthong bas rjes su chags par yang mi byed khong khro bar yang mi byed de / /

column35: 0.019#TD4047E.TXT.r#1141147#1141147#TD4047E.TXT.r_2880;TD4047E.TXT.r_2881# thams cad  la sems mnyam pa'i phyir gzhan la phun tshogs pa'i khyad par thob par 'dod pas bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas de dag la slob dpon gyis dpe mkhyud kyang mi byed do // / +gzhan dag la yang yang dag par ston par byed do // /
column36: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#693407#693407#TD4083E.TXT.r_1095# bar mi byed par de thams cad du yal bar bor nas nyan thos kyi sde snod nyid la brtson par sbyor zhing goms par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
