column10: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344667#1344667#TD4037E.TXT.r_3938;TD4037E.TXT.r_3939;TD4037E.TXT.r_3940# kun  nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas rigs pa dang tshul bzhin ston par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi byed na    nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344800#1344800#TD4037E.TXT.r_3956;TD4037E.TXT.r_3957;TD4037E.TXT.r_3958# byang chub sems dpa' sems can nye du dang longs spyod las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan byung ba kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pas sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur  te ; / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sel bar mi byed na / /
column12: 0.017#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809483#1809483#TD4082E.TXT.r_326;TD4082E.TXT.r_327;TD4082E.TXT.r_328# chos sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column13: 0.017#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812148#1812148#TD4082E.TXT.r_660;TD4082E.TXT.r_661# nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur  te ; / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column14: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#693407#693407#TD4083E.TXT.r_1095# bar mi byed par de thams cad du yal bar bor nas nyan thos kyi sde snod nyid la brtson par sbyor zhing goms par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column15: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#691208#691208#TD4083E.TXT.r_844# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column16: 0.022#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342151#1342151#TD4037E.TXT.r_3570;TD4037E.TXT.r_3571# sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los len par mi byed na / /
column17: 0.022#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809389#1809389#TD4082E.TXT.r_307;TD4082E.TXT.r_308# sems can  yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los len par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column18: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694655#694655#TD4083E.TXT.r_1219# sems can skrag par bya bar rigs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du mas skrag par mi byed pa dang  sems can 'dun par bya ba'i rigs pa rnams 'dun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column19: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693475#693475#TD4083E.TXT.r_1102;TD4083E.TXT.r_1103# byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod nyid med kyang sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin yod bzhin du phyi rol gyi bstan bcos te mu stegs can gyi bstan bcos  la brtson par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +shin tu yid gzhungs pa dang ldob skyen pa dang  yun ring por yang yid mi brjed pa dang  don sems pa dang rtog par byed nus pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab la rigs pas nye bar rtogs pa dang ldan pas blo mi 'gyur ba  dang ldan zhing nyin gcig bzhin du ches lhag par sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab la brtson par byed pa yin na nyes pa med do // /

column3: yo byad thams  cad dang mi ldan yang tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab kyi sems mngon du byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692966#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1045;TD4083E.TXT.r_1046;TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# bsnyen bkur 'dod phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +bsnyen bkur gyi ched du 'khor rnams sdud pa ste / /
column5: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#691446#691446#TD4083E.TXT.r_869# gzhan gyi don lhur blang ba la bya ba chung ba ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#690826#690826#TD4083E.TXT.r_809# sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis shin tu bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las rnyed pa dang  bkur sti dang du mi len cing 'dod pa chung ba dang  chog shes pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#690874#690874#TD4083E.TXT.r_814# ches rgan pa la gus par mi byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul    khrims kyis shin du bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las spyod pa dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du mi ngoms pa nyid byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan  dang ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692988#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047;TD4083E.TXT.r_1048# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693204#693212#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074;TD4083E.TXT.r_1075# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693831#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.010#TD4083E.TXT.r#691347#691347#TD4083E.TXT.r_859# mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#690873#690874#TD4083E.TXT.r_814# ches rgan pa la gus par mi byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul    khrims kyis shin du bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las spyod pa dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#692406#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692645#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007;TD4083E.TXT.r_1008# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694131#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column15: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693384#693385#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I SDE snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thos pa dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693712#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: shes rab kyi bsam par 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i mi ngoms pa'i bsam pa'o // / +gang byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du mi ngoms pa'i bsam pa de mi 'dor ba 'di ni de'i rgyun ring po'i bsam pa'o // /

column3: gang byang chub sems dpa' de'i pha rol tu phyin  pa drug gis sems can la phan btags pas shin tu dga' ba yin gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693007#693018#TD4083E.TXT.r_1049;TD4083E.TXT.r_1050;TD4083E.TXT.r_1051;TD4083E.TXT.r_1052# snying brtse bas sdud par byed pa dang  rigs pa dang ldan pa'i rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bdag gir byed pa la ni nyes pa med do // / +le lo la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
column5: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1190883#1190883#TD4047E.TXT.r_9979;TD4047E.TXT.r_9980# de nyid bstan pa'i phyir le lo la sogs pa la  brten te zhes bya ba la sogs pa / / +lus kyi le lo dang  sems kyi snyom las bdag por byas nas zhes pa'i tha tshig go // /

column3: phan btags pa des sems can rnams ni de lta ma yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i bsam pa'o // / +gang byang chub sems dpa' de pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis phan btags pa'i sems can de dag thams cad  ni bdag la shin tu phan 'dogs pa yin par mthong gi / /

column19: 0.026#TD4032E.TXT.r#1941828#1941828#TD4032E.TXT.r_3485;TD4032E.TXT.r_3486# mtshan nyid dang rnam par rig pa'i de kho na gnyis kyis ni chos mnyam pa'o // / +rnam par dag pa'i de kho nas ni byang chub mnyam pa'o // /
column20: 0.027#TD4053E.TXT.r#2970760#2970761#TD4053E.TXT.r_858# rgyu mthun pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i chos ni sangs rgyas la sogs pas thugs su chud pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i brtan par rig par bya'o // /
column21: 0.027#TD4054E.TXT.r#1002865#1002867#TD4054E.TXT.r_1950;TD4054E.TXT.r_1951# de'i dbang gis mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa la dmigs par blta bar bya'o // / +rgyu mthun pa'i chos ni sangs rgyas la sogs pas thugs su chud pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i bstan par rig par  bya'o // /
column22: 0.027#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2884518#2884518#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_2318# byang chub sems dpa' rnams  kyis sangs rgyas mchod pa yang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis zin pas mchod par bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang  mchod par byed PA'I BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' DANG  mchod pa'i yo byad chos gos la sogs pa yod par mi dmigs pas mchod de / /
column23: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#1319767#1319767#TD4037E.TXT.r_541# kha na ma tho ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang  phan 'dogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  tshe 'di pa dang  tshe gzhan pa dang  zhi bar  byed pa'o // /
column24: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1154568#1154568#TD4047E.TXT.r_4919;TD4047E.TXT.r_4920# 'jug par sla ba'i chos ston pa ni ji ltar 'byung ba'i dngos po'i chos ston pa'o // / +thabs sla bas 'jug pa'i chos ni rtogs pa'i  chos ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa ste / /
column25: 0.029#TD4049E.TXT.r#2303345#2303345#TD4049E.TXT.r_2741;TD4049E.TXT.r_2742;TD4049E.TXT.r_2743# chos sems pa'am / / +zhugs pa'i chos la gnas pa'am / / +snyoms par 'jug pa'i khyad par gyi lam gang yin pa'o // /
column26: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1134207#1134208#TD4047E.TXT.r_1877;TD4047E.TXT.r_1878# 'phen pa chen po  nyid dang  gnas pa chen po nyid do // / +byang chub sems dpa' bde 'gror skyes par gyur pa'i tshe ring bar 'phen pa'i las kyis 'phangs pa'i tshe ni ring ba nyid dang ldan par 'gyur gyi thung bar mi 'gyur te / /

column3: bdag ni sems can de dag la de lta ma yin par mthong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i phan 'dogs pa'i bsam pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693037#693046#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053;TD4083E.TXT.r_1054;TD4083E.TXT.r_1055;TD4083E.TXT.r_1056;TD4083E.TXT.r_1057# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub sems dpa' le lo dang snyom las skyes te / / +gnyid kyi bde ba'am / /
column5: 5.960#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343784#1343787#TD4037E.TXT.r_3797;TD4037E.TXT.r_3798;TD4037E.TXT.r_3799# zang zing med pa'i bsam pas rim gro bya ba dang  bsnyen bkur bya ba bdag  gir byed na nyes pa med do // / +byang chub sems dpa' snyom las dang le lo skyes te / / +gnyid kyi bde ba dang  nyal ba'i bde ba dang  glos 'bebs pa'i bde ba dus ma yin pa dang  tshod ma yin par bdag gir byed na nyas pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / /

column3: gang byang chub sems dpa' de de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa sems can rnams la  'dod pa'i 'bras bu rnams par smin par yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i che ba'i bdag nyid kyi bsam pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693047#693064#TD4083E.TXT.r_1057;TD4083E.TXT.r_1058;TD4083E.TXT.r_1059# glos 'bebs pa'i bde ba dag dus ma yin pa dang  tshod mi 'dzin par nyams su myong bar byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.017#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811955#1811958#TD4082E.TXT.r_630;TD4082E.TXT.r_631;TD4082E.TXT.r_632# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' NAD pa nad kyis thebs pa dang phrad pa na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems  dang ldan pas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.017#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812205#1812207#TD4082E.TXT.r_667;TD4082E.TXT.r_668;TD4082E.TXT.r_669# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS can nye du dang  longs spyod las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan byung ba kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pas sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal  ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342151#1342151#TD4037E.TXT.r_3570;TD4037E.TXT.r_3571# sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los len par mi byed na / /
column8: 0.024#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809389#1809389#TD4082E.TXT.r_307;TD4082E.TXT.r_308# sems can  yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los len par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column9: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692285#692285#TD4083E.TXT.r_964# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' LOG pas 'tsho bar byed pa'i chos byung ba rnams dang du len cing mi 'dzem la sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694655#694655#TD4083E.TXT.r_1219# sems can skrag par bya bar rigs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du mas skrag par mi byed pa dang  sems can 'dun par bya ba'i rigs pa rnams 'dun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692351#692352#TD4083E.TXT.r_972# rnam pa sna tshogs pas smra bar byed 'dod na nyon mongs pa can gyi ltung bar 'gyur ro // /
column12: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693228#693229#TD4083E.TXT.r_1076;TD4083E.TXT.r_1077# de rnams byung ba nyams su myong bar byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column13: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693407#693407#TD4083E.TXT.r_1095# bar mi byed par de thams cad du yal bar bor nas nyan thos kyi sde snod nyid la brtson par sbyor zhing goms par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column14: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342239#1342239#TD4037E.TXT.r_3591;TD4037E.TXT.r_3592;TD4037E.TXT.r_3593# nyes pa dang bcas  shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column15: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344667#1344667#TD4037E.TXT.r_3938;TD4037E.TXT.r_3939;TD4037E.TXT.r_3940# kun  nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas rigs pa dang tshul bzhin ston par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi byed na    nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column16: 0.027#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809483#1809483#TD4082E.TXT.r_326;TD4082E.TXT.r_327;TD4082E.TXT.r_328# chos sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column17: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#691208#691208#TD4083E.TXT.r_844# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' CHOS don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column18: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#693685#693685#TD4083E.TXT.r_1121# byang  chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis dam pa yin pa'i rlom sems kyis bdag la chags pa dang  gzhan la khong khro bas brnyas pa dang bcas pa dang  gshe ba dang bcas pas bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column19: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344751#1344751#TD4037E.TXT.r_3950;TD4037E.TXT.r_3951# nyon mongs  pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los mi byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: gang byang chub sems dpa' de de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693065#693082#TD4083E.TXT.r_1059;TD4083E.TXT.r_1060;TD4083E.TXT.r_1061# bar byed pa dang  de spang bar 'dod kyang zil gyis non pas kun du spyod pa la ni nyes pa med do // / +chags pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /

column3: bla na med pa yang dag par     // / +rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni / / +byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bsam pa ste bsam pa drug po 'di dag gis yongs su zin pa'i ro myong ba yid la byed pa sgom mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692790#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693077#693097#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061;TD4083E.TXT.r_1062# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693261#693265#TD4083E.TXT.r_1079;TD4083E.TXT.r_1080# bsam gtan gyi bde ba nyams  su myong bar byed cing de la yon tan du lta ba ni dge ba chos dang sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro myang ba dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.018#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692274#TD4083E.TXT.r_963;TD4083E.TXT.r_964# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#693300#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691196#TD4083E.TXT.r_843;TD4083E.TXT.r_844# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column11: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693662#693662#TD4083E.TXT.r_1120# bdag la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i rgyu'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693975#693976#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151;TD4083E.TXT.r_1152# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692645#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007;TD4083E.TXT.r_1008# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693035#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053;TD4083E.TXT.r_1054# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#693832#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#693712#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#694306#694307#TD4083E.TXT.r_1190# 'khor rnams kyi don mi byed pa ni chos  dang zang zing gis bsdus pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694262#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column20: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694535#694536#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /
column21: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693896#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143;TD4083E.TXT.r_1144# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column22: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column23: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693204#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column24: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column25: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#694130#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column26: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#694448#694449#TD4083E.TXT.r_1202# gzhan dag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa smra bar mi byed pa ni yon tan  gyi bsngags pa smra ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column27: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693384#693385#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thos pa dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column28: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694633#694633#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs pa la sogs pa mi byed pa ni bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column29: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#691347#691347#TD4083E.TXT.r_859# mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: gang yang byang chub sems dpa' de bsam pa drug sgom pa la sogs pa  la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dpag tu med pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de la rjes su yi rang ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693097#693106#TD4083E.TXT.r_1062;TD4083E.TXT.r_1063;TD4083E.TXT.r_1064# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' KUN du chags pas bre mo'i gtam la brten pas dus 'da' bar byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.020#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343832#1343832#TD4037E.TXT.r_3806;TD4037E.TXT.r_3807# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +brjed pas yol bar byas na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.020#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343896#1343896#TD4037E.TXT.r_3816;TD4037E.TXT.r_3817# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los byas na / /
column7: 0.020#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810552#1810552#TD4082E.TXT.r_443;TD4082E.TXT.r_444# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +brjed pas byas na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344750#1344751#TD4037E.TXT.r_3950;TD4037E.TXT.r_3951# nyon mongs  pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los mi byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.025#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342151#1342151#TD4037E.TXT.r_3570;TD4037E.TXT.r_3571# sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los len par mi byed na / /
column10: 0.025#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809389#1809389#TD4082E.TXT.r_307;TD4082E.TXT.r_308# sems can  yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los len par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column11: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692285#692285#TD4083E.TXT.r_964# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' LOG pas 'tsho bar byed pa'i chos byung ba rnams dang du len cing mi 'dzem la sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column12: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#694655#694655#TD4083E.TXT.r_1219# sems can skrag par bya bar rigs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du mas skrag par mi byed pa dang  sems can 'dun par bya ba'i rigs pa rnams 'dun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column13: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#690785#690787#TD4083E.TXT.r_804# tha na lus kyis phyag gcig tsam 'tshal ba dang  ngag gis de rnams kyi yon tan rnams las brtsams te tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam 'don pa dang  sems kyi yon tan  rjes su dran pa sngon du 'gro ba'i dad pa gcig tsam yang ma byas par ma gus pa dang  snyom las dang le los nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column14: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344326#1344326#TD4037E.TXT.r_3887;TD4037E.TXT.r_3888# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' pa bsam drug gis yongs su zin pa'i rjes su yi rang ba yid la byed pa sgom mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811214#1811221#TD4082E.TXT.r_528;TD4082E.TXT.r_529# pha rol po smra zhing 'dug la de yang dran pa la gnas bzhin du pha rol gyi ngor skad cig tsam nyan pa la ni nyes pa med do // / +ya mtshan du 'dzin te 'dri ba tsam dang dris pa'i lan 'debs pa tsam byed pa la nyes pa med do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693107#693114#TD4083E.TXT.r_1064# pha rol po'i ngor  skad cig tsam nyan pa dang  ya mtshan du 'dzin te 'dri ba dang  dris pa'i lan 'debs pa tsam la ni nyes pa med do // /
column6: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343859#1343859#TD4037E.TXT.r_3809;TD4037E.TXT.r_3810;TD4037E.TXT.r_3811# gcig tsam nyan pa la ni nyes pa med do // / +ya mtshan du 'dzin te / / +'dri ba tsam dang  dris pa'i lam 'debs pa tsam byed pa la nyes pa med do // /

column3: gang yang byang chub sems dpa' de sems can thams cad kyi  pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom pa bsam pa drug gis yongs su zin pa dang  bdag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom pa la brtson pa bsam pa drug gis yongs su zin pa la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693115#693137#TD4083E.TXT.r_1064;TD4083E.TXT.r_1065;TD4083E.TXT.r_1066;TD4083E.TXT.r_1067# pha rol po'i ngor  skad cig tsam nyan pa dang  ya mtshan du 'dzin te 'dri ba dang  dris pa'i lan 'debs pa tsam la ni nyes pa med do // /

column3: byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du mngon par dga' ba ste / / +de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa drug gis yongs su  zin pa'i mngon par dga' ba yid la byed pa sgom mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693132#693144#TD4083E.TXT.r_1067;TD4083E.TXT.r_1068# ting nge 'dzin gyi don mi tshol ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon  par bsgrub pa la brtson pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.018#TD4083E.TXT.r#693384#693385#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I SDE snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thos pa dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.018#TD4083E.TXT.r#693974#693975#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#694306#694307#TD4083E.TXT.r_1190# 'khor rnams kyi don mi byed pa ni chos  dang zang zing gis bsdus pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693831#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693712#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694535#694536#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /
column11: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694633#694633#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs pa la sogs pa mi byed pa ni bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas PA LA MNGON PAR DGA' BA LAS nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693895#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691195#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column17: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#694261#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i yid la byed pa'i sgom pa bsam pa drug gis yongs su zin pa 'di thos nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693145#693153#TD4083E.TXT.r_1068;TD4083E.TXT.r_1069# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' TING nge 'dzin gyi don la sems gnas par 'dod la / / +khong khro ba dang nga rgyal gyis non pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thad du gdams ngag tshol du mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa  can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: dang ba'i sems gcig kyang skyed pa de dag bsod nams tshad med pa skye bar 'gyur zhing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693154#693163#TD4083E.TXT.r_1069;TD4083E.TXT.r_1070;TD4083E.TXT.r_1071# khong khro ba dang nga rgyal gyis non pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thad du gdams ngag tshol du mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa  can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 5.960#TD4083E.TXT.r#691058#691059#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column6: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#690903#690904#TD4083E.TXT.r_816;TD4083E.TXT.r_817# khong  khro ba la sogs pas gus par mi byed cing stan las mi ldang la stan mi stobs na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column7: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693917#693917#TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column8: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#694339#694339#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192# byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyi chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don gyi mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column9: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#694180#694180#TD4083E.TXT.r_1176;TD4083E.TXT.r_1177# nga rgyal dang khong khro bas mnyam pa'am de bas lhag pa'i mthun pa'i phan gdags pas lan du phan mi 'dogs na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column10: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#694569#694569#TD4083E.TXT.r_1212;TD4083E.TXT.r_1213# skrod par mi byed na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column11: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694049#694051#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column12: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /

column3: nyes pa byas pa'i sgrib pa thams  cad kyang bshig par 'gyur na / / +byang chub sems dpa' lta smos kyang ci dgos / /

column5: 1.788#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811272#1811279#TD4082E.TXT.r_537;TD4082E.TXT.r_538# bdag nyid mang du thos pa yin te sems mnyam par 'jog  nus sam / /

column3: pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gi rab tu dbye ba ji ltar blta zhe na / / +de ni rnam pa gsum gsum du blta bar bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693172#693181#TD4083E.TXT.r_1071;TD4083E.TXT.r_1072;TD4083E.TXT.r_1073# na ste mi nus pa dang  gdams ngag log par byung du dogs pa dang  bdag nyid mang du thos pa yin te sems mnyam par 'jog nus sam // /

column3: chos kyi sbyin pa dang  zang zing gi sbyin pa dang  mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa dang  sdom pa'i tshul  khrims dang  dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims dang  gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang  sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang  chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa dang  go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i  brtson 'grus dang  mi zhum zhing mi 'khrugs pa la chog par mi 'dzin pa'i brtson 'grus dang  gnas pa dang  mngon par sgrub pa dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i bsam gtan dang  rnam par mi rtog par sbyor ba dang  rnam par mi rtog pa dang  rnam par mi rtog pa'i rjes la thob pa'i shes rab    po ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693182#693191#TD4083E.TXT.r_1072;TD4083E.TXT.r_1073;TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# gdams ngag gis gdams par bya ba byas zin na nyes pa  med do // / +bsam gtan sgrib pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693213#693229#TD4083E.TXT.r_1075;TD4083E.TXT.r_1076;TD4083E.TXT.r_1077# byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan la sbyor bas bsam gtan gyi sgrib pa ste bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang  gnod sems dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid dang  rgod pa dang  'gyod    ba dang  the tshom ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694212#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.014#TD4083E.TXT.r#694305#694306#TD4083E.TXT.r_1190# 'khor rnams kyi don mi byed pa ni chos  dang zang zing gis bsdus pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.014#TD4083E.TXT.r#694534#694536#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /
column9: 0.014#TD4083E.TXT.r#694632#694633#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs PA LA SOGS PA MI byed pa ni bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.014#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693895#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa NI SEMS CAN GYI DON  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.015#TD4091E.TXT.r#736473#736474#TD4091E.TXT.r_7531# mdo las 'dod pa'i 'dun pa dang  gnod sems dang  rmugs pa dang gnyid dang rgod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  the tshom dang sgrib ba lnga gsungs pa gang yin pa de la / /
column12: 0.018#TD4083E.TXT.r#693711#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni DGE BA CHOS SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343961#1343962#TD4037E.TXT.r_3829;TD4037E.TXT.r_3830# 'dod pa la 'dun pa ji lta ba bzhin du / / +gnod sems dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid dang  rgod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  the tshom yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o // /
column14: 0.019#TD4036E.TXT.r#30900#30900#TD4036E.TXT.r_4734;TD4036E.TXT.r_4735;TD4036E.TXT.r_4736# yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa la 'dun pas kun nas dkris pa ni 'dod pa la 'dun pas kun nas dkris pa'i rkyen gyis de dang 'byung ba'i sems las byung ba sdug bsngal ba dang  yid mi bde ba so sor myong bar 'gyur ro // / +gnod sems dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid  dang ; / +rgod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  the tshom gyis kun nas dkris pa yang de dang 'dra'o zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste / /
column15: 0.019#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2582349#2582351#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_5818# rtog pa 'di la zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni go rims gang gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang  ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang  shes rab kyi phung po zhes phung po rnams rnam par 'jog pa'i go rims de nyid kyis  de dag gi mi mthun par gyur ba'i sgrib pa 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang  gnod sems dang  rgod pa dang 'gyod pa dang  rmugs pa dang gnyid dang  the tshom zhes 'don par 'gyur te / /
column16: 0.019#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1806310#1806312#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_13335;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_13336# 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris  pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na 'dod pa la 'dun pa'i sgrib pa ma skyes pa mi skye zhing skyes pa spong bar 'gyur ro // / +gnod sems dang  rmugs pa dang gnyid dang rgod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  the tshom gyis kun nas dkris pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin  yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na the tshom gyi sgrib pa ma skyes pa mi skye zhing skyes pa spong bar 'gyur te / /
column17: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#690825#690826#TD4083E.TXT.r_809# SDOM PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYIS shin tu bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las rnyed pa dang  bkur sti dang du mi len cing 'dod pa chung ba dang  chog shes pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column24: 0.020#TD4069E.TXT.r#632023#632025#TD4069E.TXT.r_1318# sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs PAR BYED PA DAG NI 'dod pa la 'dun pa'i sgrib pa dang   gnod sems dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid dang  rgod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  the tshom gyi sgrib pa'o zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /

column26: 0.020#TD4037E.TXT.r#1339241#1339241#TD4037E.TXT.r_3205# sems can gnod sems dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid dang  rgod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  the tshom gyi kun nas dkris pas sdug bsngal ba rnams  kyi the tshom gyi kun nas dkris pa sel bar byed do // /
column27: 0.020#TD4036E.TXT.r#2675#2676#TD4036E.TXT.r_226# sgrib pa lnga po 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang  gnod sems dang  rmugs    pa dang  gnyid dang  rgod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  the tshom dag las sems rnam par sbyong bar byed cing / /
column28: 0.020#TD4069E.TXT.r#627177#627178#TD4069E.TXT.r_654# dper na sgrib pa lnga rnams zhes bya ba ni 'dir sgrib pa lnga po 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang  gnod sems dang rmugs pa dang gnyid dang  rgod pa dang 'gyod pa dang  the tshom rnams las chos gnyis po rmugs pa dang  gnyid  gnyis kyi bya ba dang  zas dang gnyen po ni mtshungs pa nyid yin la / /
column29: 0.020#TD4095E.TXT.r#92268#92269#TD4095E.TXT.r_5684;TD4095E.TXT.r_5685# mdo las / / +'dod pa la 'dun pa dang  gnod sems dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid dang  rgod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  the tshom dang  sgrib pa lnga po gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de la rmugs pa dang  rgod pa  dang ; /
column30: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#1355035#1355035#TD4037E.TXT.r_5216;TD4037E.TXT.r_5217# sdug bsngal rnam pa lnga ni 'dod pa la 'dun pa'i kun nas dkris pa'i rkyen can dang  gnod sems dang  rmugs pa dang      // / +gnyid dang  rgod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  the tshom gyis kun nas dkris pa'i rkyen can gyi sdug bsngal lo // /
column31: 0.021#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1805456#1805458#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_13210;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_13211# 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa dang  'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa de las byung ba sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba dag so sor  yang dag par myong bar byed do // / +gnod sems dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid dang  rgod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  the tshom gyis kun nas dkris pas the tshom gyis kun nas dkris pa dang  de'i rkyen gyis skyes pa sdug bsngal ba dang  yid mi bde ba dag so sor yang dag par myong bar byed  do ; /
column32: 0.021#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1908740#1908740#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_3161# gnod sems dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid dang  rgod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  the tshom gyis kun nas dkris pas sems la lan mang du gnas shing the tshom gyis kun nas dkris pa skyes pa rnams las / /
column33: 0.021#TD4098E.TXT.r#1393392#1393394#TD4098E.TXT.r_545# sgrib pa ni lnga ste 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang  gnod sems dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid dang  rgod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  the tshom mo // /
column34: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#692781#692782#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni DGE BA CHOS SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // /
column35: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691195#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa NI DGE BA'I CHOS SDUD PA dang  SEMS CAN GYI DON BYA BA dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column36: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691120#691120#TD4083E.TXT.r_837# len par mi byed pa NI SEMS CAN GYI DON BYA BA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI bsod nams kyi grogs su 'gro ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos te / /
column37: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#691347#691347#TD4083E.TXT.r_859# mi byed pa ni DGE BA CHOS SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column38: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692644#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed NA SEMS CAN GYI DON BYA BA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column39: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams NI SDOM PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS DANG  DGE BA CHOS SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS DAG GIS gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column40: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni DGE BA CHOS SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column41: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692272#TD4083E.TXT.r_963# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba DANG DU LEN PAR BYED PA NI SDOM PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column42: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa NI DGE BA'I CHOS SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column43: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor BA NI SDOM PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column44: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#694262#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column45: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#694448#694449#TD4083E.TXT.r_1202# gzhan dag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa smra bar mi byed pa ni yon tan  gyi bsngags pa smra ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column46: 0.025#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2027505#2027506#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_7157;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_7158# lnga gang zhe na / / +'dod pa la 'dun pa dang  gnod sems dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid dang  rgod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  the tshom mo zhes gsungs so // /
column47: 0.025#TD4036E.TXT.r#13641#13642#TD4036E.TXT.r_2018# de ltar na nges 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang  gnod sems dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid dang  rgod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  the tshom gyi sgrib pa rnams dang  de dag 'dren par  byed pa'i sgrib par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams las / /
column48: 0.025#TD4032E.TXT.r#1944593#1944594#TD4032E.TXT.r_3859;TD4032E.TXT.r_3860# sgrib pa lnga ni 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang  gnod sems dang  rmugs pa  dang ; / +gnyid dang  rgod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  the tshom mo // /
column49: 0.025#TD4069E.TXT.r#657943#657944#TD4069E.TXT.r_4966# sgrib pa lnga ni 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang  gnod sems dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid dang  rgod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  the tshom mo // /
column50: 0.026#TD4036E.TXT.r#13051#13053#TD4036E.TXT.r_1909;TD4036E.TXT.r_1910# de dag kyang gang zhe na / / +'dod pa la 'dun pa dang  gnod sems dang  rmugs pa dang gnyid dang  'gyod pa dang  rgod pa dang  the tshom dang  sdug pa nyid dang  khong khro ba'i rgyu dang  mun pa dang  nye du dang  ljongs dang  mi 'chi ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang   sngon bgad pa dang  rtses pa dang  dga' ba dang  dga' mgur spyad pa rjes su dran pa dang  dus gsum dang  dus gsum du gtogs pa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i chos rnams la sems pa gang yin pa'o // /
column51: 0.027#TD4019E.TXT.r#2443162#2443162#TD4019E.TXT.r_4760;TD4019E.TXT.r_4761# rnyed pa dang bkur sti mang po dang  gyog 'khor la sogs pa skye bo mang po'i tshogs dang  gnyid dang rmugs pa dang  rgod     // / +pa dang 'gyod pa dang  'dod pa dang  'dun pa dang  gnod sems dang the tshom du gyur pa'i sgrib pa lnga sbang bar bya zhing / /
column52: 0.029#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1805361#1805361#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_13205# 'dod chags ji lta ba bzhin du    zhe sdang dang  gti mug dang  khro ba dang  khon du 'dzin pa dang  'chab pa dang  'tshig pa dang  phrag dog dang  ser sna dang  sgyu dang gyo dang  ngo tsha med pa dang  khrel med pa dang  nga rgyal dang  lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang  nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang  mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang   nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang  log pa'i nga rgyal dang  cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang  bag med pa dang  nges pa dang  yang dag par rtsom pa dang  tshul 'chos pa dang  kha gsag dang  gzhogs slong dang  rnyed pa 'dod pa dang  rnyed pa rnyed pas sgrub pa dang  sdig pa 'dod  pa dang  chen po 'dod pa dang  'dod pas gces sbras byed pa dang  tshig dan dang  sdig pa'i grogs po dang  mi bzod pa dang  'dod pa dang  yongs su 'dod pa dang  'dod chags dang  chos ma yin pa la chags pa dang  mi 'phrod pa'i ser sna dang  'jig tshogs la  lta ba dang  dngos por lta ba dang  dngos po med par lta ba dang  'dod pa la 'dun pa dang  gnod sems dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid dang  rgod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  the tshom dang  rmya ba dang  mi dga' ba dang  glal byed pa dang  zas kyi tshod mi 'dzin pa dang  sems zhum pa dang   'du shes sna tshogs yid la byed pa dang  lus kyi gnas ngan len dang  yang yang 'dod pa dang  mang du smra ba dang  mi drang ba dang  khro ba dang  rang bzhin ma yin pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang  'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang  gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang  rnam par 'tshe  pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang  gnyen 'dun gyi rnam par rtog pa dang  ljongs kyi rnam par rtog pa dang  mi 'chi ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang  ngan sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang  rigs snyems pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang  mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don  PA DANG SDUG BSNGAL BA dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa'o zhes gsungs so // /

column3: 'di dag bsdus par ji ltar blta zhe na / / +'di dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad de'i mtshan nyid dang  de dang mthun pa dang  de'i 'bras bur bsdus pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692349#692352#TD4083E.TXT.r_971;TD4083E.TXT.r_972# ches rgod par byed rtse bar byed ca co 'don par byed du gzhug par 'dod cing / / +rnam pa sna tshogs pas smra bar byed 'dod na nyon mongs pa can gyi ltung bar 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692949#692952#TD4083E.TXT.r_1043;TD4083E.TXT.r_1044# 'dzin par byed rjes su 'jug par byed na  nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693225#693238#TD4083E.TXT.r_1075;TD4083E.TXT.r_1076;TD4083E.TXT.r_1077# byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan la sbyor bas bsam gtan gyi sgrib pa ste bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang  gnod sems dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid dang  rgod pa dang  'gyod    ba dang  the tshom ste / / +de rnams byung ba nyams su myong bar byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693407#693413#TD4083E.TXT.r_1095;TD4083E.TXT.r_1096# bar mi byed par de thams cad du yal bar bor nas nyan thos kyi sde snod nyid la brtson par sbyor zhing goms par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.017#TD4083E.TXT.r#693685#693685#TD4083E.TXT.r_1121# byang  chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis dam pa yin pa'i rlom sems kyis bdag la chags pa dang  gzhan la khong khro bas brnyas pa dang bcas pa dang  gshe ba dang bcas pas bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342239#1342239#TD4037E.TXT.r_3591;TD4037E.TXT.r_3592;TD4037E.TXT.r_3593# nyes pa dang bcas  shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column10: 0.017#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809483#1809483#TD4082E.TXT.r_326;TD4082E.TXT.r_327;TD4082E.TXT.r_328# chos sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column11: 0.017#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812067#1812069#TD4082E.TXT.r_646;TD4082E.TXT.r_647;TD4082E.TXT.r_648# byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma'i don la tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa dag  mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas rigs pa dang  tshul bzhin ston par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi  byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column12: 0.017#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812148#1812148#TD4082E.TXT.r_660;TD4082E.TXT.r_661# nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur  te ; / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column13: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343951#1343953#TD4037E.TXT.r_3827;TD4037E.TXT.r_3828# de spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyes shing 'bad kyang nyon mongs pa drag pos sems zil gyis non te / / +kun  tu spyod na nyes pa med do // /
column14: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#691208#691208#TD4083E.TXT.r_844# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column15: 0.022#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342151#1342151#TD4037E.TXT.r_3570;TD4037E.TXT.r_3571# sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los len par mi byed na / /
column16: 0.022#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809389#1809389#TD4082E.TXT.r_307;TD4082E.TXT.r_308# sems can  yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los len par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column17: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694655#694655#TD4083E.TXT.r_1219# sems can skrag par bya bar rigs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du mas skrag par mi byed pa dang  sems can 'dun par bya ba'i rigs pa rnams 'dun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column18: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693475#693475#TD4083E.TXT.r_1102;TD4083E.TXT.r_1103# byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod nyid med kyang sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin yod bzhin du phyi rol gyi bstan bcos te mu stegs can gyi bstan bcos  la brtson par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +shin tu yid gzhungs pa dang ldob skyen pa dang  yun ring por yang yid mi brjed pa dang  don sems pa dang rtog par byed nus pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab la rigs pas nye bar rtogs pa dang ldan pas blo mi 'gyur ba  dang ldan zhing nyin gcig bzhin du ches lhag par sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab la brtson par byed pa yin na nyes pa med do // /
column19: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#1341401#1341402#TD4037E.TXT.r_3451;TD4037E.TXT.r_3452# khro bo'i kun nas dkris pa de lta bu 'phel bar byed la / / +khro bas zil gyis non nas / /
column20: 0.026#TD4082E.TXT.r#1808329#1808330#TD4082E.TXT.r_166;TD4082E.TXT.r_167# khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa de lta bu 'phel bar byed la / / +khro bas zil gyis non nas lag pa'am / /
column21: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#692285#692285#TD4083E.TXT.r_964# byang chub sems dpa' log pas 'tsho bar byed pa'i chos byung ba rnams dang du len cing mi 'dzem la sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: 'di dag gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad ji ltar bsdus par blta zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693239#693246#TD4083E.TXT.r_1077;TD4083E.TXT.r_1078;TD4083E.TXT.r_1079# de spang bar 'dod kyang nyon mongs pa drag pos zil gyis non te kun du spyod na nyes pa med do // / +bsam gtan ro la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /

column3: de'i mtshan nyid dang   de'i gzhi dang  de'i 'bras bus so // / +pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gi phan yon ji ltar rig par bya zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693247#693261#TD4083E.TXT.r_1079# bsam gtan gyi bde ba nyams  su myong bar byed cing de la yon tan du lta ba ni dge ba chos dang sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro myang ba dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe / / +dbang phyug bsdus pa dang  chen por skye ba bsdus pa dang  phyogs gang dang gyog 'khor chen po bsdus pa dang  las kyi mtha' chen po la sbyor ba 'grub  pas yongs su bzung ba dang  gnod pa med pa dang  nyon mongs pa chung ba yongs su bzung ba dang  bzo dang  bstan bcos dang  rig pa'i gnas thams cad la mkhas pa yongs su bzung ba dang  mngon par mtho ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dang  byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du sems  can thams cad kyi don bya bar nye bar gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phan yon no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692790#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693258#693277#TD4083E.TXT.r_1079;TD4083E.TXT.r_1080;TD4083E.TXT.r_1081;TD4083E.TXT.r_1082# bsam gtan gyi bde ba nyams  su myong bar byed cing de la yon tan du lta ba ni dge ba chos dang sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro myang ba dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693278#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1081;TD4083E.TXT.r_1082;TD4083E.TXT.r_1083;TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# de la yon tan du lta bar  byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +nyes pa med pa ni 'das ma thag pa bzhin no // /
column7: 0.015#TD4083E.TXT.r#693683#693685#TD4083E.TXT.r_1121# byang  chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis dam pa yin pa'i rlom sems kyis bdag la chags pa dang  gzhan la khong khro bas brnyas pa dang bcas pa dang  gshe ba dang bcas pas bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.017#TD4083E.TXT.r#692947#692952#TD4083E.TXT.r_1042;TD4083E.TXT.r_1043;TD4083E.TXT.r_1044# byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la khro ba'i bsam pa byung ba dang du len par byed / / +'dzin par byed rjes su 'jug par byed na  nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.019#TD4035E.TXT.r#173738#173738#TD4035E.TXT.r_8623# de ltar 'dug nas kyang bsam gtan gyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i gnas pas sems de gnas par byed do // /
column10: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693662#693662#TD4083E.TXT.r_1120# bdag la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i rgyu'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693894#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143# ji skad smras PA'I BYA BAR NYE BAR GNAS PA LA gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691195#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems CAN GYI DON BYA BA dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column15: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693713#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692644#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems CAN GYI DON BYA BA'I tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694044#694045#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: 'di dag gi phan tshun rnams par nges pa ji ltar blta zhe na / /
column4: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692644#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#692790#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691195#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column8: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#693712#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#694261#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#694535#694536#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /
column12: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693204#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692272#TD4083E.TXT.r_963# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#694131#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#694633#694633#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs pa la sogs pa mi byed pa ni bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693894#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column20: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693564#693564#TD4083E.TXT.r_1110# theg pa chen po dang ldan pa gang la la zhig zab pa'i gnas dag spong ba ni 'das ma thag pa lta bu dang  lta ba ngan pa spong ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column21: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#693384#693384#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thos pa dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column22: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694448#694448#TD4083E.TXT.r_1202# gzhan dag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa smra bar mi byed pa ni yon tan  gyi bsngags pa smra ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis la lar ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad sbyin pa'i sgrar bstan / / +la lar ni tshul khrims kyi sgra bstan // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693305#693316#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084;TD4083E.TXT.r_1085;TD4083E.TXT.r_1086;TD4083E.TXT.r_1087;TD4083E.TXT.r_1088# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub sems dpas nyan thos dang ldan pa'i chos mnyan par mi bya // /
column5: 0.017#TD4047E.TXT.r#1145869#1145869#TD4047E.TXT.r_3594;TD4047E.TXT.r_3595;TD4047E.TXT.r_3596# de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnams mnyan pa dang  gzung ba dang  bcang ba dang ldan pa'i  bya bas yongs su mnyan par bya / / +yang dag par gzung bar bya / / +yun ring du gnas par bya bar mi mthun pa'i phyogs spang bar bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no // /
column6: 0.018#TD4096E.TXT.r#1551329#1551329#TD4096E.TXT.r_206# de dag dang 'brel pa'i 'dir pho dang mo'i dbang po dag kyang gang rung zhig brjod par bya'o zhes bya  ba'i rgol ba'i tshig ni brjod par mi bya ste 'khrug pa'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.025#TD4036E.TXT.r#16833#16833#TD4036E.TXT.r_2458;TD4036E.TXT.r_2459;TD4036E.TXT.r_2460# tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang gtam 'dre bar bya / / +phebs par smra bar bya / / +so sor kun dga' bar bya zhing skyon 'dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can dang  dge ba gang yin zhes  btsal ba dang  gzhan dag dang chos kyi gtam smra bar 'dod pas ran par smra ba dang  rigs par smra ba dang  gnas par smra ba dang  zhi bar smra bas gzhan dag las chos kyi gtam smra bas 'dod par bya'o snyam pa dang  bdag gis mi smra bas sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par  rtog pa dag rnam par brtag par mi bya zhing / /
column8: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343995#1343996#TD4037E.TXT.r_3834# byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub sems dpas nyan thos kyi theg pa dang  ldan pa'i chos mnyan par mi bya'o // /
column9: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344003#1344004#TD4037E.TXT.r_3835;TD4037E.TXT.r_3836;TD4037E.TXT.r_3837# gzung bar mi bya'o // / +de la bslab par yang mi bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpas nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos mnyan pa dang  bzung bas ci zhig bya ste / /
column10: 0.027#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811372#1811373#TD4082E.TXT.r_551;TD4082E.TXT.r_552;TD4082E.TXT.r_553# gzung bar mi bya'o // / +de la bslab par yang mi bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpas nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos mnyan pa dang gzung bas ci zhig bya ste de la bslab mi dgos so zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smras na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal  ba dang bcas par 'gyur la / /
column11: 0.029#TD4069E.TXT.r#668174#668174#TD4069E.TXT.r_6398# dge slong de'i bshad pa de la spro bar yang mi bya zhing smad par yang mi bya'o // /

column3: la lar ni  bzod pa'i sgrar bstan / / +la lar ni brtson 'grus kyi sgrar bstan / /

column3: la lar ni bsam gtan gyi sgrar bstan / / +la lar ni shes rab kyi sgrar bstan pa de la dgongs pa gang zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811399#1811402#TD4082E.TXT.r_554;TD4082E.TXT.r_555# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur te / / +'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni mu stegs can gyi bstan bcos rnams la yang brtson par bya dgos na / /

column3: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la sbyor ba na / / +'di dag thams cad kyi spyod pa 'gro ba las dgongs pa'o // /

column3: de ltar  shes bya'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan nas / / +de sgom pa'i rab tu dbye ba ji ltar blta zhe na / /

column5: 5.960#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811416#1811418#TD4082E.TXT.r_557;TD4082E.TXT.r_558# gcig tu nges par de lhur len pa'i 'dun pa bzlog pa'i phyir  na nyes pa med do // / +rang tshul yod bzhin de la brtson // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu rnams su blta ste / / +de dag kyang gang zhe na / / +rab tu dga' ba dang  dri ma med pa dang  'od byed pa dang  'od 'phro ba tsan dang  shin tu sbyong  dka' ba dang  mngon du gyur pa dang  ring du song ba dang  mi gyo ba dang  legs pa'i blo gros dang  chos kyi sprin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693360#693370#TD4083E.TXT.r_1090;TD4083E.TXT.r_1091;TD4083E.TXT.r_1092;TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# gcig tu de la 'dun pa bzlog pa'i phyir na nyes pa med do // / +rang tshul yod bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693370#693383#TD4083E.TXT.r_1092;TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# de la brtson pa zhes bya ba ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la zhes bya bar sbyor ro // / +byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thos pa dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column18: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column20: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column21: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693082#693082#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column22: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#691120#691120#TD4083E.TXT.r_837# len par mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi bsod nams kyi grogs su 'gro ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos te / /
column23: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691195#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column24: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column25: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694262#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: 'di ltar shes bya chos kyi dbyings     // / +rnam pa bcu la mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma rig pa rnam pa bcu nyid gnas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693395#693407#TD4083E.TXT.r_1094;TD4083E.TXT.r_1095# byang chub sems dpa' rang gi theg pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod yod bzhin du de la brtson     // / +bar mi byed par de thams cad du yal bar bor nas nyan thos kyi sde snod nyid la brtson par sbyor zhing goms par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: shes bya chos kyi dbyings rnam pa bcu ji lta bu zhe na / / +sa dang po la ni kun tu 'gro ba'i don du shes par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693611#693615#TD4083E.TXT.r_1116;TD4083E.TXT.r_1115;TD4083E.TXT.r_1117# sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur pa ma yin no zhes zer zhing spong bar byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.020#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344552#1344555#TD4037E.TXT.r_3923;TD4037E.TXT.r_3924;TD4037E.TXT.r_3925;TD4037E.TXT.r_3926# byang chub sems dpa' nad pa nad kyis thebs pa dang phrad pa na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan  pas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.020#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344667#1344669#TD4037E.TXT.r_3938;TD4037E.TXT.r_3939;TD4037E.TXT.r_3940# kun  nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas rigs pa dang tshul bzhin ston par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi byed na    nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.020#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344751#1344751#TD4037E.TXT.r_3950;TD4037E.TXT.r_3951# nyon mongs  pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los mi byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.020#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344800#1344802#TD4037E.TXT.r_3956;TD4037E.TXT.r_3957;TD4037E.TXT.r_3958# byang chub sems dpa' sems can nye du dang longs spyod las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan byung ba kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pas sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur  te ; / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sel bar mi byed na / /

column15: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#691208#691208#TD4083E.TXT.r_844# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column16: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#692351#692352#TD4083E.TXT.r_972# rnam pa sna tshogs pas smra bar byed 'dod na nyon mongs pa can gyi ltung bar 'gyur ro // /

column3: gnyis pa la ni mchog gi don du'o // / +gsum pa la ni rgyu mthun pa don gyi  mchog tu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693414#693421#TD4083E.TXT.r_1096# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod med pa dang  de la goms pa nyid du byas pa dang  rgyun du byang chub sems  dpa'i sde snod bzung ba yin na nyes pa med do // /

column3: bzhi pa la ni yongs su bzung ba ma yin pa'i don du'o // / +lnga pa la ni rgyud tha dad pa med pa'i don du'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693422#693431#TD4083E.TXT.r_1096;TD4083E.TXT.r_1097;TD4083E.TXT.r_1098# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod med pa dang  de la goms pa nyid du byas pa dang  rgyun du byang chub sems  dpa'i sde snod bzung ba yin na nyes pa med do // /

column3: drug pa la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par dag pa ma yin pa'i don du'o // / +bdun pa la ni chos sna tshogs tha dad pa med pa'i don du'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693430#693441#TD4083E.TXT.r_1097;TD4083E.TXT.r_1098;TD4083E.TXT.r_1099;TD4083E.TXT.r_1100;TD4083E.TXT.r_1101# brtson min zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +brtson par byed pa zhes bya ba rjes su 'jug pa'o // /
column5: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216717#216717#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_339# sdug bsngal zad par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyis brtson par byed pa dang  gzhan yang bskal pa dpag tu med pa nas bsgoms pa las mngon par grub pa'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes     // /

column3: brgyad pa la ni bri ba med cing lhag pa  med pa'i don dang  mtshan ma la dbang ba'i gnas kyi don dang  zhing la dbang ba'i gnas kyi don du'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693442#693455#TD4083E.TXT.r_1100;TD4083E.TXT.r_1101# brtson min zhes bya ba la ni brtson par bya ba ma yin pa ste / / +de'i gzhung mngon par shes par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyi rol  gyi bstan bcos dag la brtson par byed pa ni 'das ma thag pa lta bu yin pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#691028#691028#TD4083E.TXT.r_830# gir mi byed pa ni 'das ma thag pa'i lta bu'i yin pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: dgu pa la ni ye shes la dbang ba'i gnas kyi don du'o // / +bcu pa la ni las la dbang ba'i gnas kyi don dang  gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la dbang ba'i gnas kyi don du shes par  bya'o ;; /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693456#693465#TD4083E.TXT.r_1101;TD4083E.TXT.r_1102# de'i gzhung mngon par shes par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyi rol  gyi bstan bcos dag la brtson par byed pa ni 'das ma thag pa lta bu yin pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
