column8: 0.022#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344751#1344751#TD4037E.TXT.r_3950;TD4037E.TXT.r_3951# nyon mongs  pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los mi byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.022#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344800#1344802#TD4037E.TXT.r_3956;TD4037E.TXT.r_3957;TD4037E.TXT.r_3958# byang chub sems dpa' sems can nye du dang longs spyod las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan byung ba kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pas sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur  te ; / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sel bar mi byed na / /
column10: 0.022#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811955#1811958#TD4082E.TXT.r_630;TD4082E.TXT.r_631;TD4082E.TXT.r_632# byang chub sems dpa' nad pa nad kyis thebs pa dang phrad pa na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems  dang ldan pas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.022#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812067#1812069#TD4082E.TXT.r_646;TD4082E.TXT.r_647;TD4082E.TXT.r_648# byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma'i don la tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa dag  mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas rigs pa dang  tshul bzhin ston par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi  byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column12: 0.022#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812205#1812207#TD4082E.TXT.r_667;TD4082E.TXT.r_668;TD4082E.TXT.r_669# byang chub sems dpa' sems can nye du dang  longs spyod las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan byung ba kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pas sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal  ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column13: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342239#1342239#TD4037E.TXT.r_3591;TD4037E.TXT.r_3592;TD4037E.TXT.r_3593# nyes pa dang bcas  shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column14: 0.024#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809483#1809483#TD4082E.TXT.r_326;TD4082E.TXT.r_327;TD4082E.TXT.r_328# chos sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column15: 0.024#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812148#1812148#TD4082E.TXT.r_660;TD4082E.TXT.r_661# nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur  te ; / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column16: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342151#1342151#TD4037E.TXT.r_3570;TD4037E.TXT.r_3571# sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los len par mi byed na / /
column17: 0.027#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809389#1809389#TD4082E.TXT.r_307;TD4082E.TXT.r_308# sems can  yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los len par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column18: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692285#692285#TD4083E.TXT.r_964# byang chub sems dpa' log pas 'tsho bar byed pa'i chos byung ba rnams dang du len cing mi 'dzem la sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: yongs su 'dzin pa don med dang / / +rgyud rnams tha dad med pa dang / / +nyon mongs rnam dag med don dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693484#693495#TD4083E.TXT.r_1103# shin tu yid gzhungs pa dang ldob skyen pa dang  yun ring por yang yid mi brjed pa dang  don sems pa dang rtog par byed nus pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab la rigs pas nye bar rtogs pa dang ldan pas blo mi 'gyur ba  dang ldan zhing nyin gcig bzhin du ches lhag par sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab la brtson par byed pa yin na nyes pa med do // /

column3: tha dad med pa'i don nyid dang / / +bri med 'phel ba med don dang / / +dbang ni rnam pa  bzhi yi gnas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693494#693505#TD4083E.TXT.r_1103;TD4083E.TXT.r_1104;TD4083E.TXT.r_1105# shin tu yid gzhungs pa dang ldob skyen pa dang  yun ring por yang yid mi brjed pa dang  don sems pa dang rtog par byed nus pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab la rigs pas nye bar rtogs pa dang ldan pas blo mi 'gyur ba  dang ldan zhing nyin gcig bzhin du ches lhag par sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab la brtson par byed pa yin na nyes pa med do // /

column3: chos kyi dbyings la ma rig pa // / +nyon mongs can min sgrib pa bcu / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693506#693513#TD4083E.TXT.r_1104;TD4083E.TXT.r_1105# brtson pa byas kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +brtson par bya ba la goms pa des kyang phyi rol gyi bstan bcos dag la mkhas par byed pa na de la mngon par  dga' ba'i tshul gyis pha rol gyi bstan bcos dag la mkhas par byed cing des dga' bar 'dzin des rangs par byed de // /

column3: sa bcu'i mi mthun phyogs rnams kyi // / +gnyen po dag ni sa yin no // / +ma rig pa 'di yang nyan thos rnams kyi ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693514#693522#TD4083E.TXT.r_1105# brtson par bya ba la goms pa des kyang phyi rol gyi bstan bcos dag la mkhas par byed pa na de la mngon par  dga' ba'i tshul gyis pha rol gyi bstan bcos dag la mkhas par byed cing des dga' bar 'dzin des rangs par byed de // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni nyon mongs pa can du rig  par bya'o // / +ci'i phyir sa dang po rab tu dga' ba zhes bya zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811523#1811526#TD4082E.TXT.r_569# de la mngon par dga' ba'i tshul gyis byed cing des dga' bas 'dzin la des rangs par byed de sman tsha ba la brten pa bzhin du mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal  ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693523#693532#TD4083E.TXT.r_1105;TD4083E.TXT.r_1106;TD4083E.TXT.r_1107# brtson par bya ba la goms pa des kyang phyi rol gyi bstan bcos dag la mkhas par byed pa na de la mngon par  dga' ba'i tshul gyis pha rol gyi bstan bcos dag la mkhas par byed cing des dga' bar 'dzin des rangs par byed de // /
column6: 5.960#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344139#1344142#TD4037E.TXT.r_3855;TD4037E.TXT.r_3856# der mngon par dga' ba'i tshul gyis byed cing des dga' bar 'dzin la des rangs par byed de / /
column7: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3125762#3125762#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4750;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4751# des kyang de byed la / / +des las kyi sgrib pas rab tu brjed par 'gyur ba dang  mi byed na yang ltung ba'i sgrib pas rab  tu brjed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3125792#3125792#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4755# des kyang de byed la des  las kyi sgrib pas rab tu brjed par 'gyur ba dang  mi byed na yang ltung ba'i sgrib pas rab tu brjed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3125826#3125826#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4758;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4759# des kyang de byed la / / +des las kyi sgrib pas rab tu brjed par 'gyur ba dang  mi byed na yang ltung ba'i sgrib pas rab tu brjed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: des thog ma kho nar bdag dang gzhan gyi don sgrub nus pa thob pa'i phyir ro // / +ci'i phyir sa gnyis pa dri ma med pa zhes bya zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693533#693544#TD4083E.TXT.r_1106;TD4083E.TXT.r_1107;TD4083E.TXT.r_1108;TD4083E.TXT.r_1109# sman tsha ba la brten pa bzhin du nyes par mi 'dzin la / / +bdag nyid 'dor bar byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.028#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811540#1811540#TD4082E.TXT.r_569;TD4082E.TXT.r_570;TD4082E.TXT.r_571# de la mngon par dga' ba'i tshul gyis byed cing des dga' bas 'dzin la des rangs par byed de sman tsha ba la brten pa bzhin du mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal  ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +theg pa chen po spong bar byed // /

column3: 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma thag bsrings pa'i phyir ro // / +ci'i phyir sa gsum pa 'od byed pa  zhes bya zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693545#693555#TD4083E.TXT.r_1108;TD4083E.TXT.r_1109;TD4083E.TXT.r_1110# theg pa chen po zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la / / +theg pa chen po'i phyogs 'ba' zhig la 'jug pa ni 'dir theg pa chen po'i sgra'o // /

column3: ting nge 'dzin dang  snyoms par 'jug pa nyams pa med pa'i gnas yin pas chos kyi snang ba chen po'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693556#693569#TD4083E.TXT.r_1110;TD4083E.TXT.r_1111# theg pa chen po dang ldan pa gang la la zhig zab pa'i gnas dag spong ba ni 'das ma thag pa lta bu dang  lta ba ngan pa spong ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#693299#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: ci'i phyir sa bzhin pa 'od 'phro ba can zhes bya zhe na / / +byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis sgrib pa thams cad sreg pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692324#692328#TD4083E.TXT.r_969;TD4083E.TXT.r_970# rgod pa ste rnam par ma zhi ba'i sems kyis rab tu rgod pa la sogs pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rgod pa ma yin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693565#693578#TD4083E.TXT.r_1110;TD4083E.TXT.r_1111;TD4083E.TXT.r_1112# theg pa chen po dang ldan pa gang la la zhig zab pa'i gnas dag spong ba ni 'das ma thag pa lta bu dang  lta ba ngan pa spong ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693662#693672#TD4083E.TXT.r_1120;TD4083E.TXT.r_1121# bdag la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i rgyu'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694027#694027#TD4083E.TXT.r_1159;TD4083E.TXT.r_1160# gzhan sdug bsngal rnams ji skad bstan pas sdug bsngal sel bar mi byed pa ni gzhan gyi sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694398#694398#TD4083E.TXT.r_1196;TD4083E.TXT.r_1197# gzhan gyi blo dang mthun par mi 'jug pa ni gzhan gyi blo dang mthun par 'jug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub  sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344161#1344161#TD4037E.TXT.r_3858;TD4037E.TXT.r_3859# byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las de kho na'i don nam / / +sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu las brtsams te / /
column10: 0.029#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811549#1811549#TD4082E.TXT.r_572;TD4082E.TXT.r_573# byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la de kho na'i don nam / / +sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu las bsams te zab pa mchog tu zab pa'i gnas dag  thos nas ma mos shing skur pa 'debs te / /

column3: ci'i phyir sa    lnga pa shin tu sbyang dka' ba zhes bya zhe na / / +bden pa dang 'jig rten pa'i shes pa gnyis phan tshun mi mthun pas de bsgrub dga' ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693577#693592#TD4083E.TXT.r_1111;TD4083E.TXT.r_1112# byang    chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las de kho na'i don nam // /
column5: 3.576#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344161#1344169#TD4037E.TXT.r_3858;TD4037E.TXT.r_3859;TD4037E.TXT.r_3860# byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las de kho na'i don nam / / +sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu las brtsams te / /
column6: 0.028#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811549#1811549#TD4082E.TXT.r_572;TD4082E.TXT.r_573# byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la de kho na'i don nam / / +sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu las bsams te zab pa mchog tu zab pa'i gnas dag  thos nas ma mos shing skur pa 'debs te / /

column3: ci'i phyir sa drug pa mngon du gyur zhes bya zhe na / / +rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa'i gnas yin pas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693593#693604#TD4083E.TXT.r_1112;TD4083E.TXT.r_1113;TD4083E.TXT.r_1114;TD4083E.TXT.r_1115;TD4083E.TXT.r_1116# byang chub sems dpa'i mthu las brtsams te zab pa mchog tu zab pa'i gnas dag thos nas bdag nyid ma mos shing gzhan gyi rjes su 'brang nas skur ba 'debs te / /
column5: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344179#1344181#TD4037E.TXT.r_3862;TD4037E.TXT.r_3864;TD4037E.TXT.r_3865;TD4037E.TXT.r_3866;TD4037E.TXT.r_3863# 'di     // / +chos dang ldan pa ma yin / / +de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin / / +sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes zer na / /
column6: 0.026#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811566#1811567#TD4082E.TXT.r_574;TD4082E.TXT.r_575;TD4082E.TXT.r_576;TD4082E.TXT.r_577# 'di dag ni don dang ldan pa ma yin / / +chos dang ldan pa ma yin te / / +de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin / / +sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes zer na bdag nyid kyi tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'am / /

column3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa mngon  du byed pa'i phyir ro // / +ci'i phyir sa bdun pa la ring du song ba zhes bya zhe na / /
sbyor ba las byung ba'i spyod pa'i mthar 'gro ba'i phyir ro // / +ci'i phyir sa brgyad pa mi gyo ba zhes bya zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693616#693625#TD4083E.TXT.r_1116;TD4083E.TXT.r_1117# sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur pa ma yin no zhes zer zhing spong bar byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +gang yang las dang po pa la la zhig zab pa'i  gnas dag la sems mos par ma gyur pa de lta na yang de la dad pa gtso bor gyur pa nyid kyis 'di ni bdag dang mi mthun pa ma yin no zhes bslab par bya ste / /

column3: mtshan ma dang mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyis mi gyos pa'i phyir ro // / +ci'i phyir sa dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros  zhes bya zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693626#693636#TD4083E.TXT.r_1117;TD4083E.TXT.r_1118;TD4083E.TXT.r_1119# gang yang las dang po pa la la zhig zab pa'i  gnas dag la sems mos par ma gyur pa de lta na yang de la dad pa gtso bor gyur pa nyid kyis 'di ni bdag dang mi mthun pa ma yin no zhes bslab par bya ste / /

column3: so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa dang po thob pa'i phyir ro // / +ci'i phyir sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin zhes bya zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693637#693649#TD4083E.TXT.r_1118;TD4083E.TXT.r_1119;TD4083E.TXT.r_1120# 'di ltar bdag ni long bar gyur pa ste / / +mig med pas chos yongs su spong ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin no zhes yang dag par  brtag par bya'o // /

column3: 'dres pa la dmigs pa'i chos thams cad shes pa gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad khong na yod pa sprin lta bus nam mkha' ltar rgya che ba'i sgrib pa khebs pa dang   chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692324#692328#TD4083E.TXT.r_969;TD4083E.TXT.r_970# rgod pa ste rnam par ma zhi ba'i sems kyis rab tu rgod pa la sogs pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rgod pa ma yin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692787#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693650#693657#TD4083E.TXT.r_1120# bdag la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i rgyu'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693081#693083#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061;TD4083E.TXT.r_1062# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693261#693261#TD4083E.TXT.r_1079# bsam gtan gyi bde ba nyams  su myong bar byed cing de la yon tan du lta ba ni dge ba chos dang sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro myang ba dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.023#TD4091E.TXT.r#732652#732656#TD4091E.TXT.r_6883;TD4091E.TXT.r_6884# spyin ba la sogs pa dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir te bdag shi nas bde bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing tshul khrims srung bar byed do // /
column10: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694027#694027#TD4083E.TXT.r_1159;TD4083E.TXT.r_1160# gzhan sdug bsngal rnams ji skad bstan pas sdug bsngal sel bar mi byed pa ni gzhan gyi sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694398#694398#TD4083E.TXT.r_1196;TD4083E.TXT.r_1197# gzhan gyi blo dang mthun par mi 'jug pa ni gzhan gyi blo dang mthun par 'jug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub  sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: sa 'di dag thob pa ji ltar zhe na / / +rnam pa bzhis blta ste / / +mos pa thob pas ni sa la mos pa nyid kyi phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693673#693682#TD4083E.TXT.r_1121# byang  chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis dam pa yin pa'i rlom sems kyis bdag la chags pa dang  gzhan la khong khro bas brnyas pa dang bcas pa dang  gshe ba dang bcas pas bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: spyod pa thob pas ni sa dang rab tu ldan pa'i chos spyod pa bcu thob pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691208#691213#TD4083E.TXT.r_844;TD4083E.TXT.r_845# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.015#TD4083E.TXT.r#693270#693273#TD4083E.TXT.r_1080;TD4083E.TXT.r_1081# byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i ro myong bar byed cing // / +de la yon tan du lta bar  byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342239#1342239#TD4037E.TXT.r_3591;TD4037E.TXT.r_3592;TD4037E.TXT.r_3593# nyes pa dang bcas  shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column7: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344552#1344552#TD4037E.TXT.r_3923;TD4037E.TXT.r_3924# byang chub sems dpa' nad pa nad kyis thebs pa dang phrad pa na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan  pas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344667#1344667#TD4037E.TXT.r_3938;TD4037E.TXT.r_3939;TD4037E.TXT.r_3940# kun  nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas rigs pa dang tshul bzhin ston par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi byed na    nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344800#1344800#TD4037E.TXT.r_3956;TD4037E.TXT.r_3957;TD4037E.TXT.r_3958# byang chub sems dpa' sems can nye du dang longs spyod las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan byung ba kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pas sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur  te ; / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sel bar mi byed na / /
column10: 0.016#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809483#1809483#TD4082E.TXT.r_326;TD4082E.TXT.r_327;TD4082E.TXT.r_328# chos sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column11: 0.016#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811955#1811955#TD4082E.TXT.r_630;TD4082E.TXT.r_631# byang chub sems dpa' nad pa nad kyis thebs pa dang phrad pa na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems  dang ldan pas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column12: 0.016#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812067#1812067#TD4082E.TXT.r_646;TD4082E.TXT.r_647;TD4082E.TXT.r_648# byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma'i don la tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa dag  mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas rigs pa dang  tshul bzhin ston par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi  byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column13: 0.016#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812148#1812148#TD4082E.TXT.r_660;TD4082E.TXT.r_661# nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur  te ; / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column14: 0.016#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812205#1812207#TD4082E.TXT.r_667;TD4082E.TXT.r_668;TD4082E.TXT.r_669# byang chub sems dpa' sems can nye du dang  longs spyod las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan byung ba kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pas sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal  ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column15: 0.017#TD4083E.TXT.r#693228#693229#TD4083E.TXT.r_1076;TD4083E.TXT.r_1077# de rnams byung ba nyams su myong bar byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column16: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#693407#693407#TD4083E.TXT.r_1095# bar mi byed par de thams cad du yal bar bor nas nyan thos kyi sde snod nyid la brtson par sbyor zhing goms par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column17: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693474#693474#TD4083E.TXT.r_1102# byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod nyid med kyang sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin yod bzhin du phyi rol gyi bstan bcos te mu stegs can gyi bstan bcos  la brtson par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: rtogs pa thob pas ni sa dang po la chos kyi  dbyings rtogs nas thams cad rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693692#693701#TD4083E.TXT.r_1121;TD4083E.TXT.r_1122;TD4083E.TXT.r_1123;TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# byang  chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis dam pa yin pa'i rlom sems kyis bdag la chags pa dang  gzhan la khong khro bas brnyas pa dang bcas pa dang  gshe ba dang bcas pas bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +nyes pa  med pa ni pham par 'gyur ba bzhin no // /

column3: 'grub par thob pas ni sa 'di dag gi sgom pa'i mthar 'gro ba'i phyir ro // / +sa 'di dag gi sgom pa ji ltar blta zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691196#TD4083E.TXT.r_843;TD4083E.TXT.r_844# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692274#TD4083E.TXT.r_963;TD4083E.TXT.r_964# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692980#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693035#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053;TD4083E.TXT.r_1054# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693378#693385#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thos pa dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693700#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1123;TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos kyi don du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693902#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143;TD4083E.TXT.r_1144# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693973#693976#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151;TD4083E.TXT.r_1152# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.018#TD4083E.TXT.r#693203#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#690873#690874#TD4083E.TXT.r_814# ches rgan pa la gus par mi byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul    khrims kyis shin du bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las spyod pa dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#690826#690826#TD4083E.TXT.r_809# sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis shin tu bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las rnyed pa dang  bkur sti dang du mi len cing 'dod pa chung ba dang  chog shes pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#694305#694307#TD4083E.TXT.r_1190# 'khor rnams kyi don mi byed pa ni chos  dang zang zing gis bsdus pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#694534#694536#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /
column17: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#694632#694633#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs pa la sogs pa mi byed pa ni bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692645#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007;TD4083E.TXT.r_1008# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column20: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691347#691347#TD4083E.TXT.r_859# mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column21: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693137#693137#TD4083E.TXT.r_1067# ting nge 'dzin gyi don mi tshol ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon  par bsgrub pa la brtson pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column22: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693832#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column23: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692406#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column24: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#694130#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column25: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#691120#691120#TD4083E.TXT.r_837# len par mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi bsod nams kyi grogs su 'gro ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos te / /
column26: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column27: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column28: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694262#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sa dang sa la zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sgom pa na / / +rnam pa lngas sgom ste / / +lnga gang zhe na / /

column16: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column18: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693832#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693975#693975#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column20: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693895#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column21: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694131#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: 'di  lta ste ; / +'dres par sgom pa dang  mtshan ma med par sgom pa dang  lhun gyis grub par sgom pa dang  'bar bar sgom pa dang  chog par mi 'dzin par sgom pas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#690903#690904#TD4083E.TXT.r_816;TD4083E.TXT.r_817# khong  khro ba la sogs pas gus par mi byed cing stan las mi ldang la stan mi stobs na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691058#691059#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691145#691147#TD4083E.TXT.r_839;TD4083E.TXT.r_840# byang chub sems dpa'  pha rol gyi gser la sogs pa bstabs pa nang rgyal la sogs pas len par mi byed na sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691380#691381#TD4083E.TXT.r_861;TD4083E.TXT.r_862# ma dad pa dang ma gus pas mi slob pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693722#693741#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126;TD4083E.TXT.r_1127;TD4083E.TXT.r_1128# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693915#693921#TD4083E.TXT.r_1145;TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147;TD4083E.TXT.r_1148# nga rgyal gyi grogs byed du mi 'gro na / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column10: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694050#694051#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column11: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694239#694241#TD4083E.TXT.r_1181;TD4083E.TXT.r_1182# byang chub sems dpa' nye du dang longs spyod las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing mya ngan byung ba rnams la kun nas  mnar sems kyi sems kyis mya ngan bsang bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column12: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694283#694285#TD4083E.TXT.r_1186;TD4083E.TXT.r_1187# byang chub sems dpa' sems can phongs pa rnams zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis zas dang  skom la sogs pa sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column13: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694337#694339#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192# byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyi chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don gyi mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column14: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694410#694412#TD4083E.TXT.r_1197;TD4083E.TXT.r_1198# byang chub  sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column15: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691470#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column16: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692817#692817#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030# kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column17: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693990#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column18: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694090#694091#TD4083E.TXT.r_1166;TD4083E.TXT.r_1167# sems can dag mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyis rig pa ston par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column19: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693158#693160#TD4083E.TXT.r_1069;TD4083E.TXT.r_1070# khong khro ba dang nga rgyal gyis non pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thad du gdams ngag tshol du mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa  can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column20: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694473#694473#TD4083E.TXT.r_1203;TD4083E.TXT.r_1204# byang chub sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis yang dag pa'i tshul khrims dang  thos pa dang  gtong ba la sogs pa yang dag pa'i yon tan rjod par mi byed cing yang dag pa'i bsngags pa  mi brjod pa dang  legs par smras ba la legs so zhes bya ba ma byin na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin no // /

column3: sgom pa rnam pa lnga po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'bras bu lnga mngon par 'grub par byed de / /

'di ltar  skad cig re re la gnas ngan len rnams kyis gnas thams cad 'jig par byed pa dang  sna tshogs kyi 'du shes dang bral te / / +chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba thob pa dang  chos kyi snang ba thams cad du tshad med cing rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa yang dag par shes pa dang  rnam par ma brtags par rnam     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344352#1344354#TD4037E.TXT.r_3893# yang dang yang du thos shing bzung la shes zin pa'i don gyi gtam yin par shes na nyes pa med do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693742#693751#TD4083E.TXT.r_1127;TD4083E.TXT.r_1128# ma tshor ba dang log par ston du dogs pa dang  chos     // / +smra ba'i sems srung bar 'dod pa dang  na ste mi nus pa dang  yang dang yang du thos shing bzung la shes zin pa'i don gyi gtam YIN PAR SHES PA DANG  mang du thos pa dang  thos pa 'dzin pa dang  thos pa bsags pa yin pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i  ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson pa dang shin tu shes rab rtul te len pa la zhan / /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693752#693764#TD4083E.TXT.r_1128# smra ba'i sems srung bar 'dod pa dang  na ste mi nus pa dang  yang dang yang du thos shing bzung la shes zin pa'i don gyi gtam YIN PAR SHES PA DANG  mang du thos pa dang  thos pa 'dzin pa dang  thos pa bsags pa yin pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i  ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson pa dang shin tu shes rab rtul te len pa la zhan / /

column3: par dag pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i mtshan mar rnam par brtags pa ma yin pa rnams de la kun tu 'byung ba dang  chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa dang  yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir gong ma bas ches gong ma'i rgyu yongs su 'dzin par byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693765#693785#TD4083E.TXT.r_1128;TD4083E.TXT.r_1129;TD4083E.TXT.r_1130;TD4083E.TXT.r_1131;TD4083E.TXT.r_1132# smra ba'i sems srung bar 'dod pa dang  na ste mi nus pa dang  yang dang yang du thos shing bzung la shes zin pa'i don gyi gtam yin par shes pa dang  mang du thos pa dang  thos pa 'dzin pa dang  thos pa bsags pa yin pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i  ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson pa dang shin tu shes rab rtul te len pa la zhan / /
column5: 0.015#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344382#1344383#TD4037E.TXT.r_3897;TD4037E.TXT.r_3898# shin tu shes rab rtul te chos len pa la zhan / /
column6: 0.015#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811775#1811776#TD4082E.TXT.r_604# shin tu shes rab rtul te chos len pa la zhan 'dzin pa la zhan cing dmigs pa la sems mnyam par 'jog pa la zhan pa zhig yin na nyes pa med do // /

column3: gtsor na sa bcu dag tu pha  rol tu phyin pa bcu sgom par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693786#693793#TD4083E.TXT.r_1131;TD4083E.TXT.r_1132;TD4083E.TXT.r_1133# de la ni chos ston pa'i gang zag la'o // / +smad pa ni  brnyas pa'o // /

column3: drug tu ni drug ji skad du bstan pa rnams so // / +phyi ma bzhir ni bzhi ste / / +thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693794#693803#TD4083E.TXT.r_1133;TD4083E.TXT.r_1134# yi ge dang tshig 'bru la brten nas tshig 'bru la rton pa nyid do zhes de la smod pa'i don du yi ge la brten pa ni de la smod pa dang yi ge rten no // /

column3: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693802#693812#TD4083E.TXT.r_1133;TD4083E.TXT.r_1134# yi ge dang tshig 'bru la brten nas tshig 'bru la rton pa nyid do zhes de la smod pa'i don du yi ge la brten pa ni de la smod pa dang yi ge rten no // / +yang dag pa ji lta ba'i don ni bzung la chos smra ba la khyad du gsod pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la kun du bzung nas zhes bya ba'i don te // /

column3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs  pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro // / +smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693811#693821#TD4083E.TXT.r_1134;TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# yang dag pa ji lta ba'i don ni bzung la chos smra ba la khyad du gsod pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la kun du bzung nas zhes bya ba'i don te // /

column3: phyi ma la smon lam sna tshogs mngon par bsgrubs pas / / +pha rol tu phyin pa'i rkyen sdud pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693819#693833#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135;TD4083E.TXT.r_1136# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni / / +so sor rtog pa dang bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug rgyun mi 'chad  par kun tu spyod pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344395#1344396#TD4037E.TXT.r_3898;TD4037E.TXT.r_3899# 'dzin pa la zhan cing dmigs pa la sems mnyam par 'jog pa la zhan pa zhig yin na nyes pa med do // / +byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba'i gang zag  la bsams bzhin du khyad du gsod cing bkur sti mi byed la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811793#1811793#TD4082E.TXT.r_606# byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba'i gang zag la bsams bzhin du khyad du gsod cing bkur sti mi byed la 'phya zhing bsting bar byed pa dang  tshig 'bru la rton gyi don la rton par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693828#693841#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135;TD4083E.TXT.r_1136# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.010#TD4083E.TXT.r#691347#691347#TD4083E.TXT.r_859# mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LAS nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.014#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693896#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143;TD4083E.TXT.r_1144# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.015#TD4083E.TXT.r#691279#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.015#TD4083E.TXT.r#694261#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.015#TD4083E.TXT.r#694535#694538#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209;TD4083E.TXT.r_1210# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /
column12: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#690873#690874#TD4083E.TXT.r_814# ches rgan pa la gus par mi byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul    khrims kyis shin du bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las spyod pa dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#693204#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694131#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694306#694307#TD4083E.TXT.r_1190# 'khor rnams kyi don mi byed pa ni chos  dang zang zing gis bsdus pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column20: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693712#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column21: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694633#694633#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs pa la sogs pa mi byed pa ni bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column22: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693137#693137#TD4083E.TXT.r_1067# ting nge 'dzin gyi don mi tshol ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon  par bsgrub pa la brtson pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni / / +pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag rnam par 'jog pa ste / / +ye shes kyis chos la longs spyod pa myong ba dang  sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693842#693854#TD4083E.TXT.r_1136;TD4083E.TXT.r_1137# byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba'i gang zag la bsams bzhin du khyad du gsod cing bkur sti mi  byed la 'phya bar byed cing tshig 'bru la rton gyi don la rton par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: yang pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi po 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa  pa thams cad sgom par mi 'gyur ba yang ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693855#693862#TD4083E.TXT.r_1136;TD4083E.TXT.r_1137;TD4083E.TXT.r_1138;TD4083E.TXT.r_1139# byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba'i gang zag la bsams bzhin du khyad du gsod cing bkur sti mi  byed la 'phya bar byed cing tshig 'bru la rton gyi don la rton par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +de lta re zhig tshul khrims rnam pa gsum gyi dbang du byas te / /

column3: chos kyi shes kyis bsdus par blta'o // / +sa thams cad du pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad sgom par mi 'gyur ba yang ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693863#693873#TD4083E.TXT.r_1138;TD4083E.TXT.r_1139;TD4083E.TXT.r_1140# bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bstan nas / / +de'i 'og tu yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du sems can gyi don  bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi dbang du byas par rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1346088#1346088#TD4037E.TXT.r_4137# sdug pa'i 'gro ba rnam par smin par byed pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems can gyi don rnam par smin par byed pa'i tshul khrims so // /
column6: 0.018#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2539248#2539248#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_597# tshul khrims ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi gnyen po yin la zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'chal ba'i  tshul khrims ni mi dge bas kun nas slong ba'i phyir de'i gnyen po gzugs kyis pa'i tshul khrims rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni rung ngo // /
column7: 0.019#TD4046E.TXT.r#2204276#2204277#TD4046E.TXT.r_1117;TD4046E.TXT.r_1118# byang chub 'dod pa'i bsam pas zhes bya ba ni dge ba sdud pa'i tshul khrims la'o // /
column8: 0.019#TD4047E.TXT.r#1178039#1178040#TD4047E.TXT.r_8203;TD4047E.TXT.r_8204# byang chub 'dod pa'i bsam pas zhes bya ba ni dge ba sdud pa'i tshul khrims  la'o ; / /
column9: 0.024#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1898493#1898495#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1827;TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1828# de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po 'di dag ni de'i sems kyi nye bar 'dogs pa ste / / +ji srid du zhen pa la brten pa'i tshul khrims mngon par bsal bar bya ba'i phyir dang  zhen pa la brten pa'i dran pa'i kun du rtog pa  rnams bsal bar bya ba'i phyir dang  zhen pa la brten pa'i rims nad dang ngal ba dang 'khrug pa rnams bsal bar bya ba'i phyir dang  dam pa'i chos la mngon par dga' ba dang  'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la yang dag par bskul bar bya ba'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po 'di dag ni de'i    sems kyis nye bar 'dogs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so // /
column10: 0.025#TD4046E.TXT.r#2196180#2196180#TD4046E.TXT.r_36;TD4046E.TXT.r_37# nyams par gyur na sor chud par byed pa zhes smos pa'o // / +rjes su bsrung bar bya ba'i tshul khrims ni / /
column11: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924814#924814#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4367# bdag nyid de la dga' bas lhag par rtogs pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya ba la / /
column12: 0.026#TD4041E.TXT.r#1276211#1276211#TD4041E.TXT.r_1111;TD4041E.TXT.r_1112# don dam pa'i dge sbyong du khas 'che ba'i phyir na dge slong du khas 'che ba'o // / +yang dag par blangs pa gtang ba'i phyir na tshul khrims  'chal ba'o // /
column13: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1156814#1156815#TD4047E.TXT.r_5238;TD4047E.TXT.r_5239# thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir rjes su brtse ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +tshul khrims chen po nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir  bla na med pa'i tshul khrims la sogs par rig par bya'o // /
column14: 0.029#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1898417#1898417#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1823;TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1824# phyi'i chos dang  phyi dang nang gi chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po 'di dag de'i sems kyis nye bar 'dogs pa yin te / / +zhen pa la brten pa'i tshul khrims mngon par bsal ba'i phyir dang  zhen pa la brten pa'i kun du rtog pa rnams bsal bar bya ba'i phyir dang   zhen pa la brten pa'i rims nad dang  ngal ba dang 'bad pa rnams so sor dgag par bya ba'i phyir dang  dam pa'i chos la mngon par dga' zhing 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir srung bar 'gyur te / /
column15: 0.029#TD4091E.TXT.r#740985#740986#TD4091E.TXT.r_8376;TD4091E.TXT.r_8377;TD4091E.TXT.r_8378# dmigs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ni de dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams kyi mngon par rtogs pa'o // / +bya ba'i mngon par     // / +rtogs pa ni mi ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang skye ba la sogs pas mngon par rtogs pa'o // /
column16: 0.029#TD4046E.TXT.r#2205593#2205593#TD4046E.TXT.r_1301;TD4046E.TXT.r_1302;TD4046E.TXT.r_1303# bde ba'i rgyu la 'jug pa gnang bas na / / +gnang ba'i tshul khrims so // / +de bzhin du gnyi gar phan 'dogs par byed pa'i phyir // /
column17: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1179348#1179348#TD4047E.TXT.r_8378;TD4047E.TXT.r_8379# 'di dang phyi ma la bde ba ste bde ba'i rgyu la 'jug pa gnang bas na gnang ba'i tshul khrims so // / +de bzhin du gnyi gar  phan 'dogs par byed pa'i phyir de gnyis la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can sdud pas na sdud pa'i tshul khrims so // /
column18: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1169981#1169981#TD4047E.TXT.r_7198;TD4047E.TXT.r_7199# phyir gso bar bya ba'i tshul khrims ni gang gi phyir nyams par gyur na phyir gso bar byed pa zhes smos pa'o // / +rjes su bsrung bar bya ba'i tshul khrims ni gang gi phyir / /
column19: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#686919#686919#TD4083E.TXT.r_336# byang chub chen por yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir bla na med pa dang  bslab    pa'i gzhi rgya chen po yongs su bzung ba'i phyir gsal ba dang  'dod pa'i bsod nams dang bdag dub par byed pa'i mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i phyir kha na ma tho ba med pa dang  rab tu dga' ba'i gnas dang mthun pa dang  ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa 'bul bar mi byed pa'i phyir  rtag tu byed pa dang  rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang phas kyi rgol ba dang  nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams zil gyis mi non cing mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir brtan pa dang  dregs pa'i rang bzhin gyi rgyan dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang  gnas skabs thams cad du tshul  khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi rgyan dang ldan pa srog gcod pa la sogs pa spangs pa'i phyir ldog pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba la sbyor ba'i phyir 'jug pa'i tshul khrims dang rjes su srung ba'i phyir kun nas srung ba'i tshul  khrims dang  skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnam par smin par byed pa dang  lhag pa'i sems rnam par smin par byed ba dang  sdug pa'i 'gro ba rnam par smin par byed pa dang  sems can gyi don rnam par smin par byed pa'o // /

column3: chos kyi rnam grangs de pha rol tu phyin pa'i sde snod kyis bsdus pa'i phyir ro // / +dus ji srid cig gis sa bcu  po 'di dag gi sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693870#693885#TD4083E.TXT.r_1139;TD4083E.TXT.r_1140;TD4083E.TXT.r_1141;TD4083E.TXT.r_1142;TD4083E.TXT.r_1143# de'i 'og tu yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du sems can gyi don  bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi dbang du byas par rig par bya'o // / +dgos pa'i grogs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
column5: 0.018#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2539248#2539248#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_597# tshul khrims ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi gnyen po yin la zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'chal ba'i  tshul khrims ni mi dge bas kun nas slong ba'i phyir de'i gnyen po gzugs kyis pa'i tshul khrims rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni rung ngo // /
column6: 0.025#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2933177#2933177#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8990;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8992# rgyal sras grogs po 'dra ba'o // / +ji ltar grogs pos grogs po la las rnam pa lngas phan 'dogs par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang las rnam pa lngas sems can la phan 'dogs  par byed pas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi grogs por 'gyur ba'o // /
column7: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924814#924814#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4367# bdag nyid de la dga' bas lhag par rtogs pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya ba la / /
column8: 0.026#TD4053E.TXT.r#2996266#2996266#TD4053E.TXT.r_4223;TD4053E.TXT.r_4225;TD4053E.TXT.r_4226# spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni  rdzas su yod pa'o // / +kun rdzob tu yod pa'o // / +don dam par yod pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa chos rab tu 'byed pa'o // /
column9: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#157213#157213#TD4035E.TXT.r_5578;TD4035E.TXT.r_5579# ring po mi thogs pa nye bar gnas pa yin  na gzhan gyi dbang gi don to // / +gzhan gyi dbang yin na byed pa med pa'i don to // /
column10: 0.027#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2901065#2901065#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4654# de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa slob dpon klu sgrub la sogs pa lta bus gnyis su med par bshad pa'i don la rton pa ni tshad mar  gyur pas bshad pa'i don la rton pa zhes bya ste / /
column11: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#508640#508640#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7753# 'di ltar 'phags pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du  dngos po rnams sgyu ma la sogs pa lta bur yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid med par khong du CHUD PA'I PHYIR RO // /
column12: 0.028#TD4032E.TXT.r#1951416#1951417#TD4032E.TXT.r_4878;TD4032E.TXT.r_4879# 'di ni zhugs pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +sogs pa smos pas ni    'di ni sbyor ba'o // /
column13: 0.028#TD4053E.TXT.r#2971140#2971141#TD4053E.TXT.r_910;TD4053E.TXT.r_911# nams 'dod pa dang  mchog 'dod pa'i phyir gang du zas mi za ba la sogs pas nyon mongs pa der lha rten byed pa'o // / +'phen PA'AM YONGS SU RDZOGS PAR BYED pa zhes bya ba ni ngan 'gro'i dbang du byas pa'o // /
column14: 0.028#TD4069E.TXT.r#631102#631102#TD4069E.TXT.r_1191;TD4069E.TXT.r_1192# res 'ga' ni nye bar mi gnas zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // / +mi la sogs pa rnyed pa'i sogs pa'i sgras ni yul dbus su skyes pa dang  dbang po rnams ma tshang ba med pa nyid ces bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o // /
column15: 0.029#TD4054E.TXT.r#1000764#1000764#TD4054E.TXT.r_1558;TD4054E.TXT.r_1559# rnam par mi rtog pa dang   rnam par rtog pa dang  rgyu dang  'jug pa dang  rgyu mtshan dang  rgyu mtshan las byung ba dang  mi mthun pa dang  gnyen po dang  phra ba'i rab tu phye bas kyang rnam par shes par bya bar blta bar bya'o // / +de la rnam par mi rtog pas zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag gis so // /
column16: 0.029#TD4033E.TXT.r#1383525#1383525#TD4033E.TXT.r_373;TD4033E.TXT.r_374# mngon par brjod pas mngon par brjod pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar zag pa med pa'i chos mngon sum du brjod pas rjod par byed pa'o // / +de ni 'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yin no zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong yin pa'o // /
column17: 0.029#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1440651#1440651#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_4745;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_4746;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_4747# ma rig pa tsam de dang zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa gzhan dang ma yin pa'o // / +bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang / / +zhes bya ba ni mthong bas spangs par bya ba ma yin pa'o // /
column18: 0.029#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2622089#2622089#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10663# mthong bas spang bar bya ba zhes bya ba ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i rnam pa'o // /
column19: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#794547#794547#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4651;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4652# rang gi dbang po'i byed pas zhes bya ba la / / +rang gi dbang po'i byed pa smos pas ni / /
column20: 0.029#TD4046E.TXT.r#2204276#2204277#TD4046E.TXT.r_1117;TD4046E.TXT.r_1118# byang chub 'dod pa'i bsam pas zhes bya ba ni dge ba sdud pa'i tshul khrims la'o // /
column21: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1178039#1178040#TD4047E.TXT.r_8203;TD4047E.TXT.r_8204# byang chub 'dod pa'i bsam pas zhes bya ba ni dge ba sdud pa'i tshul khrims  la'o ; / /
column22: 0.029#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2761137#2761139#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_8528# de la bram ze rnams kyi longs spyod kyi chos ni bar du gcod pa spos dang  me tog phreng dang  byug pa dang  rgyal mtshan la sogs pa yongs su longs spyod pa'i  phyir dang  bro gar mkhan dang  zlos gar mkhan dang  bzhad gad mkhan dang  'jo sgeg mkhan la sogs pa la lta bas yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir dang  'khrig pa'i chos kyi longs spyod pa'i phyir ngan pa yin no // /
column23: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2958173#2958173#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_12457;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_12458;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_12459# sems can rnams bde ba la gzhag par sems pa'o // / +snying rje'i 'tshe ba'i gnyen  po ste / / +sdug bsngal med par byed pa'i bsam pa'o zhes bya ba la / /

column3: gang zag lnga ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis rdzogs par 'gyur te / / +mos pas spyod pa'i gang zag ni bskal pa grangs med pa dang pos rdzogs par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692980#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693035#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053;TD4083E.TXT.r_1054# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694130#694132#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172;TD4083E.TXT.r_1173# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.014#TD4083E.TXT.r#693204#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.014#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.017#TD4083E.TXT.r#693384#693385#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thos pa dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693261#693261#TD4083E.TXT.r_1079# bsam gtan gyi bde ba nyams  su myong bar byed cing de la yon tan du lta ba ni dge ba chos dang sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro myang ba dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694306#694307#TD4083E.TXT.r_1190# 'khor rnams kyi don mi byed pa ni chos  dang zang zing gis bsdus pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#694448#694448#TD4083E.TXT.r_1202# gzhan dag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa smra bar mi byed pa ni yon tan  gyi bsngags pa smra ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693712#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#692729#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694633#694633#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs pa la sogs pa mi byed pa ni bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693137#693137#TD4083E.TXT.r_1067# ting nge 'dzin gyi don mi tshol ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon  par bsgrub pa la brtson pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa la spyod pa mtshan ma la  spyod pa dang  mtshan ma med pa la spyod pa dag ni sa drug po dag dang  bdun pa la bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis pas rdzogs par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693903#693917#TD4083E.TXT.r_1144;TD4083E.TXT.r_1145;TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147# byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don bya ba'i don gnyer bar gnas shing bcol ba la khong khro ba'am / /

column3: de nyid mngon par 'du byed par spyod pa ni // / +de yan chad sa bcu'i bar du bskal pa grangs med pa gsum pas sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691467#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692817#692818#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030# kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693990#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694050#694056#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161;TD4083E.TXT.r_1162# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694089#694094#TD4083E.TXT.r_1166;TD4083E.TXT.r_1167;TD4083E.TXT.r_1168# sems can dag mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyis rig pa ston par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693731#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column10: 0.027#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811720#1811720#TD4082E.TXT.r_595;TD4082E.TXT.r_596# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang  le los mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694181#694181#TD4083E.TXT.r_1176;TD4083E.TXT.r_1177# nga rgyal dang khong khro bas mnyam pa'am de bas lhag pa'i mthun pa'i phan gdags pas lan du phan mi 'dogs na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /

column3: 'dir tshigs su    bcad pa // / +bzang dang smon pa'i stobs can dang  sems brtan khyad par 'gro ba yi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693922#693931#TD4083E.TXT.r_1147;TD4083E.TXT.r_1148# le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // / +na ste mi nus pa dang gzhan la sngar khas blangs zin pa dang  rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i phyogs la brtson pa dang  yid rtul po zhig ste mi mkhas pa yin pa dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa dang  dge 'dun gyi nang  khrims srung bar 'dod pa dang  gzhan mang po dag gis sems srung bar 'dod pa dang ma bcol ba dang  bcol bar gyur kyang gzhan zhig la yang bcol ba dang  gnod pa dang ldan pa'am / /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gsum // / +kun tu rtsom pa mdzad ces brjod // / +de ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu sgom pa'i rab tu dbye ba bstan nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693932#693946#TD4083E.TXT.r_1148# na ste mi nus pa dang gzhan la sngar khas blangs zin pa dang  rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i phyogs la brtson pa dang  yid rtul po zhig ste mi mkhas pa yin pa dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa dang  dge 'dun gyi nang  khrims srung bar 'dod pa dang  gzhan mang po dag gis sems srung bar 'dod pa dang ma bcol ba dang  bcol bar gyur kyang gzhan zhig la yang bcol ba dang  gnod pa dang ldan pa'am / /

column3: de la lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi khyad par ji ltar blta zhe na / / +byang chub  sems dpa' sa las byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa las ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693943#693961#TD4083E.TXT.r_1148;TD4083E.TXT.r_1149# na ste mi nus pa dang gzhan la sngar khas blangs zin pa dang  rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i phyogs la brtson pa dang  yid rtul po zhig ste mi mkhas pa yin pa dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa dang  dge 'dun gyi nang  khrims srung bar 'dod pa dang  gzhan mang po dag gis sems srung bar 'dod pa dang ma bcol ba dang  bcol bar gyur kyang gzhan zhig la yang bcol ba dang  gnod pa dang ldan pa'am / /

column3: mdor bsdu na khyad par bzhis khyad par du blta ste / / +rab tu dbye ba'i khyad par dang  bslab pa thun mong dang  thun mong ma yin pa'i khyad par dang  rgya che ba nyid kyi khyad par dang  zab pa nyid  kyi khyad par gyis khyad par du blta'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692274#TD4083E.TXT.r_963;TD4083E.TXT.r_964# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693962#693980#TD4083E.TXT.r_1149;TD4083E.TXT.r_1150;TD4083E.TXT.r_1151;TD4083E.TXT.r_1152# chos dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i bya ba yin pa dang  pha rol po rang nyid byed nus pa dang   rten yod pa nyid yin na nyes pa med do // / +nad pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694217#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180;TD4083E.TXT.r_1181# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.010#TD4083E.TXT.r#691347#691347#TD4083E.TXT.r_859# mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.017#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691196#TD4083E.TXT.r_843;TD4083E.TXT.r_844# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column9: 0.018#TD4083E.TXT.r#693203#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#690800#690800#TD4083E.TXT.r_805;TD4083E.TXT.r_806# bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i sar chud pas mchod pa'i mchog gis mchod par byed na nyes pa med  do ;; / +'dod pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
column11: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693082#693083#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061;TD4083E.TXT.r_1062# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692645#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007;TD4083E.TXT.r_1008# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#694632#694633#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs pa la sogs pa mi byed pa ni bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693711#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693137#693137#TD4083E.TXT.r_1067# ting nge 'dzin gyi don mi tshol ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon  par bsgrub pa la brtson pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column20: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#690825#690826#TD4083E.TXT.r_809# sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis shin tu bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las rnyed pa dang  bkur sti dang du mi len cing 'dod pa chung ba dang  chog shes pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column21: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#691120#691120#TD4083E.TXT.r_837# len par mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi bsod nams kyi grogs su 'gro ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos te / /

column3: de la rab tu dbye ba'i khyad par ni / / +sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#690903#690904#TD4083E.TXT.r_816;TD4083E.TXT.r_817# khong  khro ba la sogs pas gus par mi byed cing stan las mi ldang la stan mi stobs na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691058#691059#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691145#691149#TD4083E.TXT.r_839;TD4083E.TXT.r_840;TD4083E.TXT.r_841# byang chub sems dpa'  pha rol gyi gser la sogs pa bstabs pa nang rgyal la sogs pas len par mi byed na sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691211#691213#TD4083E.TXT.r_844;TD4083E.TXT.r_845# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691380#691381#TD4083E.TXT.r_861;TD4083E.TXT.r_862# ma dad pa dang ma gus pas mi slob pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column9: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693981#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1152;TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# byang chub sems dpa' nad kyis thebs pa'i sems can dang phrad pa na khong khro ba'am / / +nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694239#694243#TD4083E.TXT.r_1181;TD4083E.TXT.r_1182;TD4083E.TXT.r_1183# byang chub sems dpa' nye du dang longs spyod las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing mya ngan byung ba rnams la kun nas  mnar sems kyi sems kyis mya ngan bsang bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column11: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694283#694285#TD4083E.TXT.r_1186;TD4083E.TXT.r_1187# byang chub sems dpa' sems can phongs pa rnams zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis zas dang  skom la sogs pa sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
