column14: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694050#694050#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /

column3: sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa'i rten gyi don du rig par bya'o // / +sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims ni / / +sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i rten gyi don du rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694000#694013#TD4083E.TXT.r_1155;TD4083E.TXT.r_1156;TD4083E.TXT.r_1157;TD4083E.TXT.r_1158;TD4083E.TXT.r_1159# nad yun rings kyis thebs te so tsam du 'dug pa ni nyes pa med do // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa nyan thos rnams dang thun  mong ba ni / / +rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa kun tu mi spyod pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694011#694023#TD4083E.TXT.r_1157;TD4083E.TXT.r_1158;TD4083E.TXT.r_1159# sdug bsngal zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams kyi zhes lhag ma'o // / +gzhan sdug bsngal rnams ji skad bstan pas sdug bsngal sel bar mi byed pa ni gzhan gyi sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#1355118#1355118#TD4037E.TXT.r_5223;TD4037E.TXT.r_5225# gzhan gyis lag pa dang  bong bas bsnun pa la sogs pa dang  sha sbrang dang  sbrang bu mchu  rings la sogs pas zin pa dang  spyod lam sna gcig gis gnas pa'i sdug bsngal lo // / +bdag nyid rgud pa'i sdug bsngal dang  gzhan rgud pa'i sdug bsngal dang  nye du rgud pa'i sdug bsngal dang  longs spyod nyams pa'i sdug bsngal dang  nad med  pa las nyams pa'i sdug bsngal dang  tshul khrims nyams pa'i sdug bsngal dang  lta ba nyams pa'i sdug bsngal dang  tshe 'di'i sdug bsngal dang  tshe phyi ma'i sdug bsngal lo // /

column3: bslab pa thun mong ma yin pa ni / / +bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa kun tu spyod pa'i phyir te / / +bslab pa de la ni gang du nyan thos kyi ltung bar 'gyur ba de la byang chub sems dpa'i ltung ba med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694022#694038#TD4083E.TXT.r_1159;TD4083E.TXT.r_1160# gzhan sdug bsngal rnams ji skad bstan pas sdug bsngal sel bar mi byed pa ni gzhan gyi sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694397#694398#TD4083E.TXT.r_1196;TD4083E.TXT.r_1197# gzhan gyi blo dang mthun par mi 'jug pa ni gzhan gyi blo dang mthun par 'jug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692326#692326#TD4083E.TXT.r_969;TD4083E.TXT.r_970# rgod pa ste rnam par ma zhi ba'i sems kyis rab tu rgod pa la sogs pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rgod pa ma yin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang  chub sems dpa' rgod pas gzhan dag rgod du gzhug par 'dod cing / /
column7: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693567#693567#TD4083E.TXT.r_1110;TD4083E.TXT.r_1111# theg pa chen po dang ldan pa gang la la zhig zab pa'i gnas dag spong ba ni 'das ma thag pa lta bu dang  lta ba ngan pa spong ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang    chub sems dpa' gang la la ZHIG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I sde snod las de kho na'i don nam // /
column8: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693664#693664#TD4083E.TXT.r_1120;TD4083E.TXT.r_1121# bdag la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i rgyu'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang  chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis dam pa yin pa'i rlom sems kyis bdag la chags pa dang  gzhan la khong khro bas brnyas PA DANG BCAS PA DANG  GSHE BA DANG BCAS PAS bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#693204#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: gang du byang chub  sems dpa'i ltung bar 'gyur ba de la nyan thos kyi ltung ba med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694039#694051#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#693270#693272#TD4083E.TXT.r_1080;TD4083E.TXT.r_1081# byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i ro myong bar byed cing // / +de la yon tan du lta bar  byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims ni / / +lus dang ngag dang sems kyi'o // / +nyan thos rnams kyi ni lus dang ngag nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691145#691149#TD4083E.TXT.r_839;TD4083E.TXT.r_840;TD4083E.TXT.r_841# byang chub sems dpa'  pha rol gyi gser la sogs pa bstabs pa nang rgyal la sogs pas len par mi byed na sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691380#691381#TD4083E.TXT.r_861;TD4083E.TXT.r_862# ma dad pa dang ma gus pas mi slob pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692817#692823#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030;TD4083E.TXT.r_1031# kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693731#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' CHOS  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694089#694092#TD4083E.TXT.r_1166;TD4083E.TXT.r_1167# sems can dag mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyis rig pa ston par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694336#694349#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192;TD4083E.TXT.r_1193# byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyi chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don gyi mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694410#694413#TD4083E.TXT.r_1197;TD4083E.TXT.r_1198# byang chub  sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column11: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691470#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPAS SEMS can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column12: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693990#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column13: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693158#693160#TD4083E.TXT.r_1069;TD4083E.TXT.r_1070# khong khro ba dang nga rgyal gyis non pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thad du gdams ngag tshol du mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa  can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column14: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#691305#691305#TD4083E.TXT.r_853;TD4083E.TXT.r_854;TD4083E.TXT.r_855# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS can tshul khrims 'chal zhing log par spyod pa rnams la kun nas mnar sems la sogs  bas yal bar 'dor zhing tshul khrims 'chal ba nyid kyi rkyen gyis de rnams la khyad du gsod cing de rnams la phan pa dang bde ba la gnod par mi byed na / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur te / / +snyom las la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ste / /
column15: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694473#694473#TD4083E.TXT.r_1203;TD4083E.TXT.r_1204# byang chub sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis yang dag pa'i tshul khrims dang  thos pa dang  gtong ba la sogs pa yang dag pa'i yon tan rjod par mi byed cing yang dag pa'i bsngags pa  mi brjod pa dang  legs par smras ba la legs so zhes bya ba ma byin na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin no // /

column3: de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi ltung bar yang 'gyur gyi / / +nyan thos rnams  kyi ni ma yin no // / +mdor bsdu na gang kha na ma tho ba med par sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i lus dang  ngag dang yid kyi las de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyad par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694057#694065#TD4083E.TXT.r_1161;TD4083E.TXT.r_1162;TD4083E.TXT.r_1163;TD4083E.TXT.r_1164# le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can MA YIN PA'O // / +nyes pa med pa ni  'das ma thag PA BZHIN NO // / +bag med ces bya ba la sogs pa la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694066#694078#TD4083E.TXT.r_1164;TD4083E.TXT.r_1165# bag med pa rnams la ji skad bstan pa'i rigs pa mi ston pa ni rigs pa ston pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes pa byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344640#1344643#TD4037E.TXT.r_3936;TD4037E.TXT.r_3937# nad gyog la ji lta ba bzhin du sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i grogs bya ba yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma'i don la tshul ma yin par zhugs pa dag mthong na / /

column3: de la bslab par byang bya ste / / +de ltar na thun mong ma yin pas khyad par du blta'o /// /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694076#694091#TD4083E.TXT.r_1164;TD4083E.TXT.r_1165;TD4083E.TXT.r_1166;TD4083E.TXT.r_1167# bag med pa rnams la ji skad bstan pa'i rigs pa mi ston pa ni rigs pa ston pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes pa byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma'i don la tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa'i     // /

column3: rgya che ba nyid kyi khyad par ni rgya che ba nyid rnam pa bzhi'i phyir te / / +sna tshogs dang tshad med pa'i bslab pa rgya che ba nyid dang  bsod nams tshad med pa yongs su 'dzin pa rgya che ba nyid dang  sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bya ba'i bsam pa yongs  su 'dzin pa rgya che ba nyid dang  bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la brten pa rgya che ba nyid kyi phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691467#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693990#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694094#694105#TD4083E.TXT.r_1166;TD4083E.TXT.r_1167;TD4083E.TXT.r_1168;TD4083E.TXT.r_1169;TD4083E.TXT.r_1170# sems can dag mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyis rig pa ston par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // / +bdag nyid mi shes pa dang gzhan dag la bcol na nyes pa med do // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694106#694114#TD4083E.TXT.r_1169;TD4083E.TXT.r_1170;TD4083E.TXT.r_1171# byas zhes bya  ba la sogs pa la / / +byas pa ni pha rol gyis phan gdags pa'o // /
column8: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#694180#694182#TD4083E.TXT.r_1176;TD4083E.TXT.r_1177# nga rgyal dang khong khro bas mnyam pa'am de bas lhag pa'i mthun pa'i phan gdags pas lan du phan mi 'dogs na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column9: 0.018#TD4083E.TXT.r#691055#691063#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833;TD4083E.TXT.r_834# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column11: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694569#694569#TD4083E.TXT.r_1212;TD4083E.TXT.r_1213# skrod par mi byed na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /

column3: de la zab pa nyid ni gang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa rnams de lta bus srog gcod pa la pa sogs pa'i las rnam pa bcu spyod kyang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694112#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1170;TD4083E.TXT.r_1171;TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# byas pa ni pha rol gyis phan gdags pa'o // / +de'i phyir de la phan gdags pas slar phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid ni lan du phan 'dogs pa nyid do // /

column3: des kha na ma tho bar yang mi  'gyur la / / +bsod nams tshad med pa yang skyed cing / / +bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694132#694141#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172;TD4083E.TXT.r_1173;TD4083E.TXT.r_1174# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub sems dpa' de rang nyid nus pa dang ldan nam mi ldan yang rung // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694262#694269#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185;TD4083E.TXT.r_1186# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.015#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693895#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692644#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692272#TD4083E.TXT.r_963# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693832#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693082#693082#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693712#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691195#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column19: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693204#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column20: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column21: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694535#694536#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /
column22: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694633#694633#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs pa la sogs pa mi byed pa ni bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column23: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: yang sprul pa'i lus dang ngag gi las kyang / / +byang chub sems dpa'i zab pa'i tshul khrims su rig par bya ste / / +des rgyal srid kyang byed cing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694140#694149#TD4083E.TXT.r_1173;TD4083E.TXT.r_1174# byang chub sems dpa' de rang nyid nus pa dang ldan nam mi ldan yang rung // / +kun nas mnar sems dang ldan pa dang  snying brtse ba dang zhes dang bral bas yon tan len par mi byed pa dang  dmu rgod kyi rang bzhin can dang   dge ba'i bshes gnyen gzhan gyis yongs su zin pa dang  gzhan gyis phan btags pa byas pa'ang rung // /

column3: sems can rnams la gtse ba sna tshogs bstan nas / / +sems can 'dul ba'i yongs su smin par bya ba yang 'grub par byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694150#694160#TD4083E.TXT.r_1174;TD4083E.TXT.r_1175# kun nas mnar sems dang ldan pa dang  snying brtse ba dang zhes dang bral bas yon tan len par mi byed pa dang  dmu rgod kyi rang bzhin can dang   dge ba'i bshes gnyen gzhan gyis yongs su zin pa dang  gzhan gyis phan btags pa byas pa'ang rung // /

column3: 'di ni gzhan la gnod pa bya bas / / +de las gzhan pa'i sems can la phan 'dogs pa kun tu ston pas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694161#694169#TD4083E.TXT.r_1174;TD4083E.TXT.r_1175;TD4083E.TXT.r_1176# kun nas mnar sems dang ldan pa dang  snying brtse ba dang zhes dang bral bas yon tan len par mi byed pa dang  dmu rgod kyi rang bzhin can dang   dge ba'i bshes gnyen gzhan gyis yongs su zin pa dang  gzhan gyis phan btags pa byas pa'ang rung // / +sems can phan 'dogs pa de mthong na byas pa mi gzo ste / /

column3: gzhan dag sems dang pa sngon du 'gro  ba'i yongs su smin par bya ba yang 'grus par byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694170#694182#TD4083E.TXT.r_1176;TD4083E.TXT.r_1177# nga rgyal dang khong khro bas mnyam pa'am de bas lhag pa'i mthun pa'i phan gdags pas lan du phan mi 'dogs na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims zab pa nyid kyi khyad par ro // / +mdor bsdu na khyad par rnam pa 'di bzhis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa khyad par can du rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692815#692818#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030# kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693916#693918#TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147;TD4083E.TXT.r_1145# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694178#694198#TD4083E.TXT.r_1176;TD4083E.TXT.r_1177;TD4083E.TXT.r_1178;TD4083E.TXT.r_1179# nga rgyal dang khong khro bas mnyam pa'am de bas lhag pa'i mthun pa'i phan gdags pas lan du phan mi 'dogs na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694566#694569#TD4083E.TXT.r_1212;TD4083E.TXT.r_1213# skrod par mi byed na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#690977#690978#TD4083E.TXT.r_826;TD4083E.TXT.r_827# byang chub sems dpa' pha rol po  dag 'dri ba dang  kun du smra ba dang  yang dag par dga' bar byed pa la nga rgyal la sogs pas yang dag par lan mi 'debs pa dang  kun du mi smra ba dang  yang dag par dga' bar mi byed pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon  mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column9: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#691467#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693159#693160#TD4083E.TXT.r_1069;TD4083E.TXT.r_1070# khong khro ba dang nga rgyal gyis non pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thad du gdams ngag tshol du mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa  can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column11: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693991#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /

column3: rab tu dbye ba 'dis na byang chub sems  dpa'i bslab pa'i rab tu dbye ba tshad med de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694193#694200#TD4083E.TXT.r_1178;TD4083E.TXT.r_1179;TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# lan du phan gdags pa'i phyir 'bad kyang ma nus pa dang  de nyid lan du phan gdags par mi 'dod pa dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa la ni nyes pa med do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694381#694383#TD4083E.TXT.r_1194;TD4083E.TXT.r_1195;TD4083E.TXT.r_1196# gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa'i bya ba dag rang nyid kyis byas zin pa dang  mu stegs can yin pa  las chos rkur 'ongs la de yang 'dul ba'i skal ba med pa zhig yin na nyes pa med do // / +gzhan gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /

column3: dper na 'dul bar bsnyad pa shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde las 'byung ba lta bu'o //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694201#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1179;TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan gyi zhes bya ba  la sogs pa la / / +gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma'o // / +de ltar lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa khyad par bstan nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693203#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni SDOM PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI RTOG PA ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI SNYOMS PAR 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694306#694312#TD4083E.TXT.r_1190;TD4083E.TXT.r_1191# 'khor rnams kyi don mi byed pa ni chos  dang zang zing gis bsdus pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694448#694455#TD4083E.TXT.r_1202;TD4083E.TXT.r_1201;TD4083E.TXT.r_1203# gzhan dag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa smra bar mi byed pa ni yon tan  gyi bsngags pa smra ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.014#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693894#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#694535#694536#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /
column9: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#694633#694633#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs pa la sogs pa mi byed pa ni bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni SDOM PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI GCIG tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYIS BSDUS pa'i rnam PAR DAG PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI LOG  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693384#693385#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYIS THOS PA dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693712#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI THOS PA la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#693831#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691195#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column16: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692644#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don BYA BA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI TSHUL khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692272#TD4083E.TXT.r_963# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni SDOM PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI 'TSHO ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column20: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column21: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI PHA rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column22: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693082#693082#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYIS 'DU 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column23: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni SDOM PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI DES PA las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column24: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#694262#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column25: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693261#693261#TD4083E.TXT.r_1079# bsam gtan gyi bde ba nyams  su myong bar byed cing de la yon tan du lta ba ni dge ba chos dang SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI SNYOMS PAR 'jug pa'i ro myang ba dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: lhag pa'i sems kyi khyad par ji ltar blta zhe na / / +mdor bsdu na rab tu  dbye ba drug gis blta bar bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694218#694227#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180;TD4083E.TXT.r_1181# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub sems dpa' nye du dang longs spyod las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing mya ngan byung ba rnams la kun nas  mnar sems kyi sems kyis mya ngan bsang bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: dmigs pas rab tu dbye ba dang  sna tshogs nyid kyis rab tu dbye ba dang  gnyen pos rab tu dbye ba dang  las su rung ba nyid kyis rab tu dbye ba dang  mngon par sgrub pas rab tu dbye ba dang  las kyis rab tu dbye ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691145#691149#TD4083E.TXT.r_839;TD4083E.TXT.r_840;TD4083E.TXT.r_841# byang chub sems dpa'  pha rol gyi gser la sogs pa bstabs pa nang rgyal la sogs pas len par mi byed na sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691209#691217#TD4083E.TXT.r_844;TD4083E.TXT.r_845;TD4083E.TXT.r_846# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691380#691381#TD4083E.TXT.r_861;TD4083E.TXT.r_862# ma dad pa dang ma gus pas mi slob pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693916#693917#TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147;TD4083E.TXT.r_1145# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694228#694244#TD4083E.TXT.r_1181;TD4083E.TXT.r_1182;TD4083E.TXT.r_1183# byang chub sems dpa' nye du dang longs spyod las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing mya ngan byung ba rnams la kun nas  mnar sems kyi sems kyis mya ngan bsang bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694282#694289#TD4083E.TXT.r_1186;TD4083E.TXT.r_1187;TD4083E.TXT.r_1188# byang chub sems dpa' sems can phongs pa rnams zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis zas dang  skom la sogs pa sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694337#694339#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192# byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyi chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don gyi mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column11: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694410#694420#TD4083E.TXT.r_1197;TD4083E.TXT.r_1198;TD4083E.TXT.r_1199;TD4083E.TXT.r_1200# byang chub  sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column12: 2.384#TD4083E.TXT.r#693990#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column13: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#690903#690905#TD4083E.TXT.r_816;TD4083E.TXT.r_817# khong  khro ba la sogs pas gus par mi byed cing stan las mi ldang la stan mi stobs na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column14: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#691469#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column15: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692816#692817#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030# kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column16: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#691058#691058#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /

column3: theg pa chen po'i chos la    dmigs pa'i phyir ro // / +theg pa chen po snang ba dang  bsod nams thams cad yang dag par bsags pa dang  ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po bzang skyong dang  dpa' bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs nyid tshad med pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691467#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692817#692817#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030# kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693990#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694244#694252#TD4083E.TXT.r_1182;TD4083E.TXT.r_1183;TD4083E.TXT.r_1184;TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // / +nyes pa med pa ni grogs su 'gro ba bzhin no // /
column9: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694253#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1184;TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694535#694536#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /
column11: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691195#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column14: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#693712#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693384#693385#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thos pa dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#693974#693977#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151;TD4083E.TXT.r_1152# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693082#693082#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#690903#690903#TD4083E.TXT.r_816;TD4083E.TXT.r_817# khong  khro ba la sogs pas gus par mi byed cing stan las mi ldang la stan mi stobs na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column19: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691058#691058#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column20: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column21: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692644#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column22: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang SLAR KHRO BA LA SOGS pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column23: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column24: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693204#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column25: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694633#694633#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs pa la sogs pa mi byed pa ni bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column26: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694569#694569#TD4083E.TXT.r_1212;TD4083E.TXT.r_1213# skrod par mi byed na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column27: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692272#TD4083E.TXT.r_963# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column28: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column29: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column30: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693831#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column31: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#693137#693137#TD4083E.TXT.r_1067# ting nge 'dzin gyi don mi tshol ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon  par bsgrub pa la brtson pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: chos thams cad 'dres pa la dmigs pa'i ye shes  kyis ; / +khye'u khye'u dbyung ba'i tshul du kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la sgrib pa'i gang du 'dod par skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694270#694284#TD4083E.TXT.r_1186;TD4083E.TXT.r_1187# byang chub sems dpa' sems can phongs pa rnams zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis zas dang  skom la sogs pa sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.015#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344826#1344827#TD4037E.TXT.r_3962# byang chub  sems dpa' zas dang skom la sogs pa 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba la zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad rnams kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas ma byin na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur     // /

column3: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du thogs pa med  pa'i mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa dang  gyo bar byed pa dang  'bar bar byed pa dang  khyab par byed pa dang  ston pa dang  gzhan gyi dngos por bsgyur ba dang  'gro ba dang  'ong ba dang  sdud pa dang  rgyas par byed pa dang  gzugs kyi lus thams cad 'jog pa dang  skal ba  mnyam pas 'gro ba dang  snang bar byed cing mi snang bar yang byed pa dang  dbang nyid du byed pa dang  gzhan gyi rdzu 'phrul rab tu 'jog pa dang  spobs pa dang  dran pa dang  bde ba sbyin pa dang  'od zer gtong ba'i rgyu 'phrul chen po mngon par sgrub pa dang  dka' ba spyod pa thams cad  bsdus pa dka' ba spyod pa rnam pa bcu mngon par sgrub pa'i phyir ro // /
