column21: 0.023#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812298#1812299#TD4082E.TXT.r_682# byang chub sems dpas 'khor bsdus la kun  nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pas dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang phongs pa de dag gi phyir bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams las gos dang zas dang  mal cha dang stan dad na ba'i gsos sman dang  yo byad rnams chos bzhin du  yongs su tshol bar mi byed na / /
column22: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column23: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691347#691347#TD4083E.TXT.r_859# mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column24: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692272#TD4083E.TXT.r_963# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column25: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column26: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column27: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693831#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column28: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column29: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694262#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column30: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693137#693137#TD4083E.TXT.r_1067# ting nge 'dzin gyi don mi tshol ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon  par bsgrub pa la brtson pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column31: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#691120#691120#TD4083E.TXT.r_837# len par mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi bsod nams kyi grogs su 'gro ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos te / /
column32: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692644#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column33: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column34: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: dka' ba spyod pa rnam pa bcu ni 'di lta ste / / +khas blang bar dka' ba spyod pa ni / / +byang chub chen por smon lam 'debs pa khas len pa'i phyir ro // /
mi ldog par dka' ba spyod pa ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams kyis  mi bzlog pa'i phyir ro // / +phyir mi phyogs par dka' ba spyod pa ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694350#694357#TD4083E.TXT.r_1193# na ste mi nus pa dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa nyid dang  dge 'dun gyi nang khrims  srung ba dang  gzhan gang yang rung ba la bcol ba dang  'khor yang bsod nams chen po dang ldan par shes pa dang  rang nyid gos la sogs pa tshol ba'i nus pa bstan pa dag / /

column3: sems can thams cad kyi log par sgrub pa rnams kyis de las phyir mi phyogs pa'i phyir ro // / +mngon du phyogs par dka' ba spyod pa ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694358#694367#TD4083E.TXT.r_1193;TD4083E.TXT.r_1194# na ste mi nus pa dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa nyid dang  dge 'dun gyi nang khrims  srung ba dang  gzhan gang yang rung ba la bcol ba dang  'khor yang bsod nams chen po dang ldan par shes pa dang  rang nyid gos la sogs pa tshol ba'i nus pa bstan pa dag / /

column3: gnod par byed pa'i sems can rnams kyi don thams cad bya ba la mngon du  phyogs pa'i phyir ro // / +mi gos par dka' ba spyod pa ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694366#694375#TD4083E.TXT.r_1193;TD4083E.TXT.r_1194# na ste mi nus pa dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa nyid dang  dge 'dun gyi nang khrims  srung ba dang  gzhan gang yang rung ba la bcol ba dang  'khor yang bsod nams chen po dang ldan par shes pa dang  rang nyid gos la sogs pa tshol ba'i nus pa bstan pa dag / / +gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa'i bya ba dag rang nyid kyis byas zin pa dang  mu stegs can yin pa  las chos rkur 'ongs la de yang 'dul ba'i skal ba med pa zhig yin na nyes pa med do // /

column3: 'jig rten du skyes kyang 'jig rten pa'i chos kyis mi gos pa'i phyir ro // / +mos par dka' ba spyod pa ni / /
rtog pa med par yang theg pa chen po la rgya che ba nyid dang  zab pa nyid thams cad la mos pa'i phyir ro // / +rtogs par     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694384#694391#TD4083E.TXT.r_1195;TD4083E.TXT.r_1196# gzhan gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +gzhan gyi blo dang mthun par mi 'jug pa ni gzhan gyi blo dang mthun par 'jug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: dka' ba spyod pa ni / / +gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa rtogs pa'i phyir ro // / +khong du chud par dka' ba spyod pa ni / / +de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dgongs te gsungs pa zab mo khong du chud pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694025#694027#TD4083E.TXT.r_1159;TD4083E.TXT.r_1160# gzhan sdug bsngal rnams ji skad bstan pas sdug bsngal sel bar mi byed pa ni gzhan gyi sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694392#694403#TD4083E.TXT.r_1196;TD4083E.TXT.r_1197# gzhan gyi blo dang mthun par mi 'jug pa ni gzhan gyi blo dang mthun par 'jug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692326#692326#TD4083E.TXT.r_969;TD4083E.TXT.r_970# rgod pa ste rnam par ma zhi ba'i sems kyis rab tu rgod pa la sogs pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rgod pa ma yin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang  chub sems dpa' rgod pas gzhan dag rgod du gzhug par 'dod cing / /
column7: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693567#693567#TD4083E.TXT.r_1110;TD4083E.TXT.r_1111# theg pa chen po dang ldan pa gang la la zhig zab pa'i gnas dag spong ba ni 'das ma thag pa lta bu dang  lta ba ngan pa spong ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang    chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las de kho na'i don nam // /
column8: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693664#693664#TD4083E.TXT.r_1120;TD4083E.TXT.r_1121# bdag la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i rgyu'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang  chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis dam pa yin pa'i rlom sems kyis bdag la chags pa dang  gzhan la khong khro bas brnyas pa dang bcas pa dang  gshe ba dang bcas pas bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: mi 'byed pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med par  dka' ba spyod pa ni / / +'khor ba yongs su mi gtong yang / / +des kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691467#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par GYUR NA NYON MONGS PA CAN gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693990#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694089#694092#TD4083E.TXT.r_1166;TD4083E.TXT.r_1167# sems can dag mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyis rig pa ston par mi byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694569#694571#TD4083E.TXT.r_1212;TD4083E.TXT.r_1213# skrod par mi byed na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column8: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691055#691058#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro NA NYON MONGS PA CAN gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column10: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694049#694050#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /

column3: sbyor bar dka' ba spyod pa ni / / +sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba la bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du lhun gyis grub par sems can thams cad kyi  don thams cad mdzad pa dag la sbyor ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694420#694431#TD4083E.TXT.r_1199;TD4083E.TXT.r_1200;TD4083E.TXT.r_1201# na ste ma nus pa dang  'dul bar 'dod pa dang  bya ba de gnod pa dang ldan pa yin pa dang      // / +dge 'dun gyi nang khrims srung ba dang  gzhan mang po dag gi sems srung bar 'dod pa dang  mu stegs can tshar gcad pa'i phyir ni nyes pa med do // /
column5: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#691318#691318#TD4083E.TXT.r_856;TD4083E.TXT.r_857# de rnams nyid la rjes su brtse  bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +de rnams 'dul bar 'dod pa dang  dge 'dun gyi nang khrims srung ba dang  gzhan mang po dag gi sems bsrungs na nyes pa med do // /

column3: khong du chud par dka' ba spyod pa la sangs rgyas rnams kyis dgongs te gsungs pa la / / +de dag gis khong du chud pa ci 'dra zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694430#694439#TD4083E.TXT.r_1200;TD4083E.TXT.r_1201;TD4083E.TXT.r_1202# dge 'dun gyi nang khrims srung ba dang  gzhan mang po dag gi sems srung bar 'dod pa dang  mu stegs can tshar gcad pa'i phyir ni nyes pa med do // /

column3: dper na ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin phod pa yin zhe na / / +gal te sbyin pa cung zad mi sbyin la de phyogs  bcu'i 'jig rten sbyin pa bya ba tshad med pa la yang 'jug go // /
column4: 0.015#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693895#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693081#693082#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693204#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692790#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693261#693261#TD4083E.TXT.r_1079# bsam gtan gyi bde ba nyams  su myong bar byed cing de la yon tan du lta ba ni dge ba chos dang sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro myang ba dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693300#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692644#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691195#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column14: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693713#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692272#TD4083E.TXT.r_963# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#693832#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#693975#693975#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column20: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#691279#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column21: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694262#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column22: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694536#694536#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /

column3: ji ltar na sbyin pa 'dod pa yin zhes na / / +gal te sbyin pa thams cad la 'dod par mi byed pa'o // / +ji ltar na sbyin pa la mos pa yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694454#694464#TD4083E.TXT.r_1202;TD4083E.TXT.r_1203# gzhan dag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa smra bar mi byed pa ni yon tan  gyi bsngags pa smra ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // / +byang chub sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis yang dag pa'i tshul khrims dang  thos pa dang  gtong ba la sogs pa yang dag pa'i yon TAN RJOD PAR MI BYED cing yang dag pa'i bsngags pa  mi brjod pa dang  legs par smras ba la legs so zhes bya ba ma byin na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dad pas mi 'gro ba'o // / +ji ltar na sbyin pa la 'jug  par byed pa yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694465#694474#TD4083E.TXT.r_1203;TD4083E.TXT.r_1204# byang chub sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis yang dag pa'i tshul khrims dang  thos pa dang  gtong ba la sogs pa yang dag pa'i yon tan rjod par mi byed cing yang dag pa'i bsngags pa  mi brjod pa dang  legs par smras ba la legs so zhes bya ba ma byin na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#691146#691147#TD4083E.TXT.r_839;TD4083E.TXT.r_840# byang chub sems dpa'  pha rol gyi gser la sogs pa bstabs pa nang rgyal la sogs pas len par mi byed na sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column6: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#690903#690904#TD4083E.TXT.r_816;TD4083E.TXT.r_817# khong  khro ba la sogs pas gus par mi byed cing stan las mi ldang la stan mi stobs na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column7: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694091#694092#TD4083E.TXT.r_1166;TD4083E.TXT.r_1167# sems can dag mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyis rig pa ston par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column8: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#691212#691213#TD4083E.TXT.r_844;TD4083E.TXT.r_845# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column9: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694240#694241#TD4083E.TXT.r_1181;TD4083E.TXT.r_1182# byang chub sems dpa' nye du dang longs spyod las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing mya ngan byung ba rnams la kun nas  mnar sems kyi sems kyis mya ngan bsang bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column10: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#691380#691381#TD4083E.TXT.r_861;TD4083E.TXT.r_862# ma dad pa dang ma gus pas mi slob pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column11: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694411#694412#TD4083E.TXT.r_1197;TD4083E.TXT.r_1198# byang chub  sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column12: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#691469#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column13: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#691058#691058#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column14: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column15: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694050#694050#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column16: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#692817#692817#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030# kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column17: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#693916#693916#TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column18: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#693991#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /

column3: gal te bdag sbyin pa la 'jug par mi byed pa ste / / +rang bzhin nyid kyis sbyin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694475#694483#TD4083E.TXT.r_1203;TD4083E.TXT.r_1204;TD4083E.TXT.r_1205;TD4083E.TXT.r_1206# byang chub sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis yang dag pa'i tshul khrims dang  thos pa dang  gtong ba la sogs pa yang dag pa'i yon tan rjod par mi byed cing yang dag pa'i bsngags pa  mi brjod pa dang  legs par smras ba la legs so zhes bya ba ma byin na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin no // /

column3: ji ltar na sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba yin zhe na / / +gal te lan 'ga' sbyin pa ci yang sbyin par mi byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694484#694495#TD4083E.TXT.r_1205;TD4083E.TXT.r_1206# pha rol po rang bzhin gyis 'dod pa chung ngu yin par dpag ste / / +yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa'i rgyu des 'di kun  nas nyon mongs par 'gyur du dogs pa dang  gtam rdzogs sdong su sdong ba dang  de'i yon tan rnams yon tan ltar bcos pa yin te yang dag pa ma yin pa dang  legs par smra ba yang legs par smra ba ltar bcos pa yin te / /

column3: ji ltar na sbyin pa la che ba yin zhe na / / +gal te  sbyin pa la snying po med pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694494#694514#TD4083E.TXT.r_1206;TD4083E.TXT.r_1207# yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa'i rgyu des 'di kun  nas nyon mongs par 'gyur du dogs pa dang  gtam rdzogs sdong su sdong ba dang  de'i yon tan rnams yon tan ltar bcos pa yin te yang dag pa ma yin pa dang  legs par smra ba yang legs par smra ba ltar bcos pa yin te / /

column3: ji ltar na sbyin pa dag pa yin zhe na / / +gal te ser snang 'byung bar byed pa'o // / +ji ltar na sbyin pa mthar phyin pa yin zhe na / /
gal te mtha' la mi gnas par gyur pa'o // / +ji ltar na sbyin pa la bdag po yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694515#694522#TD4083E.TXT.r_1207;TD4083E.TXT.r_1208;TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# yang dag pa ma yin pa dang  'dul bar 'dod pa  dang  gzhan gyi sems srung par byed pa la ni nyes pa med do // /

column3: gal te sbyin pa la dbang byed  pa ma yin pa'o // / +ji ltar na sbyin pa mi zad pa yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694523#694536#TD4083E.TXT.r_1208;TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# rkyen du 'tsham pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /

column3: gal te mi zad pa la mi gnas par gyur pa'o // / +sbyin pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du tshul khrims la sogs pa shes rab la thug pa rnams la yang ci rigs su shes par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694261#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694532#694546#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209;TD4083E.TXT.r_1210# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694632#694640#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217;TD4083E.TXT.r_1218# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs pa la sogs pa mi byed pa ni bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.014#TD4083E.TXT.r#693203#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691195#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column13: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#693711#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column14: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693383#693384#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thos pa dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#690826#690826#TD4083E.TXT.r_809# sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis shin tu bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las rnyed pa dang  bkur sti dang du mi len cing 'dod pa chung ba dang  chog shes pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#690873#690874#TD4083E.TXT.r_814# ches rgan pa la gus par mi byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul    khrims kyis shin du bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las spyod pa dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691347#691347#TD4083E.TXT.r_859# mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692644#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column20: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa'i phyir // / +nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column21: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692272#TD4083E.TXT.r_963# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column22: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column23: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column24: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693831#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column25: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693137#693137#TD4083E.TXT.r_1067# ting nge 'dzin gyi don mi tshol ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon  par bsgrub pa la brtson pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column26: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#691120#691120#TD4083E.TXT.r_837# len par mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi bsod nams kyi grogs su 'gro ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos te / /
column27: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694130#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: ji ltar na srog gcod pa yin zhe na / / +gal te srog chags    rnams 'khor ba las shin tu bzlog pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694545#694554#TD4083E.TXT.r_1210;TD4083E.TXT.r_1211# byang chub sems dpa' sems can smra dbab par rigs pa dang  chad pas gcad par rigs pa dang  bskrad par rigs pa rnams nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis smra 'bebs par mi byed dam / /

column3: ji ltar na ma byin par len pa yin zhe na / / +gal te sus kyang ma byin par bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad len pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694555#694563#TD4083E.TXT.r_1210;TD4083E.TXT.r_1211;TD4083E.TXT.r_1212# byang chub sems dpa' sems can smra dbab par rigs pa dang  chad pas gcad par rigs pa dang  bskrad par rigs pa rnams nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis smra 'bebs par mi byed dam / / +chang pas gcod pas phyir 'chos par mi byed dam / /

column3: ji ltar na 'dod pa la log par spyod pa yin zhe na / / +gal te 'dod pa rnams la log pa'o zhes spyod pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694178#694181#TD4083E.TXT.r_1176;TD4083E.TXT.r_1177# nga rgyal dang khong khro bas mnyam pa'am de bas lhag pa'i mthun pa'i phan gdags pas lan du phan mi 'dogs na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#690977#690978#TD4083E.TXT.r_826;TD4083E.TXT.r_827# byang chub sems dpa' pha rol po  dag 'dri ba dang  kun du smra ba dang  yang dag par dga' bar byed pa la nga rgyal la sogs pas yang dag par lan mi 'debs pa dang  kun du mi smra ba dang  yang dag par dga' bar mi byed pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon  mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column6: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693159#693159#TD4083E.TXT.r_1069;TD4083E.TXT.r_1070# khong khro ba dang nga rgyal gyis non pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thad du gdams ngag tshol du mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa  can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column7: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694282#694285#TD4083E.TXT.r_1186;TD4083E.TXT.r_1187# byang chub sems dpa' sems can phongs pa rnams zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis zas dang  skom la sogs pa sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#691467#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692817#692817#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030# kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column10: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693916#693916#TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column11: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693991#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column12: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694338#694338#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192# byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyi chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don gyi mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /

column3: ji ltar na brdzun du  smra ba yin zhe na / / +gal te gang brdzun pa de la brdzun no zhes smra ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694572#694581#TD4083E.TXT.r_1212;TD4083E.TXT.r_1213;TD4083E.TXT.r_1214;TD4083E.TXT.r_1215# skrod par mi byed na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // / +bcos su mi rung ba'i rang bzhin can zhig ste / /

column3: ji ltar na log par lta ba can yin zhe na / / +gal te gang thams cad na thams cad la 'dug pa'i log pa de ji lta ba bzhin ltar na ngag rtsub po smra ba yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694582#694599#TD4083E.TXT.r_1215# gtam byar mi rung la bka' blo mi bde zhing mnar sems kyi shas che ba yal bar bor ba dang  dus la gzhes pa dang  gzhi de las 'thab    pa dang  mtshang 'dru ba dang  'gyed pa dang  rtsod par 'gyur ba mthong ba dang  dge 'dun bye bar dogs pas yal bar bor ba dang  sems can de dag rang bzhin gyis ngo tsha shes pa dang  khrel yod pa dang ldan pas myur ba nyid du rang nyid phyir 'chos pa zhig yin na ni nyes  pa med do // /
column5: 0.007#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812639#1812643#TD4082E.TXT.r_727;TD4082E.TXT.r_728# dus la sdod na nyes pa med do // / +gzhi de las 'thab pa dang  mtshang 'dru ba dang  'gyed pa dang  rtsod par 'gyur bar mi 'thad na nyes pa med do // /
column6: 0.022#TD4087E.TXT.r#1566678#1566678#TD4087E.TXT.r_1241# 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang 'thab pa dang  mtshang  'dru ba dang  'gyed pa dang  rtsod par byed kyi / /
column7: 0.022#TD4087E.TXT.r#1567011#1567011#TD4087E.TXT.r_1283# 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang 'thab pa dang  mtshang 'dru ba dang  'gyed pa dang  rtsod par byed cing / /
column8: 0.024#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2744127#2744127#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6132;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6133# gzhan    dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston na yang tshig kyal pa yin par brjod par bya'o / / +'thab mo dang  mtshang 'dru ba dang  rtsod pa dang  'gyed pa la brten te tshig rjod par byed dam / /
column9: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#1317242#1317242#TD4037E.TXT.r_148# bdag dang gzhan dag la gnod pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  phan par mi 'gyur ba gang dag yin  pa'i 'thab mo dang  mtshang 'dru ba dang  'gyed pa dang  rtsod pa rnams dang  pha rol la rnam par 'che ba'i las gzhan dag la ni ma yin no // /

column3: gal te shes bya ba'i pha rol tu gnas pa'o // / +ji ltar na tshig kyal pa smras pa yin  zhe na ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694600#694609#TD4083E.TXT.r_1215# gtam byar mi rung la bka' blo mi bde zhing mnar sems kyi shas che ba yal bar bor ba dang  dus la gzhes pa dang  gzhi de las 'thab    pa dang  mtshang 'dru ba dang  'gyed pa dang  rtsod par 'gyur ba mthong ba dang  dge 'dun bye bar dogs pas yal bar bor ba dang  sems can de dag rang bzhin gyis ngo tsha shes pa dang  khrel yod pa dang ldan pas myur ba nyid du rang nyid phyir 'chos pa zhig yin na ni nyes  pa med do // /

column3: gal te chos thams cad yang dag par rnam par phye ste smra ba'o // / +ji ltar na brnab sems can yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694608#694617#TD4083E.TXT.r_1215;TD4083E.TXT.r_1216;TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# gtam byar mi rung la bka' blo mi bde zhing mnar sems kyi shas che ba yal bar bor ba dang  dus la gzhes pa dang  gzhi de las 'thab    pa dang  mtshang 'dru ba dang  'gyed pa dang  rtsod par 'gyur ba mthong ba dang  dge 'dun bye bar dogs pas yal bar bor ba dang  sems can de dag rang bzhin gyis ngo tsha shes pa dang  khrel yod pa dang ldan pas myur ba nyid du rang nyid phyir 'chos pa zhig yin na ni nyes  pa med do // /

column3: gal te rgyun du bdag bla na med pa'i bsam gtan thob par byed pa'o // / +ji ltar na gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694618#694628#TD4083E.TXT.r_1215;TD4083E.TXT.r_1216;TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# gtam byar mi rung la bka' blo mi bde zhing mnar sems kyi shas che ba yal bar bor ba dang  dus la gzhes pa dang  gzhi de las 'thab    pa dang  mtshang 'dru ba dang  'gyed pa dang  rtsod par 'gyur ba mthong ba dang  dge 'dun bye bar dogs pas yal bar bor ba dang  sems can de dag rang bzhin gyis ngo tsha shes pa dang  khrel yod pa dang ldan pas myur ba nyid du rang nyid phyir 'chos pa zhig yin na ni nyes  pa med do // / +rdzu 'phrul zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs pa la sogs pa mi byed pa ni bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: gal te sems la nyon mongs par byed pa thams cad  la 'dis gnod par byas pa yin no // / +ji ltar na log par lta ba can yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694305#694307#TD4083E.TXT.r_1190# 'khor rnams kyi don mi byed pa ni chos  dang zang zing gis bsdus pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column5: 0.014#TD4083E.TXT.r#693203#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column6: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column7: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693383#693384#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thos pa dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column8: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693711#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par sbyor ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column9: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#690826#690826#TD4083E.TXT.r_809# sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis shin tu bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las rnyed pa dang  bkur sti dang du mi len cing 'dod pa chung ba dang  chog shes pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column10: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#690873#690874#TD4083E.TXT.r_814# ches rgan pa la gus par mi byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul    khrims kyis shin du bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las spyod pa dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column11: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column12: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column13: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691195#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column14: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691347#691347#TD4083E.TXT.r_859# mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column15: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693973#693975#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151# nad pa'i rim gro mi byed pa ni nad pa'i rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column16: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692272#TD4083E.TXT.r_963# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column17: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column18: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column19: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693831#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column20: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column21: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694262#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column22: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693137#693137#TD4083E.TXT.r_1067# ting nge 'dzin gyi don mi tshol ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon  par bsgrub pa la brtson pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column23: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#691120#691120#TD4083E.TXT.r_837# len par mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi bsod nams kyi grogs su 'gro ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos te / /
column24: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694130#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: gal te gang thams cad na thams cad la 'dug pa'i log pa de ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694641#694650#TD4083E.TXT.r_1218;TD4083E.TXT.r_1219# byang chub sems dpa'  rdzu 'phrul rnam pa mang po'i nus mthu dang ldan la / /

column3: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zab bo zhes bya ba la / / +sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zab pa gang zhe na / / +'dir bstan pa  rtag pa'i chos rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694646#694659#TD4083E.TXT.r_1218;TD4083E.TXT.r_1219;TD4083E.TXT.r_1220# byang chub sems dpa'  rdzu 'phrul rnam pa mang po'i nus mthu dang ldan la / / +sems can skrag par bya bar rigs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du mas skrag par mi byed pa dang  sems can 'dun par bya ba'i rigs pa rnams 'dun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344552#1344555#TD4037E.TXT.r_3923;TD4037E.TXT.r_3924;TD4037E.TXT.r_3925;TD4037E.TXT.r_3926# byang chub sems dpa' nad pa nad kyis thebs pa dang phrad pa na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan  pas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344669#1344669#TD4037E.TXT.r_3939;TD4037E.TXT.r_3940# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi byed na    nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344750#1344751#TD4037E.TXT.r_3950;TD4037E.TXT.r_3951# nyon mongs  pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los mi byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344802#1344802#TD4037E.TXT.r_3957;TD4037E.TXT.r_3958# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sel bar mi byed na / /
column9: 0.017#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811958#1811958#TD4082E.TXT.r_631;TD4082E.TXT.r_632# nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los mi byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.017#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812067#1812069#TD4082E.TXT.r_646;TD4082E.TXT.r_647;TD4082E.TXT.r_648# byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma'i don la tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa dag  mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas rigs pa dang  tshul bzhin ston par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi  byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.017#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812205#1812207#TD4082E.TXT.r_667;TD4082E.TXT.r_668;TD4082E.TXT.r_669# byang chub sems dpa' sems can nye du dang  longs spyod las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan byung ba kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pas sel bar mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal  ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column12: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#691140#691142#TD4083E.TXT.r_839# byang chub sems dpa'  pha rol gyi gser la sogs pa bstabs pa nang rgyal la sogs pas len par mi byed na sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column13: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#692567#692569#TD4083E.TXT.r_999# byang chub    sems dpa' bdag gi tshig mi btsun par 'gyur ba'i gtam ngan pa bden pa'i dngos po sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column14: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693475#693475#TD4083E.TXT.r_1102;TD4083E.TXT.r_1103# byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod nyid med kyang sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin yod bzhin du phyi rol gyi bstan bcos te mu stegs can gyi bstan bcos  la brtson par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +shin tu yid gzhungs pa dang ldob skyen pa dang  yun ring por yang yid mi brjed pa dang  don sems pa dang rtog par byed nus pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab la rigs pas nye bar rtogs pa dang ldan pas blo mi 'gyur ba  dang ldan zhing nyin gcig bzhin du ches lhag par sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab la brtson par byed pa yin na nyes pa med do // /
column15: 0.020#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342151#1342151#TD4037E.TXT.r_3570;TD4037E.TXT.r_3571# sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los len par mi byed na / /
column16: 0.020#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809389#1809389#TD4082E.TXT.r_307;TD4082E.TXT.r_308# sems can  yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los len par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column17: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#692285#692285#TD4083E.TXT.r_964# byang chub sems dpa' log pas 'tsho bar byed pa'i chos byung ba rnams dang du len cing mi 'dzem la sel bar mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column18: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#691208#691208#TD4083E.TXT.r_844# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column19: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692351#692352#TD4083E.TXT.r_972# rnam pa sna tshogs pas smra bar byed 'dod na nyon mongs pa can gyi ltung bar 'gyur ro // /
column20: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692951#692952#TD4083E.TXT.r_1043;TD4083E.TXT.r_1044# 'dzin par byed rjes su 'jug par byed na  nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column21: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693227#693229#TD4083E.TXT.r_1076;TD4083E.TXT.r_1077# de rnams byung ba nyams su myong bar byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column22: 0.025#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809483#1809483#TD4082E.TXT.r_326;TD4082E.TXT.r_327;TD4082E.TXT.r_328# chos sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +snyom las dang le los sbyin par mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column23: 0.025#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812148#1812148#TD4082E.TXT.r_660;TD4082E.TXT.r_661# nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur  te ; / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column24: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693611#693611#TD4083E.TXT.r_1116# sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur pa ma yin no zhes zer zhing spong bar byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column25: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692617#692617#TD4083E.TXT.r_1006;TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# 'chos par mi byed pa ni nyes par snang bar bya ba'i don to // / +rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: chos kyi sku rtag pa'i phyir ro // / +chad pa'i chos rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te / / +sgrib pa thams cad chad pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694660#694670#TD4083E.TXT.r_1219;TD4083E.TXT.r_1220# sems can skrag par bya bar rigs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du mas skrag par mi byed pa dang  sems can 'dun par bya ba'i rigs pa rnams 'dun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +sems can rnams gang  du shas cher mngon par zhen par gyur pa mu stegs can 'phags pa rnams la skur ba 'debs pa dang  log par lta ba dang ldan pa zhig na ma bstan kyang nyes pa med do // /
column5: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#1345284#1345287#TD4037E.TXT.r_4029;TD4037E.TXT.r_4030# sems can rnams gang du shas cher mngon par zhen pa mu stegs can 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa / / +log par lta ba dang ldan pa dag cig na ma bstan kyang nyes pa med do // /
column6: 0.023#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812711#1812714#TD4082E.TXT.r_736# sems can rnams gang du shas cher mngon par zhen pa mu stegs can 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa log par lta ba dang ldan pa dag cig yin na ma bstan kyang nyes pa med do // /

column3: skye ba'i chos rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te / / +sprul pa'i sku skye ba'i phyir ro // / +dmigs pa'i chos  rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694671#694680#TD4083E.TXT.r_1220;TD4083E.TXT.r_1221# sems can rnams gang  du shas cher mngon par zhen par gyur pa mu stegs can 'phags pa rnams la skur ba 'debs pa dang  log par lta ba dang ldan pa zhig na ma bstan kyang nyes pa med do // /

column3: sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gi gnyen po dag dang bcad pa dmigs pa'i phyir ro // /

column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694691#694700#TD4083E.TXT.r_1222;TD4083E.TXT.r_1223# snying rjer ldan  zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / / +'dir bsgrub pa'i sgo dang  dgag pa'i sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba gang cung zad bstan pa de las mi 'da' bas ltung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni ltung bar mi 'gyur ba gsal bar bstan pa'o // /

column3: de bzhin du zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i chos rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te / / +gti mug dang bcas pa'i chos rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694701#694711#TD4083E.TXT.r_1223# 'dir bsgrub pa'i sgo dang  dgag pa'i sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba gang cung zad bstan pa de las mi 'da' bas ltung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni ltung bar mi 'gyur ba gsal bar bstan pa'o // /

column3: so so'i skye ba'o chos rnams ni / / +sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams su blta bar bya'o // / +mi gos pa'i chos rnams ni     // / +sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams te / /

column5: 0.021#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2560447#2560447#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3005# mi'i yang pha ma mi ma yin pa bsad na mtshams med par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni mtshams med par mi 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column8: 0.025#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1452699#1452699#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_6210# par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'di dag rtag tu rgyun chags par thal bar 'gyur ba'o // /
column9: 0.026#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2560599#2560599#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3029# de ji ltar mtshams med par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i mtshan nyid can de ni mtshams med par mi 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column10: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1135916#1135916#TD4047E.TXT.r_2129# rgyas par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni bsags pas zhugs par gyur pas khyad par can du 'gyur ba ste / /

column12: 0.028#TD4061E.TXT.r#1531064#1531065#TD4061E.TXT.r_2517;TD4061E.TXT.r_2518# yid byung na 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro // / +'dod chags dang bral na rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column13: 0.028#TD4095E.TXT.r#82162#82162#TD4095E.TXT.r_3796;TD4095E.TXT.r_3797# bslab    pa thams cad 'das na dri bar bya ba la bdag gis de lta bu ma byas so zhes bya ba 'di nye bar gnas par 'gyur te / / +brdzun du smra bar thal bar 'gyur bas de'i ji ltar 'das par byas kyang bdag nyid 'chags par 'gyur snyam nas brdzun du smra ba las ldog par bshad do // /
column14: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#870389#870390#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_16805;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_16806# de ltar na reg pa'i dus na nyon mongs pa can gyi tshor ba'i  rkyen tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa yod do zhes bya bar shes par byas par 'gyur ro // / +de lta na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la / /
column15: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1200959#1200959#TD4047E.TXT.r_11294# de dag la skye ba yod par gyur na ni de 'gag par yang 'gyur bas de nyams par 'gyur ba yang 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smras pa / /
column16: 0.029#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1997151#1997151#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2731;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2732# thub pa ni gsum ste zhes bya ba la / / +thub pa'i dngos po thub pa'i yin pa dang   'di thub pa'i yin pa ni thub pa'i'o // /

column3: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te / / +'jig rten du skyes kyang 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams kyis nye bar gos pa med pa'i  phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694729#694737#TD4083E.TXT.r_1225# dge ba'i bsam pa dang  bsam pa ma nyams pa dang  'bras bu gcig pa'i dbang gis rjes su mthun pa'i 'bras bu las de dang 'dir ji skad du bstan pa las ma nyams par brtse ba dang ldan pa snying rje dang ldan pa sems can rnams la byams pa ste / /

column3: de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams ni zab pa zhes bya'o // / +pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa dang  sems can yongs su smin bar bya ba dang  sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang  sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694738#694756#TD4083E.TXT.r_1225;TD4083E.TXT.r_1226;TD4083E.TXT.r_1227# dge ba'i bsam pa dang  bsam pa ma nyams pa dang  'bras bu gcig pa'i dbang gis rjes su mthun pa'i 'bras bu las de dang 'dir ji skad du bstan pa las ma nyams par brtse ba dang ldan pa snying rje dang ldan pa sems can rnams la byams pa ste / /
column5: 0.026#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1508310#1508310#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_12607;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_12608# de'i phyir dmyal bar sems can byung gi bar mi rnams kyi tshe lo dpag tu med pa la lhag mar bar gyi bskal pa bcu dgu 'da' bar  'gyur ro // / +chags pa'i gnas skabs de las 'da' ba yang de lta bur khong du chud par bya'o // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin  rnams kyi las kyi rab tu dbye bar blta'o // / +de ltar lhag pa'i sems kyi khyad par bstan nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694757#694766#TD4083E.TXT.r_1226;TD4083E.TXT.r_1227# phan  par 'dod pa dang  dul bar 'dod pa dad gdul bar bya bar 'dod pas 'da' bar byas pa ni nyes par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // / +ngang gi sgras ni sems shin tu 'khrugs pa dang  tshor ba drag pos nyen pa dang  gnyid log pa dang  tha mal pa ma yin pa dang  spong bar 'dod kyang     // /

column3: lhag pa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ji ltar blta zhe na / / +rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid dang  gnas dang  gzhi dang  dmigs pa dang  rnam pa dang  brgal ba'i lan dang  rten  dang ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694767#694781#TD4083E.TXT.r_1227;TD4083E.TXT.r_1228;TD4083E.TXT.r_1229# ngang gi sgras ni sems shin tu 'khrugs pa dang  tshor ba drag pos nyen pa dang  gnyid log pa dang  tha mal pa ma yin pa dang  spong bar 'dod kyang     // /

column3: grogs dang  rnam par smin pa dang  rgyu mthun pa dang  nges par 'byung ba dang  mthar thug par 'gro ba dang  sbyor ba las byung ba dang  rnam par mi rtog pa dang  rjes las thob pa'i phan yon dang  rab tu dbye ba dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694782#694792#TD4083E.TXT.r_1228;TD4083E.TXT.r_1229;TD4083E.TXT.r_1230;TD4083E.TXT.r_1231;TD4083E.TXT.r_1232;TD4083E.TXT.r_1233# nyon mongs pa drag pos kun nas dkris pa la sogs pa dag gis slar yang 'jug pa dag gis 'das pa las ni nyes pa med do zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to // / +sems ni shin tu nyon mongs dang / /

column3: rnam par mi rtog pa dang  rjes las thob pa'i  dpe dang  lhun gyis grub par bya ba sgrub pa dang  zab pa nyid kyis kyang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694793#694801#TD4083E.TXT.r_1231;TD4083E.TXT.r_1232;TD4083E.TXT.r_1233;TD4083E.TXT.r_1234;TD4083E.TXT.r_1235# gnyid dang smyos pa  dag la ni // / +byung ba la yang nyes pa med // / +ces bya ba ni tshigs su bcad pa gzhan no // /

column3: lhag pa'i shes rab kyi khyad par du blta bar bya'o // / +de la rnam pa lngas rnam par spangs pa ni / / +rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid ces bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694800#694810#TD4083E.TXT.r_1234;TD4083E.TXT.r_1235# don ni 'di ltar bstan par 'gyur te / / +chags pa dang  khong khro ba dang  phrag dog dang  khro ba dang  khon du 'dzin pa dang  nga rgyal dang  rgyags pa la sogs pas 'das par gyur  pa ni nyes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don te / /

column3: yid la mi byed pa  yongs su spangs pa dang  rtog pa dang bcas pa dang  dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sa las shin tu 'da' ba yongs su spangs pa dang  'du shes dang  tshor ba 'gog pa nye bar zhi ba yongs su spangs pa dang  gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid yongs su spangs pa dang  de kho na'i don la bkra  bar 'dzin pa yongs su spangs pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694811#694826#TD4083E.TXT.r_1235;TD4083E.TXT.r_1236;TD4083E.TXT.r_1237# chags pa dang  khong khro ba dang  phrag dog dang  khro ba dang  khon du 'dzin pa dang  nga rgyal dang  rgyags pa la sogs pas 'das par gyur  pa ni nyes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694826#694840#TD4083E.TXT.r_1237;TD4083E.TXT.r_1238;TD4083E.TXT.r_1239# gzhan byang chub sems dpa' dag gi spyod pa rnams ni dpag tu med cing mthar thug pa med pa'i phyir te / /

column7: 0.020#TD4047E.TXT.r#1129647#1129648#TD4047E.TXT.r_1222# zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas mi dge ba'i grogs pos mi gyo ba'i phyir ro // /

column9: 0.027#TD4098E.TXT.r#1395698#1395698#TD4098E.TXT.r_920;TD4098E.TXT.r_921# ngag gi sgras ni don brjod par mi 'gyur te / / +me zhes brjod pas tshig par gyur ta re / /
column10: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#463592#463592#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1849# 'di ltar yi ge ni legs pa  brjod pas 'di zhes bya bar 'gyur la don ni skyon med pas bzhin zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhe'o // /
column11: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1216479#1216479#TD4047E.TXT.r_13526;TD4047E.TXT.r_13527# shes rab kyis 'dus byas rnams stong par mthong ba la gnas par 'gyur ro // / +snying rjes ni sems can rnams la tshad med pas gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni / / +rnam pa 'di lnga yongs su spangs par rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694839#694856#TD4083E.TXT.r_1238;TD4083E.TXT.r_1239;TD4083E.TXT.r_1240;TD4083E.TXT.r_1241# de rnams su  bstan pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas nyes par 'gyur ba dang nyes par mi 'gyur ba DAG RIG PAR BYA'O // / +de ltar na rang gi 'dul ba'i bslab pa la 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa gsum gyis bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur te / /

column3: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rnam par gzhag pa ji skad bstan pa 'dir tshigs su bcas pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes // /
rnam pa rtog med pa'i ngo bo nyid // / +rnam pa lnga ni rnam spangs shing // / +yang dag don la bkrar 'dzin med // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694857#694867#TD4083E.TXT.r_1240;TD4083E.TXT.r_1241;TD4083E.TXT.r_1242# sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang  bsam  pa phun sum tshogs pa dang  sngon gyi rgyu phun sum tshogs pa'o // / +de la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa ni gang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dag bral bar mi byed cing / /
column5: 0.028#TD4010E.TXT.r#2262962#2262962#TD4010E.TXT.r_4182# ces bya ba ni sems kyi rgyud ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas bsgos pa'i phyir lus dang  ngag dang yid kyi kun du spyod pa yongs su dag pa yin no // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes // / +rnam par rtog pa med pa'i gnas // / +sems min sems ni kho na ste // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694868#694876#TD4083E.TXT.r_1242;TD4083E.TXT.r_1243# lus dang ngag dang yid kyi kun du spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang  nyes par rgyun du mi byed pa dang  sdig pa 'chags pa'o // /
column5: 0.026#TD4010E.TXT.r#2262962#2262962#TD4010E.TXT.r_4182# ces bya ba ni sems kyi rgyud ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas bsgos pa'i phyir lus dang  ngag dang yid kyi kun du spyod pa yongs su dag pa yin no // /

column3: don la mi sems rgyus byung phyir // / +byang chub sems dpa'  rnams kyis shes // / +rnam par rtog pa med pa'i gzhi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694877#694886#TD4083E.TXT.r_1242;TD4083E.TXT.r_1243# lus dang ngag dang yid kyi kun du spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang  nyes par rgyun du mi byed pa dang  sdig pa 'chags pa'o // / +bsam pa phun sum  tshogs pa ni gang yang 'di ni chos kyi bsam pas rab tu byung ba yin gyi 'tsho ba'i bsam pas ma yin byang chub chen po don du gnyer ba yin gyi don du gnyer ba ma yin / /

column3: thos pa'i bag chags rjod bcas pa'i // / +yid byed de ni tshul bzhin no // / +byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes // /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1345703#1345708#TD4037E.TXT.r_4081;TD4037E.TXT.r_4082;TD4037E.TXT.r_4083;TD4037E.TXT.r_4084# byang chub sems dpa' chen po don du gnyer ba yin gyi / / +don du mi gnyer ba ma yin / / +dge sbyong gi tshul dang mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer ba yin gyi / /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694887#694895#TD4083E.TXT.r_1243;TD4083E.TXT.r_1244# bsam pa phun sum  tshogs pa ni gang yang 'di ni chos kyi bsam pas rab tu byung ba yin gyi 'tsho ba'i bsam pas ma yin byang chub chen po don du gnyer ba yin gyi don du gnyer ba ma yin / / +dge sbyong gi tshul dang mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer ba yin gyi don du mi gnyer ba ma yin pa dang  de de ltar don du gnyer  bas le los gnas pa ma yin / /

column3: rnam rtog med pa'i dmigs pa ni / / +chos rnams brjod du med pa nyid // / +bdag med de bzhin nyid kyang de // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694896#694904#TD4083E.TXT.r_1244;TD4083E.TXT.r_1245# dge sbyong gi tshul dang mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer ba yin gyi don du mi gnyer ba ma yin pa dang  de de ltar don du gnyer  bas le los gnas pa ma yin / /

column3: byang chub  sems dpa' rnams kyis shes // / +rnam par mi rtog rnam pa ni // / +shes bya dmigs pa de nyid la // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694905#694914#TD4083E.TXT.r_1245# brtson 'grus mi zhen pa dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  yang 'byung ba dang  rims nad dang bcas pa dang  rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba dang  phyi ma la skye ba dang rgya shir 'gyur ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams dang ma 'dres pa'o // /
column5: 1.192#TD4037E.TXT.r#1345719#1345722#TD4037E.TXT.r_4085# brtson 'grus mi zhan pa dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  yang 'byung ba pa dang  rims nad dang bcas pa dang  rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba dang  phyi ma la skye ba dang  rga shir 'gyur ba'i sdig  pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams dang ma 'dres pa ste / /
column6: 0.013#TD4045E.TXT.r#397325#397325#TD4045E.TXT.r_322# kun nas  nyon mongs pa dang  yang 'byung ba pa dang  rims nad dang bcas pa dang  rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba dang  phyi ma la skye ba dang rga shir 'gyur ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams dang  ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba ni de la tshe 'di la kun nas nyon mongs pa phyi ma phyi ma grub pa'i phyir  kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams so // /

column3: mtshan ma med pa gang yin pa'o // / +sbyor las byung ba'i rang bzhin de // / +rnam brtags de las gzhan du min // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694915#694932#TD4083E.TXT.r_1245;TD4083E.TXT.r_1246;TD4083E.TXT.r_1247# brtson 'grus mi zhen pa dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  yang 'byung ba dang  rims nad dang bcas pa dang  rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba dang  phyi ma la skye ba dang rgya shir 'gyur ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams dang ma 'dres pa'o // /

column3: yi ge phan tshun sbyor bas na / / +don de sbyor las byung ba yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1345746#1345750#TD4037E.TXT.r_4089;TD4037E.TXT.r_4090# byang chub sems dpas sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu bsod nams byas shing dge ba byas te / /

column3: rjod pa  med par brjod bya la // / +shes pa 'jug pa ma yin no // / +'gal ba'i phyir na brjod la min // /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1345751#1345758#TD4037E.TXT.r_4089;TD4037E.TXT.r_4090# byang chub sems dpas sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu bsod nams byas shing dge ba byas te / / +des da ltar bdag nyid kyang  gos dang  zas dang  mal cha dang  stan dang  na ba'i gsos sman dang  yo byad rnams kyis phongs par mi 'gyur la / /

column5: 0.010#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1594886#1594888#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_9;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_10# chos mngon mdzod kyi bstan bcos rab bshad bya // / +bstan bcos byed par 'dod pas rang gi ston pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir de la yon tan brjod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i phyag 'tshal ba rtsom mo // /
column6: 0.010#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1400052#1400054#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_43;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_44# zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di'i don rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir slob dpon gyis / / +bstan bcos byed par 'dod pas rang gi ston pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir de la yon tan brjod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i phyag  'tshal ba rtsom mo zhes bya ba bshad de / /
column7: 0.010#TD4095E.TXT.r#63062#63064#TD4095E.TXT.r_9;TD4095E.TXT.r_10# chos mngon mdzod kyi bstan bcos rab bshad bya // / +bstan bcos byed par 'dod pas rang gi ston pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir / /
column8: 0.013#TD4091E.TXT.r#754270#754271#TD4091E.TXT.r_10749;TD4091E.TXT.r_10750# dge ba yin pa'i phyir ro // / +zag pa med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i mjug thogs su ni rang gi sa pa dang  sa gong ma pa dang  sa 'og ma pa gsum pa'i bar gyi dag pa dang  zag pa med pa skye'o // /
column9: 0.013#TD4026E.TXT.r#281964#281965#TD4026E.TXT.r_1194# bdag nyid ye shes kyi mchog la dbang thob pas 'gro ba nyon mongs pas rang dbang med pa rang dbang yod pa la 'gong pa'i phyir dbang gi che    ba'i bdag nyid dang  rtag tu gzhan la phan par bya ba la gcig tu mngon par dga' ba'i phyir mngon par dga' ba'i che ba'i bdag nyid dang  srid pas mi 'jigs pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid do // /
column10: 0.013#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#767101#767102#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_53;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_54# bstan bcos byed par 'dod pas zhes bya ba  'di ni 'brel pa'o // / +rang gi ston pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di ni dgos pa'o // /
column11: 0.013#TD4096E.TXT.r#1550084#1550085#TD4096E.TXT.r_49;TD4096E.TXT.r_50# bstan bcos byed par 'dod pas zhes bya ba 'di ni 'brel pa'o // / +rang gi ston pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di ni dgos pa'o // /
column12: 0.016#TD4051E.TXT.r#1246001#1246001#TD4051E.TXT.r_1890;TD4051E.TXT.r_1891;TD4051E.TXT.r_1892# byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste / / +kun brtags pa'i bdag nyid du med pa'i phyir ro // / +sgro 'dogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen por bka' stsal / /
column13: 0.016#TD4036E.TXT.r#3184#3186#TD4036E.TXT.r_306;TD4036E.TXT.r_307;TD4036E.TXT.r_308# bu lon gyis nyam thag pa'am / / +'jigs pas nyam thag pa'am / / +mi 'tsho bas 'jigs shing skrag pa'i phyir  yin gyi bdag nyid dul bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin no // /
column14: 0.018#TD4047E.TXT.r#1165518#1165518#TD4047E.TXT.r_6517# bdag la gnod par bya ba'am zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid 'chi bar bya ba'i phyir slong ba'o // /
column15: 0.019#TD4036E.TXT.r#6916#6917#TD4036E.TXT.r_918;TD4036E.TXT.r_919# de chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang  mal cha dang  stan dang  nad kyi gsos sman dang  yo byad kyi ched du bdag nyid la yon tan  yod par bstan pa'i phyir / /
column16: 0.021#TD4032E.TXT.r#1929742#1929742#TD4032E.TXT.r_1596# stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin rab tu bstan pa yang sgro 'dogs pa dang skur pa 'debs pa'i gnyen por lta ba thams cad las  nges par 'byung ba'i bdag nyid du shes par byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column17: 0.023#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2079430#2079431#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14685;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14686# ni zhes bya ba'i sgras ni dmigs kyis bsal ba'i don ston par byed pa'o //// / +rang gi med pa'i phyir dang de yang nye ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni / /
column18: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#1349156#1349156#TD4037E.TXT.r_4503# bdag nyid kyis mang du thos pa'i stobs bskyed pas phyin ci ma log par zin pas sems gnas par bya ba'i phyir / /
column19: 0.024#TD4047E.TXT.r#1188884#1188884#TD4047E.TXT.r_9678# dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par blangs pa la gzhan dag gus pa  bskyed pa'i phyir dang  bdag nyid kyi tshig gzung bar 'os par bya ba dang skur pa 'debs pa'i skabs med par bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column20: 0.024#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2079009#2079009#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14612# de'i rten dang dmigs pa 'og ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ni chos shes pa 'dod pa'i khams la brten pa'i phyir dang  'dod pa'i khams la dmigs pa'i phyir chos shes pa'i mjug thogs su gzugs med par snyoms par mi 'jug go // /
column21: 0.024#TD4010E.TXT.r#2281611#2281611#TD4010E.TXT.r_6542# de ltar na bdag nyid thams cad kyis dbye ba med pa'i phyir de las zlog pa'i dbye ba yod par ji  ltar 'gyur / /
column22: 0.024#TD4047E.TXT.r#1143119#1143119#TD4047E.TXT.r_3159;TD4047E.TXT.r_3160# don dam pa nyid kyi rgyu bstan pa'i phyir / / +brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid kyis  zhes bya ba ni ngag gi yul thams cad las 'das pa'i phyir dang  spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o // /
column23: 0.025#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2767556#2767556#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9375;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9376# de la dang pos ni khon dang bcas pa dang   nyes rtsom gyi sems kyis bde ba la reg par mi gnas par blta bar bya'o // / +gnyis pas ni nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung bas bdag nyid bde ba la reg par mi gnas par blta bar bya'o // /
column24: 0.025#TD4054E.TXT.r#1037547#1037547#TD4054E.TXT.r_7472# ma nges pa la gnas pa dang  rang bzhin gyis dbang po 'bring dang  bdag rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir smon  pa dang  yid 'byung ba dang  chags pa dang bral ba dang  rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir bsam pa can dang  bdag nyid mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i bsam pa can dang  nyan thos kyi sde snod la dmigs nas chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos bsgrub pa dang  nges 'byed cha mthun     // /
column25: 0.026#TD4095E.TXT.r#99558#99558#TD4095E.TXT.r_7079;TD4095E.TXT.r_7080# de la rkyen la rag lus pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o // / +gnod pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir sdug  bsngal ba'o // /

column3: ji ltar lnga pos don myong dang / / +yid kyis don ni myong ba ltar // /
